column1: ","About Oliver...Oliver has been creating since she was 5. She's worked in a variety of industries, including theater & film, interior design, events planning & production, and fashion. From famous singers and Mardi Gras Indians to performers in the circus, her creations are always fun, artistic, and wearable. She is well known for one-of-a-kind, highly styled character hats that are well crafted and comfortable.(Big Chief Monk Boudreaux's Babydolls)  (some of Oliver's work for Circus Juventas)About Theatrical Wear…Oliver developed theatrical wear because she feels fashion should be fun & celebrate our unique and individual styles. Many years of costuming for circus and theater
has given her a unique perspective and ingenuity for keeping comfort, fit

and wearability at the forefront of her designs.Each piece is a creation that speaks to our own sub-conscious or alter ego. From the shy gentleman in the corner who lights up once adorned with a feathered crown, to the diva who's always the life of the party, theatrical wear is completely versatile. Add it to your normal attire for a quick party fix or layer it up for festival season.It Starts with a Hat…Theatrical wear pieces are then added to create and define a
character or look. These pieces include collars, cuffs, arm warmers, spats,
bustles, belts, vests & tunics, boas, pantaloons, bell bottoms, and
outerwear, including capes and coats.        (some examples of hats and theatrical wear)
These bases make up the manufactured aspect of Theatrical Wear. Oliver then styles & embellishes the bases in small runs
to make them exclusive. Collections are made in Limited Edition runs.

Funding will help with production, hiring a couple of people to help the business run smoothly, & building sales channels, such as an online presence. Additionally, it will help Oliver be more efficient in her production methods, allowing her to bring Theatrical Wear to more people, and focusing on the artistic aspect. We believe in supporting small, local manufacturing, where personal relationships are just as important as construction quality. Base pieces will be outsourced to our New Orleans production facility so that Oliver will have more time for her one-of-a-kind hats, and embellishing pieces to make them more exclusive.
Even if you can't contribute, help spread the word on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other way you think would be helpful!
Check out this short video from Etsy Blogs featuring Oliver, if you'd like to know a little more about her…",13.0,1,"1 Campaign

column2:
>

We've created a great looking, lightweight waterproof boot that is comfortable to wear from city sidewalks to mountain trails, and everywhere in between. We hope you'll agree and take advantage of this incredible introductory price of $109, and help us bring this great boot to production.
column4: >
column6:
'/>

 Ridgemont was founded in 2014 to challenge the traditional look of outdoor footwear. Ridgemont is all about form and function. Ridgemont is great quality, good looking footwear that performs when you're walking the dog or conquering the trail—but also feels comfortable enough to wear at work or out for dinner. We combine the best materials and construction techniques but with a modern aesthetic. Our mission is to move the outdoor footwear market forward to the 21st century.
column7:
>

We've always loved the style and durability of the original alpine hiking boots. What's better than a boot mostly made from of one big piece of beautiful full-grain leather? Talk about durable! It’s that simplicity and purposeful design that inspired us to create what we consider to be the perfect light hiking boot.
column8:
>

You're probably thinking, ""If you like the old hikers so much, which are still around pretty much unchanged, why are you bothering to make your own?"" Good question. Here's why:
column11:
>

While the originals are awesome in principle, we just find the proportions too clunky in practice. They make your feet look like boulders, and they're not much lighter, so we've slimmed the Heritage boot down for a thinner silhouette. We've made the upper from high quality full grain leather sourced from a gold rated ecologically responsible tannery, so it looks as good as it goes. We decided to put the Heritage boot on a half-cup outsole with an exposed EVA midsole to not only enhance comfort, but also to give the boot a more relaxed vibe around town.
column13: >
column17: >
column19:
'/>

We didn't design these boots for off-road duty only. We want to wear them to work, school, dinner and on the trail. We want sneaker level comfort with boot level durability. We want it all, and we know you do too. That's why we've built the Heritage on a super comfortable EVA midsole for all day, everyday comfort.
column20:
>

We've also included our bespoke EVA Cush open cell foam insoles which, in addition to being super cushy yet supportive, are also anti-microbial, non-absorbant, and promote airflow.
column21:
>

We know that comfort isn't all about cushioning when it comes to the trail, so we've used our custom Variflex lasting board to add rigidity where it's needed, without disrupting natural foot flexion.
column22:
>

Finally and super importantly, we've also given the Heritage a fully waterproof lining from Hydroguard, because nothing ruins comfort like wet socks and feet.
column23:
>

What good is a great looking boot if you're afraid to wear it while doing the stuff you love to do? Not much good at all. That's why we've used only the best materials to build the Heritage boot.

The 2.5mm full-grain leather upper and waxed cotton canvas collar will take whatever you throw at them, and look good doing it.
column24:
>

The Heritage boot is built with heavy duty metal d-rings and speed hooks for secure lacing and a gusseted tongue to keep out dust and debris.

The outsole is made from real rubber and has our mildly lugged tread pattern so it provides excellent grip on loose and slippery surfaces without looking too aggressive.
column26:
>

That's the story of The Heritage. We hope you've enjoyed learning about the inspiration that lead to their design as well as the care, thought and functionality that's been built into them. Of course, we also hope that you've decided to back this campaign so that we can bring these beauties to life for you. 

If you're still undecided we have one more piece of scientific data that will hopefully help you make your decision.
column27:
>

So there it is, a diagram clearly illustrating the fact that the only known example of a combination of style, comfort and durability to exist on this planet is The Heritage from Ridgemont (as far as we know). It's Science!
column28: >
column31:
>

 We all live in this unpredictable world and understand that anything can happen. Remember Eyjafjallajökull? That said, based on our experience of sending hundreds of styles into production, this is a realistic production timeline, beginning at the close of the campaign and spanning about 120 days until delivery to you.
column32:
>

Let's stay in touch! You can keep up to date with the progress of this campaign, as well as other awesome Ridgemont events and promotions.

INSTAGRAM
FACEBOOK
RIDGEMONTOUTFITTERS.COM
column33:
>

Some people have asked us, ""Ridgemont is a fully-functioning footwear brand with retailers and it's own online store, why are we releasing products on crowdfunding platforms?"" For us, the answer is clear, and it comes down to a few key factors:

COMMUNITY

The IndieGoGo community is vibrant and full of people who are excited about backing new and exciting opportunities first, and they understand the value that's associated. You're tuned in to what's going on, and you communicate with creators as well as other backers to help the entire community learn and grow. As a brand, this kind of interaction with our customers is invaluable.

VALUE

The crowdfunding model allows us to pass our savings on to you in a very real way. We offer wholesale pricing to you in exchange for helping us pay for the initial development and production costs. All subsequent production runs of this product will be priced at an MSRP which is roughly double what you'll pay here.

RISK

Developing and producing new products the traditional way is risky because you don't truly know if it will resonate with your customers. If it doesn't, you've wasted a lot of time and money. Crowdfunding is the ultimate free market. If you like it, you back it. If enough people back it, we make it. If it doesn't get funded, we don't make it.

 

","We've created a great looking, lightweight waterproof boot that is comfortable to wear from city sidewalks to mountain trails, and everywhere in between. We hope you'll agree and take advantage of this incredible introductory price of $109, and help us bring this great boot to production.  Ridgemont was founded in 2014 to challenge the traditional look of outdoor footwear. Ridgemont is all about form and function. Ridgemont is great quality, good looking footwear that performs when you're walking the dog or conquering the trail—but also feels comfortable enough to wear at work or out for dinner. We combine the best materials and construction techniques but with a modern aesthetic. Our mission is to move the outdoor footwear market forward to the 21st century.We've always loved the style and durability of the original alpine hiking boots. What's better than a boot mostly made from of one big piece of beautiful full-grain leather? Talk about durable! It’s that simplicity and purposeful design that inspired us to create what we consider to be the perfect light hiking boot.You're probably thinking, ""If you like the old hikers so much, which are still around pretty much unchanged, why are you bothering to make your own?"" Good question. Here's why: While the originals are awesome in principle, we just find the proportions too clunky in practice. They make your feet look like boulders, and they're not much lighter, so we've slimmed the Heritage boot down for a thinner silhouette. We've made the upper from high quality full grain leather sourced from a gold rated ecologically responsible tannery, so it looks as good as it goes. We decided to put the Heritage boot on a half-cup outsole with an exposed EVA midsole to not only enhance comfort, but also to give the boot a more relaxed vibe around town. A set of self-colored laces is included with every pair.    We didn't design these boots for off-road duty only. We want to wear them to work, school, dinner and on the trail. We want sneaker level comfort with boot level durability. We want it all, and we know you do too. That's why we've built the Heritage on a super comfortable EVA midsole for all day, everyday comfort.We've also included our bespoke EVA Cush open cell foam insoles which, in addition to being super cushy yet supportive, are also anti-microbial, non-absorbant, and promote airflow.We know that comfort isn't all about cushioning when it comes to the trail, so we've used our custom Variflex lasting board to add rigidity where it's needed, without disrupting natural foot flexion.Finally and super importantly, we've also given the Heritage a fully waterproof lining from Hydroguard, because nothing ruins comfort like wet socks and feet.What good is a great looking boot if you're afraid to wear it while doing the stuff you love to do? Not much good at all. That's why we've used only the best materials to build the Heritage boot.The 2.5mm full-grain leather upper and waxed cotton canvas collar will take whatever you throw at them, and look good doing it.The Heritage boot is built with heavy duty metal d-rings and speed hooks for secure lacing and a gusseted tongue to keep out dust and debris.The outsole is made from real rubber and has our mildly lugged tread pattern so it provides excellent grip on loose and slippery surfaces without looking too aggressive.  That's the story of The Heritage. We hope you've enjoyed learning about the inspiration that lead to their design as well as the care, thought and functionality that's been built into them. Of course, we also hope that you've decided to back this campaign so that we can bring these beauties to life for you. If you're still undecided we have one more piece of scientific data that will hopefully help you make your decision. So there it is, a diagram clearly illustrating the fact that the only known example of a combination of style, comfort and durability to exist on this planet is The Heritage from Ridgemont (as far as we know). It's Science!  We all live in this unpredictable world and understand that anything can happen. Remember Eyjafjallajökull? That said, based on our experience of sending hundreds of styles into production, this is a realistic production timeline, beginning at the close of the campaign and spanning about 120 days until delivery to you.Let's stay in touch! You can keep up to date with the progress of this campaign, as well as other awesome Ridgemont events and promotions.INSTAGRAMFACEBOOKRIDGEMONTOUTFITTERS.COMSome people have asked us, ""Ridgemont is a fully-functioning footwear brand with retailers and it's own online store, why are we releasing products on crowdfunding platforms?"" For us, the answer is clear, and it comes down to a few key factors:COMMUNITYThe IndieGoGo community is vibrant and full of people who are excited about backing new and exciting opportunities first, and they understand the value that's associated. You're tuned in to what's going on, and you communicate with creators as well as other backers to help the entire community learn and grow. As a brand, this kind of interaction with our customers is invaluable.VALUEThe crowdfunding model allows us to pass our savings on to you in a very real way. We offer wholesale pricing to you in exchange for helping us pay for the initial development and production costs. All subsequent production runs of this product will be priced at an MSRP which is roughly double what you'll pay here.RISKDeveloping and producing new products the traditional way is risky because you don't truly know if it will resonate with your customers. If it doesn't, you've wasted a lot of time and money. Crowdfunding is the ultimate free market. If you like it, you back it. If enough people back it, we make it. If it doesn't get funded, we don't make it.",29.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column1: Our mission is to give everyone the chance to dream, design and create. Unleash your creativity and bring your ideas to life! 101Hero makes 3D printing easy and fun for youngsters, students and professionals alike.

As the most affordable 3D printer in the world the 101Hero is accessible for everyone. Getting started is as easy as 1-2-3. Simply insert the memory card, press the button, and watch your custom creations form right before your eyes.
Creativity is no longer limited to experts using complicated software and expensive printers. Now anyone can learn, imagine and print.
<li>Using the Consumer Version (CV) 3D printing is as easy as inserting an SD card with a design file on it and pressing a button. Your creation begins to print.
• No connection to computer is needed, simply plug the 101Hero into a power source, insert memory card and go!
• The 101Hero includes custom color filament and set-up is simple. You will be 3D printing in minutes.
• Download 3D designs from the 101Hero website or create your own. You are limited only by your imagination.
• 101Hero’s small, lightweight size makes it perfect for the home, classroom or business.
• For advanced designs the Designer and Developer Version (DV) can connect to a Windows, Mac, or Linux computer to create and print directly using free open-source software.
Just about anything! 101Hero can create single or multi-part 3D objects for endless creative possibilities including:
• Personalised everyday objects (iPhone cases, pens, and more!)
• Accessories for Lego and other popular toys

We designed 101Hero to be easy for anyone to use. It’s a great way to inspire creativity and curiosity in children at home or in the classroom. Use it to make toys, gifts, art and useful solutions for the home.
Using the 101Hero Consumer Version (CV) simply download designs from our website onto a memory card and create directly using only the printer. With the CV version anyone can 3D print in minutes.
From simple downloadable projects to fully custom 3D models the 101Hero can grow with you as your journey of creativity progresses. Our Designer &
column2: Developer Version (DV) is USB connectable and can be used with any Windows, Mac, or Linux based computer and supports open-source software such as Slic3r or Cura for advanced users. Simply load the 101Hero setting file and generate a custom G-code file for the printer.

column1: For those who are interested to see a demonstration of a printing project from start to finish we have included this long form video. It’s a chance to see the 101Hero in action from the first press of the button to the end result.
The finished design that was printed in the video above is a tiered Pyramid with a base size area of only 3 cm squared.
<figcaption>the small Pyramid Printed in the above video</figcaption>
To get an idea of scale and detail here is the Hexagon that 101Hero printed for our introduction video.
<figcaption>Detail close-up of Hexagon printed in the introduction video</figcaption>
You can use PLA, HIPS or ABS, as well as our custom 101Hero filament spools or other standard 1.75 mm filament spools available on the market.

What's the difference? We specially made a number of 101Hero filament spools so that people can print with more materials and color choices. By choosing the $99 pledge you will receive 10 different spools of vibrant colors. These spools are lightweight at 30g each so shipping is not a problem and they provide enough colorful material for plenty of printing work.
<li>Print size: Height 100mm (3.93"") Base Print Area φ150mm (5.9"")
• Print materials: ABS, PLA, Nylon, and others
• User Interface: 101Hero SD Card mode for an effortless, plug-and-play experience using lab-tested and print ready G-code files from our website.
Please note: if you pledged for a CV version but wish to upgrade to a DV version, please add $5 to your pledge and send us a message.
• Can also be used with any Windows, Mac, or Linux based computer
• Compatible with USB connection or SD Card
• Supports open-source software such as Slic3r or Cura (for advanced users)
Please note - Consumer Version and Designer/Developer Version are identical with the following exception:
• CV - Consumer Version (Only Memory Card Mode supported, Beginner user recommended)

column3: USB Connection Mode supported, supports open-source software and self-designed models, recommended for advanced users)

column1: How did we achieve such a low price?

Our motivation was to make 3D printing affordable and easy for everyone. We starting way back in 2013 by trying literally hundreds of component combinations. When we found the iteration that worked best in its simplest form, we redesigned and customized the motor while leaving only the essential structure needed for stable, quality 3D printing to make it affordable, simple and easy to use.

101Hero’s cutting-edge technologies and specialized components give it a completely different cost structure than any other 3D printer. We have built more complex and more expensive 3D printers in the past and built upon that valuable experience to simplify design, optimize performance, and minimize costs.
Hard work, perseverance and never compromising our goals paid off and now we're really excited to take the next step and bring 101Hero to you.
We rewarded our earliest supporters with 101Hero for only $49. Those limited rewards went fast but there is still incredible pricing available.

The retail price for 101Hero will be $99 but there is still time to save, for just $74 you can get a 101Hero with 2 rolls of printing plastic while that Pledge level lasts. See our rewards list below for more details.

In order to lower shipping costs and protect the 101Hero during shipping, your printer will arrive 90% pre-assembled. Set-up is simple and can be accomplished by anyone in minutes with just the turn of a few screws. Once final assembly is complete, simply insert the memory card, press the button and start creating!
In addition to rewards listed for your pledge level, the 101Hero will include a detailed instruction manual and a 100-240V A/C power adapter with a country-specific plug (EU, US, UK, AU).
Note: Flash, Iron Man and Captain American figures seen in the photo are not included.

We are a group of designers and engineers who are passionate about making a 3D Printer that is affordable and accessible to everyone. We have been involved with low-cost solutions and open source technology for 3D printing since 2013. Since then, our goal has been to break down cost and complexity barriers to 3D printing so that everyone can do it.
During the last few years we put together a great team, we have a genius designer and some of the best engineers and programmers in the industry all committed to the 101Hero project.

Now that we have launched on Kickstarter we have discovered that there are thousands of folks just like us who want the freedom and creativity of 3D printing at a great price. We would like to give a special thanks to so many supporters, motivators, backers, team members, and advisors that helped us get to where we are so quickly.
Thanks from the team: Paul Keung, Shin Lau, and Shuo Shu

Our mission is to give everyone the chance to dream, design and create. Unleash your creativity and bring your ideas to life! 101Hero makes 3D printing easy and fun for youngsters, students and professionals alike.

As the most affordable 3D printer in the world the 101Hero is accessible for everyone. Getting started is as easy as 1-2-3. Simply insert the memory card, press the button, and watch your custom creations form right before your eyes.
Creativity is no longer limited to experts using complicated software and expensive printers. Now anyone can learn, imagine and print.
Using the Consumer Version (CV) 3D printing is as easy as inserting an SD card with a design file on it and pressing a button. Your creation begins to print.
No connection to computer is needed, simply plug the 101Hero into a power source, insert memory card and go!
The 101Hero includes custom color filament and set-up is simple. You will be 3D printing in minutes.
Download 3D designs from the 101Hero website or create your own. You are limited only by your imagination.
101Hero’s small, lightweight size makes it perfect for the home, classroom or business.
For advanced designs the Designer and Developer Version (DV) can connect to a Windows, Mac, or Linux computer to create and print directly using free open-source software.
What can I make with 101Hero 3D Printer?
Just about anything! 101Hero can create single or multi-part 3D objects for endless creative possibilities including:
Toys, gifts, jewellery, pendants and ornaments
Personalised everyday objects (iPhone cases, pens, and more!)
Accessories for Lego and other popular toys

We designed 101Hero to be easy for anyone to use. It’s a great way to inspire creativity and curiosity in children at home or in the classroom. Use it to make toys, gifts, art and useful solutions for the home.
Using the 101Hero Consumer Version (CV) simply download designs from our website onto a memory card and create directly using only the printer. With the CV version anyone can 3D print in minutes.

From simple downloadable projects to fully custom 3D models the 101Hero can grow with you as your journey of creativity progresses. Our Designer & Developer Version (DV) is USB connectable and can be used with any Windows, Mac, or Linux based computer and supports open-source software such as Slic3r or Cura for advanced users. Simply load the 101Hero setting file and generate a custom G-code file for the printer.

For those who are interested to see a demonstration of a printing project from start to finish we have included this long form video. It’s a chance to see the 101Hero in action from the first press of the button to the end result.
The finished design that was printed in the video above is a tiered Pyramid with a base size area of only 3 cm squared.
the small Pyramid Printed in the above video
To get an idea of scale and detail here is the Hexagon that 101Hero printed for our introduction video.
Detail close-up of Hexagon printed in the introduction video
You can use PLA, HIPS or ABS, as well as our custom 101Hero filament spools or other standard 1.75 mm filament spools available on the market.

What's the difference? We specially made a number of 101Hero filament spools so that people can print with more materials and color choices. By choosing the $99 pledge you will receive 10 different spools of vibrant colors. These spools are lightweight at 30g each so shipping is not a problem and they provide enough colorful material for plenty of printing work.
Print size: Height 100mm (3.93"") Base Print Area φ150mm (5.9"")
Print materials: ABS, PLA, Nylon, and others
Positioning accuracy: 150 micron X and Y
User Interface: 101Hero SD Card mode for an effortless, plug-and-play experience using lab-tested and print ready G-code files from our website.
Please note: if you pledged for a CV version but wish to upgrade to a DV version, please add $5 to your pledge and send us a message.

DV - Designer & Developer Version (Both Memory Card Mode & USB Connection Mode supported, supports open-source software and self-designed models, recommended for advanced users)

It all started, when...

It all started, when Laurynas was travelling and felt that modern travelling became too distanced from humans. A travel became more of a way to move around than a way to learn, experience, to have an adventure. Laurynas thought that hitchhiking is the best way to live a travel as an adventure but unfortunately it lacked a modern spice in it. That's when he decided to create a product that would innovate hitchhiking and after various tries he came up with an umbrella.

column6: schema=youtube"" width=""580"">(Laurynas and Gabija traveling with the first umbrella prototype, ""Kartu Smagiau"" = ""Together it's more fun"")

column1: The first umbrella was a great base but it needed something more to become a revolution. That's when Dovydas and Vytenis came in. With a bunch of fresh ideas and motivation we started creating the best tool for travellers.

It was challenging because none of us had a real industrial background and we had to learn everything. Laurynas and Vytenis are both students at ISM University of Management and Economics, while Dovydas is on a self-teaching journey. We are quite different but in the mean time similar - we are dreamers and adventurers. We are connected by friendship and the dream of changing modern travelling.
SOON, SOON, SOON! We will bring You a video where we test the strength of the .voymigo umbrella! Stay tuned for more updates!

In the beginning we started with an idea and a lot of will to make it real. We tested various prototypes and contacted many manufacturers. Although there were some roadblocks on our path we pursued our dream and ended up having a strong, light, beautiful and innovative umbrella. We created .voymigo!

The idea behind .voymigo is hidden inside its name - voyage + amigo. Voymigo is there to create travels that wouldn't be just getting from point A to point B but would make the travel itself an adventure.

We all have in our minds a vision of the dream adventure. The kind of adventure that would be fulfilled with new friendships, experiences, laugh, challenges and joy. The adventure that we would tell about to everyone, that would inspire others to start their own journey. In our team we all have this dream and want to help others to start their dream adventure - with .voymigo.

.voymigo is not just an umbrella - it's an idea that connects. We see it as a way to show the world that travelling can be so much more than it is now. We want to create a movement of inspired and open people, which by living their dreams would change the world!

column3:
What You Get

We need at least 7000 USD to bring the umbrellas to You. This money, goes to manufacturing (we found the best manufacturer, which not only proved us to make fantastic quality products but also assured us that their factory is responsible and caring for their workers), shipping costs (we ship by air in order to bring the umbrellas as fast as possible to Your doors), white-board surface (we attach the surface ourselves with the help of machines in order to keep the best quality) and a thousand goes to extras in case something goes wrong.

column1: FLEXIBLE CAMPAIGN - EVERYONE WILL GET WHAT THEY ASKED FOR, EVEN IF WE DON'T REACH 7000USD
5$ - a big thanks from our team, all the updates about .voymigo and backers-only news/features.

column2: >18$ - get a .voymigo t-shirt with Your name on it. Join the movement!

column1: Dovydas and Laurynas at ""Vilnius Challenge 2015"" with .voymigo t-shirts.

column2: >20$ - EARLY BIRD, get a .voymigo umbrella. Only 100 available.

column1: 35$ - .voymigo umbrella and personalised t-shirt! Only 75 available.
100$ - Big Pack. Get a pack of 5 umbrellas! Only 20 available.
Thank You for supporting our campaign - it means a lot to us! Spread the word about .voymigo with the world, join the movement and lets build tomorrows traveling society together!

Your contribution will show us that our work is supported and that this world needs a more eco-friendly, adventurous and exiting way of travelling. By joining this campaign You join a movement towards a community of travellers that shape their own adventures and in the mean time - the world.
Life is beautiful and as Chinese says : ""Every great journey begins with a single step"". Make that step!

The biggest challenge is that we might fail to make everything on time. It all depends on various factors - manufacturers, shipping, our work. We will make our best to make everything on time and keep You in track of all the updates related to the process.

If anything will come up with the white-board material appliance, we will use the extra funds to get more hands to help us. We will everything that we can to make sure You get Your umbrella on time and start Your dream adventure ASAP!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word and share this campaign with Your folks! Use Indiegogo sharing tools, also go to www.voymigo.com and write down the story of Your adventure!
Feel free to contact us, share Your opinion and give suggestions!

Glasses with side-shields are my passion.  I have one successful crowdfund under my belt and two years of production.  Over 5,000 pair of Sterling 23 and Eagle 48s have been delivered.  Those are the two lines I started after the last Indiegogo campaign.   It is now time to produce the Sphere.  The Spheres are a full .25 inches wider than the 23s with 50mm round lenses.
The Spheres measure in at 5.3 inches across from outside temple hinge.

The Sphere has gone through rigorous testing to ensure that the final product is something I can be proud of.  The Rivets are strong and work beautifully with the Stainless Steel Wire Frames and the Mesh Stainless Side-Shields.
The Sterling Spheres are a bold statement of style and look great on both men and women.
The Sphere will be offered in 6 colors using UV 400 Polarized Polycarbonate Lenses.
The Colors offered will be the classic Gray, Green and Amber
The reflective revo colors will be Blue, Black/Red and Silver

I have already invested in the molds and manufacture of the prototypes.  Now it is time to place the first order.  I have returned to the domain of crowdfunding as it is an efficient way to introduce my product to a mass audience of people with the same interest in these types of glasses and it affords me the opportunity to raise capital an pay for the initial order of the Sterling Spheres.

I have already been through this process with over 1400 backers two years ago, and it is through them that I have been able to continue the business I have today.  I am excited to be launching another Indiegogo Campaign.  It is the vision of the backers that helped me achieve my goal before.  My original crowdfund campaign 2 years ago funded over 800% and set me on the path I am on now.  I faced a lot of pitfalls, and a lot of success in the previous campaign.

‘I have been looking forward to getting my glasses and I wasn't disappointed. These glasses are exactly what I expected and are of an excellent quality. I recommend them to anyone who loves the look of them. Do yourself a favour and get two pair. I just love them. Big thumbs up.” - Kris
‘The build quality and look of these sunglasses is excellent.” - Steve Gregory

“U can't expect more than these pair, I got the sport version in silver/mirror. All the people i've crossed in the street/friends have stop me and ask me where did i get them? They look so cool and so unique. Thanks to the creator honestly, this guy deserves a lot of credit to have the balls to finally made a pair of sunglasses that are so different than the regular/fancy and traditional ones.” - Felipe

The main risk is delay I found this out the hard way last time assuming my production run would be done 30 days after the end of the crowdfund campaign.  This campaign I have allowed for delays and have estimated a January Delivery.  That said if they come in sooner I will be able to ship as soon as I have them
If this is not something you can Back now but look forward to in the future, perhaps you can share within your social group.

Glasses with side-shields are my passion.  I have one successful crowdfund under my belt and two years of production.  Over 5,000 pair of Sterling 23 and Eagle 48s have been delivered.  Those are the two lines I started after the last Indiegogo campaign.   It is now time to produce the Sphere.  The Spheres are a full .25 inches wider than the 23s with 50mm round lenses.
The Spheres measure in at 5.3 inches across from outside temple hinge.

The Sphere has gone through rigorous testing to ensure that the final product is something I can be proud of.  The Rivets are strong and work beautifully with the Stainless Steel Wire Frames and the Mesh Stainless Side-Shields.
The Sterling Spheres are a bold statement of style and look great on both men and women.
The Sphere will be offered in 6 colors using UV 400 Polarized Polycarbonate Lenses.
The Colors offered will be the classic Gray, Green and Amber
The reflective revo colors will be Blue, Black/Red and Silver
Prototypes are Done Now the Order

I have already invested in the molds and manufacture of the prototypes.  Now it is time to place the first order.  I have returned to the domain of crowdfunding as it is an efficient way to introduce my product to a mass audience of people with the same interest in these types of glasses and it affords me the opportunity to raise capital an pay for the initial order of the Sterling Spheres.

I have already been through this process with over 1400 backers two years ago, and it is through them that I have been able to continue the business I have today.  I am excited to be launching another Indiegogo Campaign.  It is the vision of the backers that helped me achieve my goal before.  My original crowdfund campaign 2 years ago funded over 800% and set me on the path I am on now.  I faced a lot of pitfalls, and a lot of success in the previous campaign.

Le Projet / The Project

Nous sommes B.EASE, une marque qui promet de travailler avec vous pour développer nos chaussures de basket et du textile qui répondent à vos attentes de confort, d'amorti et de protection de la cheville.

Ensemble, nous développerons des produits qui garantissent un rapport qualité-prix et un style! Nous sommes B.EASE
column2:
vous êtes B.EASE!

We are B.EASE, a brand that promises to work with you to develop basketball shoes and textiles that meet your expectations of comfort, cushioning and ankle protection. 

Together, we will develop products that guarantee value for money and style!

We are B.EASE
column3:
you are B.EASE!

Le 1er design B EASE / The 1st design B EASE

 

Notre Promesse / Our Promise

column1:
ETRE PARTICIPATIVE :   Avec les joueurs (euses) de Basketball : pour échanger sur les produits et leurs attentes  Avec les spécialistes de la santé : pour développer des chaussures réduisant les traumatismes   

ASSURER STYLE, CONFORT ET PRIX :  Etre sobre tout en assurant son style Ne proposer que des produits assurant votre confort   Positionnement prix au plus juste.

We care: We develop all our products in collaboration with players and health specialists to create shoes that reduce trauma. 

We ensure style, comfort, and fair prices
column2:
we only produce top quality, stylish apparel that guarantee your comfort, while pricing them fairly.

 

La Chaussure / The shoes :  Iron Feet

Conçu en collaboration avec les joueurs, nous avons développé notre modèle Iron Feet pour être confortable, stable, bien rembourré et léger avec un design élégant.

Pour assurer la meilleure qualité, nous avons:

- Collaboré avec un consultant ayant une forte expérience dans le domaine des chaussures de sport, qui nous a accompagné dans le choix des matériaux et s'est associé à l'usine qui produit pour les plus grandes marques.

- Fait testés nos chaussures par les joueurs qui ont corrigé et validé la qualité de nos chaussures !

Designed in collaboration with players, we have developed our Iron Feet model to be comfortable, stable, well-cushioned, and lightweight with a sleek design.​

 

To ensure the best quality, we have:

- Collaborated with a consultant with strong experience in the field of sports shoes, who accompanied us in the choice of materials and teamed-up with the factory that produces for the biggest brands.

- Have our shoes tested thoroughly by the players who corrected and validated the quality of our shoes!

Conçu en collaboration avec des joueurs, nous avons développer ce modèle pour être confortable, stable, amortissant et léger avec un design épuré.  

Designed in collaboration with players, we have developed our Iron Feet model to be comfortable, stable, well-cushioned, and lightweight with a sleek design.

Tige : synthétique sur l’arrière pour maintenir la cheville stable. Mesh et thermocollé à l’avant pour la ventilation du pied. Chausson intérieur pour plus de confort.  

Upper: Synthetic back to keep the ankle stable. Mesh and heat-sealed front for improved ventilation. Inner liner for comfort.

Semelle intermédiaire : Notre I-Foam est un EVA modifié 30% plus léger qu’un EVA traditionnel et permettant d’avoir un amorti et dynamisme plus intéressant.  

Midsole: Our I-Foam is a modified EVA 30% lighter than the traditional EVA and allows for more interesting cushioning and dynamism.

Semelle extérieure : éléments en chevrons pour l’adhérence, zone de flexion pour le déroulé du pied et point de pivot pour assurer la rotation du pied

Outer-sole: herringbone elements for grip, flex zone for unwinding of the foot and pivot point for foot rotation

 

Avis sur notre modèle et sur notre projet / Opinion on our model and our project

column1: Grille des pointures unisexe / Size chart unisex

Utilisez votre pointure habituelle ou mesurez votre pied et ajouter 1 cm.

Use your usual size or measure your foot and add 1 cm.
Vu dans la presse / As Seen On​
Notre équipe / Our team

Nous avons choisi Indiegogo pour vous éviter toutes inquiétudes. Si notre objectif de 4 200 $ n'est pas atteint, le projet n'est pas remis en cause car nous avons serons livré en juillet sur les pointures 35 à 46.

Que faire si j'ai commandé la mauvaise pointure? Il suffit de nous le renvoyer et nous l'échangerons. En tant que start-up, nous devrons vous facturer les frais de port. Mais ne paniquez pas, nous vous aiderons à la fin de la campagne pour vous assurer de recevoir la bonne taille.

Even when this campaign does not reach its goal, we will receive our first batch size 35 - 46. B.EASE will be in the market July 2018.

What if I ordered the wrong shoe size? Just send it back to us and we will exchange it. Being a start-up we will have to charge you the shipping costs. But do not panic, we will assist you at the end of the campaign to make sure you receive the right size.

Objectif de la campagne / Purpose of the campaign

Notre modèle Iron Feet est en cours de production après avoir été testé, maltraité et torturé par nos testeurs. nous serons sur place dans l'usine pour s'assurer de la qualité des produits.

La commercialisation se fera juillet 2018 avec des pointures allant du 35 au 46. Pour améliorer l'expérience de tous les joueurs, nous utiliserons cette campagne pour nous permettre d'acheter des moules supplémentaires et aller jusqu'au 50 pour la prochaine production.

Our Iron Feet model is in production after being tested, abused and tortured by our testers. We will be on-site in the factory to ensure the quality of the products. We will go to market in July 2018 with sizes ranging from 35 to 46. To reach more players, we have launched this campaign to raise funds to buy additional molds so we can reach sizes up to 50 for the next production.​

 

Vous aimez ou vous n'aimez pas notre projet ? Do you like or do not like our project?

Etant collaboratif, nous souhaitons échanger avec vous pour avancer et nous améliorer. N'hésitez pas à nous laisser un commentaire pour nous soutenir ou pour nous faire par de vos améliorations !

Being collaborative, we wish to exchange with you to advance and improve. Feel free to leave us a comment to support us or to make us by your improvements!

 

Nous suivre / Follow us

Comment pouvons nous être sûr de la qualité de la chaussure / How do you guarantee the best quality?

Nous avons travaillé avec un spécialiste de l'industrie de la chaussure de sport et avons sélectionné une usine travaillant pour les plus grandes marques. Nous avons fait testé notre modèle par différents joueurs et joueuses et nous ne fournissons que la meilleure qualité, à un prix très abordable

We worked with a specialist in the sports shoe industry and selected a factory working for the biggest brands. We had our model tested by different players, and only deliver top quality, at a very affordable price.​

 

Comment participer au projet B.EASE / How to participate in the B.EASE project ?

En soutenant cette campagne, et en plaçant une pré-commande. Nous sommes ouverts à l'échange d'idées et à vos opinions sur notre projet et nos produits.

By supporting this campaign, and placing a pre-order. We are open to exchange ideas and hear your opinions on both our project and products.​

 

Quand est-ce que je choisis ma pointure / When do I choose my size ?

A la fin de la campagne et si nous avons atteint l'objectif, nous vous enverrons un questionnaire pour avoir vos coordonnées et votre pointure.

At the end of the campaign and if we have reached the goal, we will send you a questionnaire to have your coordinates and your shoe size.​

Sustainability

At Boundary, we are committed to manufacturing products using a low impact supply chain. Bluesign® fabrics, mills, and factories come together to reduce the environmental impact of our entire supply chain. The Bluesign® system ensures factories operate more efficiently, which reduces overall water, energy and chemical use.

These approved factories must meet stringent set of standards for pollution control and also follow the world’s strictest chemical safety requirements for textiles and manufacturing. Through this certified supply chain we can help shift the traditional paradigm. Our sustainable mission does not stop with the fabrics, we have committed to using recycled paper products and compostable plant based plastics in our packaging.

Help yourself or a loved one save time, eliminate frustration and restore self-confidence.

After witnessing the tragic effects of Parkinson’s disease on my stepfather, I was inspired to invent “Buttons 2 Button”, an innovative system to retrofit buttons on your shirt into magnetic closures. Adapters are sold in sets of 10. Attach to your shirt in minutes and make dressing and undressing easy.

column2: >Our mission is to restore independence, time and dignity.
>We are taking  pre-orders to raise capital upfront to purchase inventory.
>To show our appreciation we will give you an exclusive, limited time offer. ORDER NOW and get $5 off 1 set or 20% 10 sets! All orders will be fulfilled by December 2019 or your money returned.
>Paying-it forward. Select your charity at check out. $1/order to research cures.
>Uncomfortable or having issues backing? We take checks! Make payable to Wareologie and mail to 37637 Five Mile Rd. #116, Livonia, MI 48154. THANK YOU!

column1: Many illnesses, such as arthritis, a stroke, or MS, result in hand dexterity limitations. Your support makes an IMPACT!  We have a social mission to help find cures for the people our products serve. We donate $1 per order to the foundation of your choice. This month we are ""paying-it-forward"" to these 3 foundations:

Just like people, not all buttons are made equal. Our first Magnetic Adapters fit average size buttons. Simply download our fit chart and match-up your button to confirm they will fit. We will expand to Small and XL Adapters in the near future. Also, magnets are not toys and can be dangerous if not used as intended. Please don’t eat buttons or use if you have a heart pace monitor.

You Can Help

Your pledge makes a triple your impact
• Help restore independence (for you or a loved one).
• Pay-it-forward! $1 of every pledge will be donated to the foundation of your choice.
• Help us! Cover the costs for your order upfront so we can launch the company.

Thank you for your support and helping restore dignity one button at a time!

Help yourself or a loved one save time, eliminate frustration and restore self-confidence.

After witnessing the tragic effects of Parkinson’s disease on my stepfather, I was inspired to invent “Buttons 2 Button”, an innovative system to retrofit buttons on your shirt into magnetic closures. Adapters are sold in sets of 10. Attach to your shirt in minutes and make dressing and undressing easy.
Our mission is to restore independence, time and dignity.
What We Need & What You Get
We are taking  pre-orders to raise capital upfront to purchase inventory.
To show our appreciation we will give you an exclusive, limited time offer. ORDER NOW and get $5 off 1 set or 20% 10 sets! All orders will be fulfilled by December 2019 or your money returned.

Customize With Notifications  

mim X can help with vibrating notifications, messages and alerts, so you will never miss any important events. The messages will also display on the TLD, you won’t even have to take out your phone.
column8:
>

Users will be able to easily select the notifications they want to show on mim X. Users will be able to easily select the notifications they want to show on mim X.
column11:
>

Taking advantage of the TLD technology, mim X can show two time zones independently. One is shown on the display and the other is shown with the hands. mim X can also detect the current time zone, and will automatically start time adjustment. You will be able to select either the display or the hands to commence auto time sync.
column12: >
column13:
>Precisely monitor your cardiac frequency while exercising or at rest

Despite having the look of a traditional analog watch, mim X has all the features you can expect from a modern smartwatch. For starter, mim X carries a heart rate monitor (HRM), which can measures your heart rate throughout the day, no matter you are working out or just seating still. Combining with the step counter and other sensors, mim X can do much more. From counting how much steps you take in a day, to notifying you for sitting too much. Our app can also integrate with Apple Health, so you can store all your health data in one place.
column19: >
column20: >
column21: >
column23:
>

mim X incorporates the patented* Transparent Levitation Display (TLD). 

When switched on, information is shown on the glass without being obscured by the watch arms. And when not in use, it becomes completely transparent. You can also clearly see the display at outdoor occasions or under strong light. It is also considerably more battery efficient then traditional displays. *Patent pending
column24: >
column26: >
column28: >
column29:
>ASH02 - Active, Black, Stealth

We are the mim Watches team, a group of dreamers on a mission to create the perfect smartwatch, a timepiece that offers all modern smart functions without compromising the simple, minimalist beauty of analog watches. Our design is a fusion of elegance and smart technology. We are proud to share our groundbreaking new product - mim X.
column32:
>

Unlike others attempting to solve the issue by compromising on design and function, we have designed a truly transparent display on top of the dial. All the information will be shown on top of the dial, and the display will turn completely invisible when it’s not in use.

column40:
>

We take design inspiration from Bolivia’s famous landmark Salar de Uyuni. It is considered as one of the most remarkable vistas on Earth. At certain times of the year, it transforms into a stunning canvas that perfectly reflects the clouds and the blue altiplano sky. 

Inspired by the fascinating characteristics of the lake, we came up with the idea of a smartwatch with a display that only appears when needed. mim X also has a minimalist stainless steel bezel that blends in with the unmarked watch face seamlessly, like the horizon disappears at Salar de Uyuni.
column41: >
column44:
>

mim X comes with two finishing, Steel and Stealth. Both finished in surgical-grade stainless steel, providing great dirt and scratch resistance for everyday use. We also offer a variety of band collections to suit your mood.
column45:
>

mim X - Active 

The Active straps are made of rugged Thermoplastic polyurethane(TPU). TPU is tougher than both silicone and rubber and is also highly resistant to chemical and temperature changes, the material is durable and highly breathable. That's why the Active strap is the best choice for all conditions.

column1: For manufacturing, we have partnered with some of the best in the industry. Our partners have great experience and technology from producing luxury watches for leading brands. The case of mim X is precisely milled from solid surgical grade stainless steel using diamond cutters. A fine brush-polish finishing ensures the perfect enduring reflection. Then it is treated with nano protective coat for extra protection.
A video showing mim X under water pressure test.
A video showing an engineer assembling mim X.

column2: >

column1: mim X innovation revolves around multi-layer technology combining the unique transparent levitation display (TLD) and mechanical hands.
Our movement contains a digital step motor, it receives impulse signal from the chipset, which allows mim X to auto-sync with your phone or to adjust the time with the buttons.
We pay attention to every detail while designing mim X. Every bezel and case of mim X are using sleek 316L Stainless steel with two different finishing, brushed for Steel and PVD for Stealth.

mim is based in Hong Kong and was established by Swedish designer Arvid Lindberg in 2016. Our mission is to create the perfect smartwatch that features all modern smart functions without compromising the simple, minimalist beauty of traditional watches. Inspired by the Salar de Uyuni of Bolivia, we are proud to release our game-changing new product - mim X.

Warranty mim X offer a 3-year limited warranty on all watches which covers movement manufacturing defects. The warranty does not cover damages that may occur from wear and tear and everyday use, nor does it cover the life of the battery within. For more information, please visit www.mimwatches.com.

","Customize With Notifications  mim X can help with vibrating notifications, messages and alerts, so you will never miss any important events. The messages will also display on the TLD, you won’t even have to take out your phone.Users will be able to easily select the notifications they want to show on mim X. Users will be able to easily select the notifications they want to show on mim X. Taking advantage of the TLD technology, mim X can show two time zones independently. One is shown on the display and the other is shown with the hands. mim X can also detect the current time zone, and will automatically start time adjustment. You will be able to select either the display or the hands to commence auto time sync. Precisely monitor your cardiac frequency while exercising or at restDespite having the look of a traditional analog watch, mim X has all the features you can expect from a modern smartwatch. For starter, mim X carries a heart rate monitor (HRM), which can measures your heart rate throughout the day, no matter you are working out or just seating still. Combining with the step counter and other sensors, mim X can do much more. From counting how much steps you take in a day, to notifying you for sitting too much. Our app can also integrate with Apple Health, so you can store all your health data in one place.                                                        mim X incorporates the patented* Transparent Levitation Display (TLD). When switched on, information is shown on the glass without being obscured by the watch arms. And when not in use, it becomes completely transparent. You can also clearly see the display at outdoor occasions or under strong light. It is also considerably more battery efficient then traditional displays. *Patent pendingMSL01 - Modern, Silver, SteelCSH02 - Classic, Brown, StealthASH02 - Active, Black, StealthWe are the mim Watches team, a group of dreamers on a mission to create the perfect smartwatch, a timepiece that offers all modern smart functions without compromising the simple, minimalist beauty of analog watches. Our design is a fusion of elegance and smart technology. We are proud to share our groundbreaking new product - mim X. Unlike others attempting to solve the issue by compromising on design and function, we have designed a truly transparent display on top of the dial. All the information will be shown on top of the dial, and the display will turn completely invisible when it’s not in use.                                                                                          We take design inspiration from Bolivia’s famous landmark Salar de Uyuni. It is considered as one of the most remarkable vistas on Earth. At certain times of the year, it transforms into a stunning canvas that perfectly reflects the clouds and the blue altiplano sky. Inspired by the fascinating characteristics of the lake, we came up with the idea of a smartwatch with a display that only appears when needed. mim X also has a minimalist stainless steel bezel that blends in with the unmarked watch face seamlessly, like the horizon disappears at Salar de Uyuni.Salar de Uyunimim X comes with two finishing, Steel and Stealth. Both finished in surgical-grade stainless steel, providing great dirt and scratch resistance for everyday use. We also offer a variety of band collections to suit your mood. mim X - Active The Active straps are made of rugged Thermoplastic polyurethane(TPU). TPU is tougher than both silicone and rubber and is also highly resistant to chemical and temperature changes, the material is durable and highly breathable. That's why the Active strap is the best choice for all conditions.mim X - Classic The Classic strap is designed to give you the timeless look. With the finest Italian leather, the mim X Classic band will patina over time, creating a unique and yet handsome look.mim X - Modern The Modern bracelet is crafted from surgical grade 316L Stainless Steel with an elegantly brushed finish, the mim X Modern collection is the designed for the modern hustler.                                                                                         mim X Leather Roll  Add US$29 (HK$226) to any reward to get a leather roll bespoke for your mim X.
mim X Leather Roll can protect your mim X and carry more than one watch, charging dock, wires and etc.
The packaging has been very carefully designed with little details like magnetic closure on the box.
Magnetic Wireless Charging Dock come with each mim X

mim X’s app were designed specifically for optimal smartwatch functionality. Our app is also compatible with both iOS and Android devices, we got you all covered. Here are some of our features: Heart rate monitor, step monitor, sleep monitor, seat notification, sedentariness alert, find my device.

Currently fulfilling the original Kickstarter and follow-on Indiegogo campaign pledges. Once fulfilled In-Demand orders will resume being taken.
We created BeClothed because we wanted to create products that are comfortable, look great and are better for the environment.

We believe it is our mission to reinvent the relationship you have with your everyday wear. We do this by making clothing that is not only good for you but for the world too. Our clothes are designed to eliminate odour, thereby requiring you to wash them less often, leading to less wasted water, energy and wear on your clothes.

Born out the frustration that our clothes would never be the way we wanted, we set out to disrupt an outdated industry which is focused on planned obsolescence, the practice of intentionally and artificially limiting the useful life of a product for the purpose of driving more sales, something we're completely against.

We’re dedicated to crafting high-quality timeless products designed to last (and, hence, reduce waste). Our products are made from some of the best materials and are intentionally designed to last for years.
<div data-alt-text=""Comments on the SilverSocks"" data-caption=""Comments on the SilverSocks"" data-id=""26104077""><figure style=""margin: 0px
<div data-alt-text=""Some people who've written about us"" data-caption=""Some people who've written about us"" data-id=""26104806""><figure style=""margin: 0px
column2: >

column1: The Cotton is intertwined with threads of our patented Silver fibers that weave in and out to ensure full coverage.

When any part of the Silver touches a bacterial cell, it breaks down its cell wall until the bacteria is no longer able to function, effectively rendering it inactive and unable to produce the pungent smell that comes when it feeds on your sweat.

Our patented Silver fibers are made from a specialist design allowing them to be woven directly into the fabric. During manufacture, the Cotton fibers are intertwined with our patented Silver fibers to ensure each and every surface is covered.
The three pillars of everything we make are underscored by comfort, hygiene and versatility. We believe that every single thing you wear should be the best version that exists.

Our main focus above all is comfort, because who's going to wear something that doesn't feel great? We try our hardest to give your clothes that extra cosy feel. You can see everything we use in our garments below.

Hygiene is the second of our pillars which is a huge part of our culture as many clothes get smelly very easily and need washing after every single wear which ultimately leads to degradation. Our garments don't smell for up to seven days, so you can pack light on that weekend away and come back wearing the clothes you went in (so you've got plenty of space for presents).

Last but by no means the least, versatility. We believe everything you buy should withstand everything you do, so whether you're at work, at the gym or even on a hike, all our clothing is made to withstand any environment so you won't need any athletic or smart versions of your clothes to take up more room in your wardrobe.
Grown from a soft, fluffy boll that's cultivated all over the world -  and even on the far side of the moon, - cotton is by far one of the oldest and most widespread materials around.

Usually planted in the spring, it is a perennial that lives on year after year and keeps growing. With evidence of use in the old world before 5000 BC, it sits firmly near the top of the most resilient fabrics around.
Cotton is super lightweight and durable and as a result, is one of the best base materials there is. The soft-to-the-touch quality ensures comfort and cosiness with every wear.
With its roots in the neolithic period, cotton is a reliable, weather-proof insulator that's perfect at any moment and for every occasion.
The comfortable yet flexible stretch makes cotton the perfect fabric to use in all garments, along with its hypoallergenic properties that make it a flawless favourite.
With the prominently high tensile strength of the twill weave, it's able to withstand multiple washes without a problem.

We only source our cotton from organic crops which haven't been adulterated by genetic modification. This gives an experience as similar to the original cotton that we strive to implement. By cutting out the use of pesticides and other chemicals, we can ensure all our garments are held to a higher standard and free from allergens.

For our first major product launch, we chose Indiegogo as the community is both intrigued by new inventions and incredibly useful as a sounding board to help us understand if our ideas would work out.

We were picked up by many outlets in the wake of our launch that by the end of it all we had shipped over 10,000+ pairs of our SilverSocks No-Show across all our platforms. This gave us the green light that we were doing something that was in very high demand and we knew we couldn't stop there.

With our first product hitting shelves and our team working tirelessly to keep up with orders on our site, we were being asked by thousands of customers if we'd be able to make our socks in a longer crew version that they were more used to.

Even with the demand, we had to spend countless months perfecting every single aspect so as to ensure we'd release only the best version before launch day. Again, we were picked up by outlets across the globe and the SilverSocks Crew flew past its goal overnight. By the end of it all, we had shipped over 15,000+ pairs on all our platforms.
Right now, at this moment in time, we've sold over 50,000+ pairs to over 160+ countries across the world which is something we wouldn't ever have imagined.
It's all thanks to you, our supporters.
• Q: How do I care for my Underwear?

• A:* Wash in 30°C / 85°F 
    * Place in washing machine with like colors.
    * Do not use bleach or use fabric softeners.
    * Air drying is recommended. 
    * If climate is unsuitable for air drying, place on a clothes horse above radiator or in an airing cupboard.
• Q: Does the SilverUnderwear only come in Cotton and these colours?
• A: If the campaign does well, we’ll add more colours and/or materials if there is demand.
• Q: How much does shipping cost to my country?
• A: We offer Free Tracked Shipping across the world, wherever you are.
• Q: How do I choose my colour, size, style (mens/womens) and provide my shipping address?

• A: The BackerKit surveys will be sent out 14-16 days after the campaign ends.
            You'll receive them to your Indiegogo email - everything you need to give us will be provided in there.
• Q: How do I track my package?
• A: You will be emailed a link three days before it goes into the carrier's system which will let you track your package every step of the way.

• A: All our products come with a one year warranty, free of charge.
                This is in addition to your statutory consumer rights.
• I have another question you haven't answered here
• There are a bunch of ways to contact us to enquire or even make your thoughts known - you don't even need to back the project for some:
•  Indiegogo Comments: On the project page tab - you need to back to comment
•  Direct Email: shoot us an email at: support (at) beclothed (dot) com

column2: >

column1: In order to ensure total transparency, the samples used in the campaign are manufactured by the very same technique that your boxers will be.
We've been through many months of prototyping to test and refine every feature and we've finalised the entire production line, right through to the quality checking and shipping.
As this is our third Indiegogo campaign so we're well versed on the level of care that is needed to execute a campaign successfully.

Through our first and second campaigns for the SilverSocks No-Show (10,000+ pairs), SilverSocks Crew (15,000+ pairs) and our website, beclothed.com, we've now sold over 50,000 pairs of the SilverSocks.
We understand that crowdfunding campaigns can come with unexpected hiccups so we've prepared ourselves for every eventuality - including going over our goal (like we did the previous two times).
We have three backup manufacturers and packaging producers as well as two backup shippers so there is no doubt we will deliver on time.

It's imperative to us that we keep an open channel with our backers by conveying our thoughts to you every step of the way through Indiegogo comments and occasional updates to ensure you're always in the loop.
Currently fulfilling the original Kickstarter and follow-on Indiegogo campaign pledges. Once fulfilled In-Demand orders will resume being taken.

The average person spends 1/3 of life sleeping. 

We are all about optimizing that 1/3 of your life, through sleepwear. 

 

Bare slumber has taken on the mission to optimize sleepwear through 5 elements:

Thermoregulating Fabric: Our sleepwear fabric, called Tencel is made of nanofibers which essentially suck in the moisture around them - and they do so extremely well. 50% better than Cotton to be exact. Once the moisture is trapped within the nanofibers - it is released to the dryer microclimate away from your body. 

This whole process does a few things:
• It transports heat and sweat away from you, helping you stay cool
• Eliminates an environment for bacteria, fungi or bad odors to grow, keeping you clean

The result is sleepwear that is cooler than linen, and drier and more hygienic than cotton.

Luxuriously smooth and soft. The same nanofibers which keep you cool and dry also happen to be:

Thoughtful Design: Our sleep designs essentially come from you! We started out with surveying hundreds of sleepers, about design preferences - again and again. The top designs and features were analyzed by an expert apparel design team - which brought the designs to life with sleepwear prototypes. Next these first prototypes were sleep tested for comfort and functionality - we took the feedback back to our design team and made a second prototype run. 

We finally came up with designs that are not only functional but also look good. So good, that some of our testers wear them outside the bedroom. Bare Slumber sleepwear works seamlessly into your brunch schedule!

At the time of our launch, the design team is working on the third and final prototype run - for design perfection. 

Easy care.  Hand washing is time consuming, and dry cleaning is expensive. The inherent anti-bacterial and anti-odor properties of Bare Slumber sleepwear ensures that you'll wash them less frequently than other sleepwear - but when you do, it will be super simple. That's because you can machine wash, and tumble dry our sleepwear. It is extremely durable (the highest amongst all cellulose fibers), shrink resistant, quick drying, and wrinkles less that cotton.

Eco-friendly. Each bare slumber sleep item is made with the planet in mind. Our material is one of the most eco-friendly out there. The sleepwear is made from renewable Eucalyptus trees, farmed organically with natural rain water. The fiber processing uses 99% recycled solvents, and is done so in a 100% non-toxic, closed-loop processing plant which ensures no chemicals get into the atmosphere. The whole process uses 20 x less water used for Cotton production and emits 5x less carbon emissions than Polyester production. 

In addition, all our products are vegan and cruelty-free. No silkworms are hurt though the process of creating bare slumber products. We are stongly against animal testing!

Manufacturing is done in America!

Lowest possible customer pricing. Finally, your pledge will allow us to set-up shop online and sell direct to consumer, which means cutting out the middle man, unnecessary mark-ups and making the end product cheaper.

Every fabric color has a minimum order quantity. Our current funding goal supports one color - the light pink color shown in the video and images. Extra color options will be available if we reach our stretch goals. If we reach our 15k stretch goal or above, backers will receive an email survey - where they will vote on the colors they want. The most-voted colors will be available to choose from when choosing your sleepwear colors.

We have chosen our suppliers and manufacturers. We are ready to roll production, all we need is your support!

Follow us on social media: Like us on Instagram, Twitter, or follow us on Facebook for the latest updates and exclusive offers !

       

 

 

Risks and challenges

There is one final production revision to work out minor kinks in the sleepwear design which will enhance the final product. Colors might be slightly different depending on the device you're viewing the products on. 

We are confident you will receive your sleepwear in your hands by late June or early July. However, if there are issues at customs or shipping, then it's possible that you might receive your order a little later.

 

","The average person spends 1/3 of life sleeping. We are all about optimizing that 1/3 of your life, through sleepwear.  Bare slumber has taken on the mission to optimize sleepwear through 5 elements:Thermoregulating Fabric: Our sleepwear fabric, called Tencel is made of nanofibers which essentially suck in the moisture around them - and they do so extremely well. 50% better than Cotton to be exact. Once the moisture is trapped within the nanofibers - it is released to the dryer microclimate away from your body. This whole process does a few things:
It transports heat and sweat away from you, helping you stay cool
Eliminates an environment for bacteria, fungi or bad odors to grow, keeping you clean
The result is sleepwear that is cooler than linen, and drier and more hygienic than cotton.Luxuriously smooth and soft. The same nanofibers which keep you cool and dry also happen to be:

Thoughtful Design: Our sleep designs essentially come from you! We started out with surveying hundreds of sleepers, about design preferences - again and again. The top designs and features were analyzed by an expert apparel design team - which brought the designs to life with sleepwear prototypes. Next these first prototypes were sleep tested for comfort and functionality - we took the feedback back to our design team and made a second prototype run. We finally came up with designs that are not only functional but also look good. So good, that some of our testers wear them outside the bedroom. Bare Slumber sleepwear works seamlessly into your brunch schedule!At the time of our launch, the design team is working on the third and final prototype run - for design perfection. Easy care.  Hand washing is time consuming, and dry cleaning is expensive. We are two sisters that love when the clothing we own can serve multiple functions. It never made sense to us to wear ugly sneakers on the walk to work, then carry fancy but uncomfortable high heels to wear at the office. We feel burdened by the need to wear workout clothes to bike from place to place, and carry a change of clothes to look presentable when we arrive at our destinations. Why can’t one item do it all?

We desire clothing that will suit our active lifestyles, but also encompass the stylish way we present ourselves every day. With Amber coming from New York City and Beth from Denver, Colorado, we both desire attire that can transition easily between any kind of activity - from office hours to happy hour, from cycling on a bike to spinning on the dance floor.

We are creating The Bike Dress in order to: 
Support a way to live more simply with a dress that can be used for any type of activity. 
Create clothing in which any person can feel comfortable and confident.
Empower people to be more active throughout every facet of their lives, not just when wearing athletic gear.
Reduce the need for carrying a bag or purse, but still have the ability to carry the necessities in pockets.

We have completed our first round of prototypes, and need funding in order to complete the second round to be sure we’re creating exactly what we want to present to the world. We are creating three versions of The Bike Dress to suit different body types, as well as two types of fitted shorts to be worn underneath.
The funding will go towards paying for new prototypes, fabrics, and marketing. It will be the foundation we need to get our company off the ground so that we can begin to sell The Bike Dress online.
Although The Bike Dress began with the desire to merge fashion with function, it also stems from the desire to give power back to whoever wears it.

Problem: Jeans that come with fake pockets, or pockets sewn shut. Dresses without any pockets at all. 
Our Solution: Big deep pockets that zip shut to carry all belongings with ease. An additional hidden pocket for added safety and convenience.

Problem: Fashionable dresses that are restricting, made out of delicate, uncomfortable materials. 
Our Solution: Fashionable dresses made out of breathable, wicking fabric, forgiving materials that are easy to wash and wear over and over again, and flexible components that allow for movement.

Problem: Lack of confidence with dresses that ride or fly up. 
Our Solution: A weighted hem that stays in place. “Safety” shorts that come with each dress to wear underneath.
We want to keep The Bike Dress affordable and accessible to all, but also keep the materials sustainable and coming from responsible sources.

Beth has over 15 years of experience in marketing, advertising, and design, and will take the lead on these aspects. Amber has 12 years of experience in project management, research, and planning. We are determined, hardworking, and passionate, all which will fuel the success of this endeavor.
If you can’t contribute financially there are other ways:
Share this page on Facebook, or with your email contacts.
• Brag about The Bike Dress to all your friends, and tag us on Instagram &
Take our survey to help us better plan ahead.

Who is Staci Sherri? 

""Staci"" is young, fun and flirty, and ""Sherri"" is grown, sexy and sophisticated. Together they make the ready-to-wear fashion brand Staci Sherri.

The brand's designs integrate feminine prowess with sleek, contemporary styles for fearless women who're unwilling to compromise on quality. The designs celebrate the feminine form with sexy silhouettes and delicate accents.

Staci Sherri, the brand's founder and creative director, creates collections inspired by the unforgettable moments of daily life and love (the universal connector). This imaginative and forward-thinking designer is best known for her uncanny ability to identify trends before they reach mass appeal. Her designs incorporate vivid expression, intricate details, lines tailored to accentuate natural beauty and remarkable functionality.

While Staci Sherri has caught the attention of stylists, celebrities and industry tastemakers, the brand has outgrown its humble beginnings and seeks to expand its production to meet the growing demand. We need your help to undergo the next phase in Staci Sherri’s growth.

Staci Sherri has a three-fold mission: (1) to build a national brand of high-quality apparel for the fashionably conscious contemporary consumer that accentuates natural beauty and stirs innate curiosity
column2: (2) to support economic resurgence and sustainable manufacturing in the United States by solely partnering with domestic companies
column3: and (3) to represent and infuse messages that empower, inspire and encourage our consumers to advance themselves in a positive direction.

column1: The Staci Sherri consumer is ambitious, fearless and on a journey of self-discovery. Our target market is contemporary women, ages 18 to 40, with an urban chic sensibility. With women accounting for 85% of all consumer purchases in the U.S., your pledges will help us reach one the nation's largest markets.

We're hoping to raise as much money as possible. Any money we raise beyond our target goal will go towards completing additional collections, as well as help with overhead costs, compensating the great team of people working on this project and the continuation of a developing brand.

$10,000 is our target goal and will be enough to start and produce small minimums in production, create a collection look book and line sheet, and produce production samples for showrooms and sales representatives. If we raise more than $10,000, we'll be able to produce additional seasons, show in New York Fashion Week, market the brand and advertise at trade shows.
It's your turn to stand out in Staci Sherri, and help us get our message out.

$20,000 - Will support Staci Sherri's debut for Spring/Summer 2015 collection in New York Fashion Week. The funds will also help produce the brand’s Spring/Summer 2015 NYFW runway show, look book, line sheets, and production samples for showrooms and sales representatives.

$30,000 - Will help relaunch Staci Sherri’s website and showroom to reflect the current state of the brand. Fifty of the top elite fashion insiders and celebrities will be invited to the showroom launch, along with buyers, investors and press. Event attendees will get the opportunity to enjoy drinks and food, while viewing Staci Sherri’s latest collection. Media outlets will be on-site to interview Staci and broadcast from the grand opening of the showroom.

$40,000 - Will help us exhibit in various trade and market shows in 2015. This will be great exposure for the brand and will put our message in front of millions of consumers. Buyers from all over will be able to buy the latest collection, and event exposure will take the brand to greater heights.

$50,000 - With everyone's help we can continue the growth of Staci Sherri. If we raise more than our goal, we'll be able to produce an additional collection for Fall/Winter 2016, including a runway show in New York Fashion Week, look book, line sheet, production samples for showrooms and sales representatives, marketing and branding campaigns, and department store placement.
Staci Sherri Signature “Just Like Me” Women's V-neck Tee

But our goal isn’t to sell the most belts – it’s to sell the best.  Introducing the  >

Why’s all this such a big deal? Because throughout the day as you work, walk, eat, sleep and play, your waist size fluctuates - in a little – or out a little in small increments. That’s why traditional belts with 5 holes don’t work. The holes are spaced too far apart. They never seem to match your waist.
