column2: >***UPDATES 10/26/2013 -- a blog about SOULbags from a good friend of SOUL:
column3: font-family: 'lucida grande', tahoma, verdana, arial, sans-serif

column1: I was in a abusive relationship for 9 years. I started SOUL: Supporters Of Unfettered Love, because I felt soulless, helpless, and loveless during and following those years. I thought my life was over-I was doomed to be miserable because something was ""wrong with me"" -- I was broken and I would never be ""fixed"". I thought what I was experiencing was because ""relationships are hard"" as everyone says -- I didn't know they were not supposed to be this hard.
is to turn something awful into something right and good
column2: I was a victim but I don't have to stay a victim. And neither do you. Nor do any of your friends, relatives, or significant others.  I began SOUL because something needed to be done about the overload of abuse occurring in society. Souls need help now-- souls need to see the light out of the darkness that abuse creates when authentic love does not exist or has been corrupted inside a relationship. I want people to experience healing as I have.  My healing came through the loving relationships of my counselor, my family, my friends. We need each other desperately in order to heal our souls.

column1: I believe that in order for one to understand whether to ""stay or go"" in a relationship, the number 1 priority is to get well individually. This means any obstacles to receiving personal treatment and help must be overcome-- leaving no excuses for getting well. There was a time when my job income went 95% for my own treatment, but this left nothing to make for a solid financial future. I felt disempowered financially which worsened my symptoms...which increased my need for counseling.... :) I started SOUL to help myself get the treatment I needed and to also help others get the treatment needed to get well, which is essentially ""finding oneself"".

While abuse was going on in my most significant relationship, I was also a licensed associate marriage and family therapist. As the fog from abuse was slowly lifted from my own eyes and as my brain-washed mind began to think for itself again, I found myself empathizing incredibly with the women I worked with
column2: some amazing healing was happening for the women because they said I understood and ""got it"" even though my story was not revealed to them (after all counseling is about my clients, not me). Like my own experience, the financial power to continue paying for counseling was being withheld from my clients by a controlling partner. I saw it right to begin discounting or offering counseling services for free until a woman became well enough to stand on her own. I found out quickly that while this approach was working for my clients, this discounted approach for my own profession was not a sustainable one.

column1: I decided that SOUL would be a for-profit social enterprise because I needed to find a creative way as a relationship therapist to keep offering free or discounted counseling to women coming from abusive relationships while not going under financially myself. I knew I needed to sell a product that could be profitable enough to to be both sustainable from a business model perspective and generous to the cause of helping myself and others get well and rise above abuse.

since childhood lead me to creating fashion bags as the product (that's me above ""Kelli going shopping with her bags""). SOUL has become an unimaginable blend of my personal relationship journey with my creative side. The mission mirrors my life mission: to help women (and men) coming from abusive relationships get well and experience true love and intimacy. The design aspects of the bags reflect my true self: my creative side which had hibernated during my abusive relationship. By using repurposed or recycled materials in the bags, they also symbolize my transformation of feeling permanently broken without purpose to having new life and a reason for existance. Additionally, I could use the slogan ""Carry Each Other"" to define the mission of needing each other to heal in simple terms while having the double-meaning with bags, or carrying items as the product. :) Hense the combination of my soul and other's souls with proceeds of bags helping souls get well

Pictured above are the original logo and the bags used for a ""trial run"" of the SOULbags. These functional and creative carrying items are made by a fair trade organization in Cambodia using repurposed industrial netting.  Additionally, the organization employs about 70 mostly 20-30 year old women who were referred by non-profits that assisted women in getting out of exploitative circumstances.  I loved integrating these concepts in the very making of the bags,  so I decided to learn the bag industry using these pre-designed great bags before delving into using my own designs. You can get the last of the trial-run line as a perk in this campaign (pictured below)!

column2: >Now I'm ready to take SOUL to the next level with you.

column1: I need your support in order to bring designs that are 100% mine to production and into your hands and those of many others. Your contributions will:

column2: >Spread awareness about abusive and destructive relationships while the proceeds from each SOULbag will let SOUL assist a woman coming from abusive relationships get counseling or healing help.

column1: *NOTE: Indiegogo takes 9% of total instead of 4% if the $9,034 goal is not reached--therefore, let's supersede the goal of course! Also, if we don't reach the goal, SOUL's progress in bringing out the new designs will be incredibly slowed down and funds would likely need to be borrowed (and I want to keep borrowed funds at a minimum).

Please feel free to email me with questions or requests for more information about SOUL's budget as well as how my personal budget is accommodating business growth: kelli@thesoulbag.com I'm happy to share!

In addition to being able to receive the last of the trial-run SOULbags in a color that was never available as a ""perk"" for your contribution (see ""teal tears"" picture above), here are some other very small thank you items for your priceless help and grassroots support:
Left  to right in picture below* - custom lapel pins with SOUL on it, not ""president's club"" :)  because there's a time to be classy or creative with it's use - everyone gets this
column2: unisex ""Healing Hoodies"" by American Apparel in Sea Blue or Steel
column4: custom SOUL flash-drives: 5' by 7' print of a painting by me with a favorite quote layered over it and the new SOUL logo (everyone gets this). And not pictured: SOUL decals
column5: dates socializing with me and SOUL volunteers... check them out in the right hand column! And more importantly - thank you. I can't explain to you how this changes my life so that together we can change others' lives for the better.

column1: * Note that all PERKS will have the new SOUL logo shown below at bottom left even though not shown here.

Don't forget to use Indiegogo Share Tools (located above the video at the top) to make some noise on social media! This is the #1 way you can help that doesn't require a financial donation! The more you post, the more Indiegogo will help promote the campaign!
Also -below are links to 6 different sites you can view about me and SOUL.

Let me know if you have: custom PERK ideas that I can add just for you, questions about the perks and generally something good to say! :) On behalf of SOUL and helping women, including myself, recover from abusive relationships and step into their dreams- thank you!

My name is Lenei and I am a Hawaiian artist and entrepreneur. I decided recently to create my own jewelry because I wanted to own the beautiful Tahitian, gold/silver, pearl, shell, and sea glass jewelry that I see for sale in my local stores, however I could not afford it. I thought it sad that so many Hawaiian products target purely tourists, as they are unattainable to Hawaiians and locals who have the highest cost of living coupled with the lowest average salary, as compared to the American states. Within the Hawaiian Islands, Hawaiian people contribute to the highest rates of depression, suicide, drug addiction, and imprisonment. I want to help evolve my culture by contributing to Hawaiian-owned and made businesses, co-ops, and shares. I plan to sell my jewelry pieces at a fraction of the comparable tourist-driven ones, as well as trade them for food, goods, and services, as Hawaiian tradition dictates.

I have named my company ""La‘anei,"" which means the sacred present (time) because it is important to me to uphold the sacred traditions of my kÅ«puna (ancestors), while evolving my culture and the Hawaiian people. I’ve also chosen a Hawaiian proverb, ""KÄhiko o na akua,"" which means the adornments of the gods because we should feel that we are blessed and adorned with godly/ancestral love each and every day.

I would like $10,000 in order to buy an inventory of jewelry supplies (Tahitian and fresh water pearls, gold, and silver wire, plus soldering and polishing supplies), as well as rent at various markets. Eventually I would like to have my jewelry in stores, and/or open my own Hawaiian-run store/co-op with locally grown and made products. Currently I have spent over $2,000 on equiptment, supplies, and classes to create the pieces you see in the pictures. I am running out of both inventory and money.
I will send you a handpicked shell or piece of sea glass, or freshwater pearl of your choice, either drilled or undrilled when you donate at least $25 to my start-up company.
When you donate at least $100, I will send you one hand-made shell, freshwater pearl, or sea glass silver or gold bangle of your choice.
When you donate $500 or more, you will receive 2 bangles of silver, gold, Tahitian or freshwater pearl, sea glass, or handpicked shell of your choice.

Donating to La‘anei allows a Hawaiian to go into business for herself, as well as provides locals and Hawaiians with the opportunity to have the same things offered to tourists at a fraction of the price. In the end, you are contributing to evolving a culture and allowing a minority group equal access in their own land.
Tell your friends and family about La'anei jewelry and laanei.com.

7 Premium Li-ion battery cells from Samsung add an extra 18200mAh to the battery life of your smartphone, tablet or digital camera. The Power Bank is capable of 12 full recharges for the Iphone 6.
Adopted USB smart-control chips and charging/discharging chips from Samsung
UP not only provides nine layers of circuit chip protection, but also enhances efficiency.
With a simple touch of the button,  LED indicators will tell you the battery status, so you can see how much power is stored in the wink of an eye.

Optimized charging/discharging efficiency up to 93% conversion rate%


World-class IC chips are not only safer, but improve charging conversion rate and stabilize discharging voltage with advanced resistance-capacitance sensors to optimize efficiency and durability.


Compatible with all popular smartphones.The charging port automatically adjusts the output.

Ultra Power - Power Bank automatically adjusts its output based on the connected device. It's compatible with smartphones and tablets from  Apple, Samsung, HTC, Google and BlackBerry as well as a variety of digital cameras and handheld gaming devices.


The Ultra Power  is crafted from high-grade ABS+PC and vanished with UV oil which gives the Ultra Power a smooth feel.  It houses an internal  7 high-capacity Samsung batteries  which provides 18200mAh to charge the average smartphone up to 12 times.

ALWAYS THERE WHEN YOU NEED IT! 

With a tap or a shake
column2:
the handle of the Ultra Power  doubles as a LED light which provides hours of light... Which can be used both indoor and outdoor. 

With this indispensable accessory, you can simply recharge your mobile device anywhere you go. In that way you can provide your smartphone, tablet, GPS, MP3 and other mobile devices with extra energy while you are on the go.

The Ultra Power  is ideal for business trips, holidays, emergencies,outdoor activities, or daily use. 

With this manageable mobile charger you are always equipped with a back-up battery whenever and wherever you need it!

column1:
TEAMS


Team MicroElements

MicroElements is a young 2-year-old technology company. We're a small team of friends with a mad set of skills ranging from engineering and programming to design and innovation. 

We started working together some years ago on several new concepts with the aim of creating innovative solutions that would make life easier for everyone who used them. We believe in innovation and breakthrough, and that every problem must have a solution.

Team Goingwin

Goingwin is an experienced international industrial design organization
column2:
it covers every part of industrial design with its professional services.  We specialize in consideration of design, modeling, material, technology and production. And we have a wealth of factory resources including prototyping, modeling, injection molding, metals and assembling. Our vertical integrate services can guarantee the implement of product design, which covers every part from primary design to mass production.

Funding Goal

column1: So today I'm reaching out through Indiegogo for backing in order to secure enough orders to go through a complete manufacturing cycle. The prototypes we've manufactured have provided proof of concept, and we're satisfied with the vendors that we've selected, but it's not until we've gone through a production run that we will know where product alterations, re-designs or vendor changes will need to take place.

We've already invested a substantial amount of our own money into the design and development process, including tooling, electrical engineering, mechanical engineering, and environmental testing and are nearly ready to begin production.
Ultimately your support will allow us to continue making game changing products that you probably want, so please support us, we won't let you down.
Your support will allow us to go through this necessary production curve and bring this product to market.  See below for more details on each product.

What's Next?


We’re now getting ready to start full production of the UP but we need your help to accomplish that. With the support from Indiegogo we'll be able to start our first full manufacturing run and we will start shipping them to you by December'

 We had to use ultra high density components and figure out ways to integrate everything to optimize the proportion.

Our team has a very strong background for design for manufacturing. We have the parts sourcing, manufacturing flow and testing procedures well defined. If the demand is high, we will be able to scale production and logistics accordingly.



Schedule 

Assuming we meet our funding goal, the anticipated timeline is as follows:


For full disclosure, this is a very aggressive timeline and we really can't have many things go wrong in order to get product out to our backers within this timeframe.  In fact, in order for us to make this schedule a reality, we're going to have to get a good sense that this project will fund by the end of September, late October.  

While we've stated February 2015 as the anticipated ship date for the product backer rewards, we are going to give it our best effort to fulfill rewards by mid December 2014.

I've learned that just because you can make it work on paper, doesn't mean it will work in reality :).  As much as we can control it, order fulfillment will be determined on a first come/first serve basis, so if getting product before Christmas is important to you, back us early and tell your friends!



ADD-ONs


BalanceBeam G2 - $8

2600mAh pocket size battery 
 Great for a quick charge. Free shipping to the continental US 
International Shipping please add $5 (if you already ordered and UltraPower G3 shipping is included)

","About UltraPower

column1: 7 Premium Li-ion battery cells from Samsung add an extra 18200mAh to the battery life of your smartphone, tablet or digital camera. The Power Bank is capable of 12 full recharges for the Iphone 6.
Adopted USB smart-control chips and charging/discharging chips from Samsung
UP not only provides nine layers of circuit chip protection, but also enhances efficiency.
With a simple touch of the button,  LED indicators will tell you the battery status, so you can see how much power is stored in the wink of an eye.

Optimized charging/discharging efficiency up to 93% conversion rate%World-class IC chips are not only safer, but improve charging conversion rate and stabilize discharging voltage with advanced resistance-capacitance sensors to optimize efficiency and durability.Compatible with all popular smartphones.The charging port automatically adjusts the output.Ultra Power - Power Bank automatically adjusts its output based on the connected device. It's compatible with smartphones and tablets from  Apple, Samsung, HTC, Google and BlackBerry as well as a variety of digital cameras and handheld gaming devices.The Ultra Power  is crafted from high-grade ABS+PC and vanished with UV oil which gives the Ultra Power a smooth feel.  It houses an internal  7 high-capacity Samsung batteries  which provides 18200mAh to charge the average smartphone up to 12 times.ALWAYS THERE WHEN YOU NEED IT! With a tap or a shake

Simple and minimalist design allows for maximum versatility. As the saying goes, less is more. This rings true for your everyday go-to watch.

With that in mind, we wanted to create a good looking watch, timeless in design and be counted on for every occasion. To withstand the daily hard knocks, its mechanism and build should be reliable and durable. We also wanted to make it affordable for everyone, unlike an expensive piece of jewellery that spends most of its days in a safe.

This ideal perfectly encapsulates our aspiration for the watches. We embedded this aesthetic ideal into the following design principles:
• Function - precise time keeping using time-tested technology and durable premium components
•  Usability - comfortable to wear and easy to use

Our design journey started from a blank slate. Only elements that served an essential function or aesthetic purpose were added. For example, we did not want the lugs typically used on watches. Instead, we hid the strap fastening mechanism behind the casing for a clean look. The design went through many reiterations and refinements, taking almost a year to arrive at its final form.

From here, we applied three colour variations to appeal to different looks:

  • A01 - Gunmetal casing, stainless steel face dial with black leather strap. A bold and monochromatic look. The actual second hand in the final product will be in medium grey color as shown for A01w below.
• A01w - Gunmetal casing, white face dial with black leather strap. A classic look and slight variation of face dial from A01

• A02 - Rose gold casing, white face dial with tan brown leather strap. A sophisticated and clean look.

Where a single weak link could compromise the overall integrity of a delicate machine such as a watch, it was crucial that we worked closely with the watch manufacturer to ensure that each chosen component was of an exceptionally high standard. As a result, the best quality materials comparable to high-end designer brands have been used, but without the high price tags. In keeping to our minimalist design, we've now created watches that not only look good, but are also affordable and able to withstand the rigor of everyday use.
• 316L stainless steel casing with PVD (Physical Vapour Deposition) coating
• Genuine calfskin leather strap with quick release pins

High quality Swiss quartz movement was selected for its accuracy and durability. This is encased in a surgical grade stainless steel casing that is not only strong but also resistant to rust and corrosion. The dial face is further protected by a flush mounted sapphire crystal glass, the second hardest material surpassed only by diamond, ensuring that the glass face doesn't scratch easily.

For maximum user comfort and style, genuine calfskin leather is used for the strap.  Finally, for quality assurance, each watch will be individually tested on the production floor for accuracy and water resistance.


Arising from backers' requests, we have introduced optional stainless steel mesh straps in matching rosegold and gunmetal colors. You can easily swap the straps with the quick release pins provided, allowing a new look with the watches. They are available to our backers at discounted prices for a limited time. http://www.ikistudio.net/#!strap-purchase/zwaoc

 

""The competition is fierce amongst new minimalistic designs and creating your own unique expression is hard, thus it's always impressive when a brand really succeeds!

There's a fantastic uniformity to this watch.  The cylindrical crown matches the clean cut case as well as the sharp angle created from the lug-less strap attachment. The small font of the indices matches the thin hands nicely, even the logo follows the same pattern! Love the sublime coloring of the seconds hand as well."" 

- Nouwatch on iKi model A02, May 2016
column3:
/>

Risks and Challenges

The last 12 months were spent refining our design and more recently, working with our manufacturer to finalise a realistic and achievable production schedule. We’ll now be monitoring the quality and timeline closely to ensure there are no unexpected surprises. Regular updates will be provided at specific milestones or if there should be any changes.

My name is Dan and I started Dynasty in 2010 to design unique, Asian inspired pieces to satisfy the urban, fashionable male demographic. Dynasty was created to represent Chinese and Asian culture. For our 2012 Collection, we're launching the first two rash guards for our Mixed Martial Arts / Brazilian Jiu Jitsu fans, but we need your help in order to make it a reality.

column2: Custom Designed Rash Guards for the Elite Athlete

column1: Are you tired of wearing the same rash guard every one else at the gym wears? Ones that fade out after a few washes? I know your pain because I am an athlete just like you and I wanted a great fitting, ink dye sublimated rash guard without compromising on style. Therefore I created my own rash guard designs to wear while tapping out fools on the mats! (Check out our designs below)

A rash guard is a form-fitting sports athletic shirt that is comprised of a polyester and spandex blend, worn during sports activities to wick away sweat, keeping the body cool, dry, and odour free, while tightening and supporting the muscles needed to perform at your best. It also prevents skin on skin contact in contact sports, preventing skin diseases and rashes. Our rash guard is geared towards mixed martial artists / Brazilian Jiu Jitsu practitioners, but can be worn by any athlete practicing any sport.

Armourtech will be manufacturing the rash guards. They are a UK-based sports apparel company (also known as Tatami Fightwear), and most recently they produced the very popular Honey Badger Rash Guard by Meerkatsu.

We need a small commitment from our fans who are interested in getting their hands on our one of a kind rash guards. We are launching the first two of our rash guard designs to garner initial interest. If it is successful we will launch more designs!

Bammy The Panda is Dynasty's official mascot. If you choose to contribute to our project for $5, you'll get 1 Bammy Sticker of your choice: ""H.A.M."", ""Army"", or ""Lover""! Waterproof vinyl, will last 18 months outdoors, printed in 3” x 4” window, including 3mm white padding around the edge.

Coral Dragon Saint Armor This rash guard was inspired by Dragon Shiryu from the 1980s Japanese anime ""Saint Seiya"", also known as ""Knights of the Zodiac"" in North America. It features Dragon Shiryu's all-piercing dragon fist on the right, the indestructible and impenetrable dragon shield on the left, the dragon claw shoulder plate, and the cosmic dragon tattoo on the back spine. However you don't have to be a fan of the anime to appreciate the intense colours and shades of this design!

Immortal Dragon Chrysanthemum This rash guard was inspired by Norifumi ""Kid"" Yamamoto's walk out t-shirt in his UFC debut against Demetrious ""Mighty Mouse"" Johnson. It features the ever immortal Chinese dragon as the design basis, paired with the natural opulance of chrysanthemum flowers to create a very bad ass but balanced design.

Note: Each rash guard contains our Dynasty ""Old School"" Chinese calligraphy handwriting logo on front chest, Dynasty ""Imperial Seal"" stamp on the sleeve, Armourtech patch on the hip, and Armourtech logo on the back neck. We aren't trying to brand you
column2: we're letting imitators and copycats know that you're wearing the real deal, not a fake knockoff.

column1: >
Here are the awesome things that will happen when you choose to support us:
Exclusivity: We are an independent brand, that means you'll likely be the only person in your city to own one of our exlusive, uniquely produced items.

Support The Economy: Our team at Dynasty is based in Canada and Armourtech manufacturers are from the United Kingdom. We don't support sweatshops. With your support we can continue to produce wonderful designs for future products knowing that there are awesome people out there who support independent brands.

Authenticity: When you purchase a Dynasty item, you know you are wearing an authentic Asian brand that designs inspired pieces. We're not a wannabe brand producing played out Japanese kanji words with pseudo-philosophical graphics or other nonsense. This is authentic artwork drawn and designed by martial artists, for martial artists.

column2: The Rash Guard designs are too flashy. Are there other options?

column1: Yes there are. However since manufacturing more options takes more monetary commitment, we decided to produce the two designs that most people wanted first. We have more minimalist designs coming out, so be sure to like our Facebook page to stay in touch with our new products!

column2: I don't need these awesome clothes, but I want to help out!

column1: If you don't want to rock one of our bad ass flamboyant rash guards but still think we are pretty awesome, please help us out by linking this page to your friends, family, and your social networks like Facebook and Twitter! Remember to like us on Facebook too!

Our full line can be found at DynastyClothingStore.com

It's a BIG birthday SURPRISE!

Give by no later than April 27th to be included in his big birthday card!!

Hello friends and family!!

I have watched Rowan look at camera deals for the ENTIRE time I have been with him. His camera is pretty good, but I think it's time for an upgrade. Photography brings him such joy, and he is really good at it (see the above photo!!).

When it's all said and done, he'll get a hand made card (made by yours truly) with all of your names (and thoughts if you so wish to share them), no matter the size of your gift. So if you want to be a part of this fun occaision, give what you can :) 

What we need:

The fund, if the amount is achieved, will be enough to get him the body. He can be in charge of choosing the right lenses, as I have found that to be a very personal choice. The full cost of the Nikon D7100 SLR camera body is about $1200.

***Note: If you don't feel comfortable giving on this online platform, feel free to email me and I'll send you my snail mail address where you can send a check.

The Impact

Rowan will be happier than a little kid in a candy store. And you will all benefit from seeing even more awesome photos on Facebook and potentially on your own walls! 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't give money, don't worry! It's the thought that counts, so send me (via email) a little blurb/birthday thought and I'll write it in the card!

Also, if you can think of other people that should be included in this, please pass it along!

Please take part in any way you can by April 27th!

Our casual slip-on sneakers are durable, eco-friendly, fashionable, and comfortable. They are made out of sugarcane and hemp, two easily found and naturally produced materials.

The sugarcane braided midsoles and reinforced leather heels ensure strong support for the insole, while the canvas material your feet cool and fresh. Our first designs are unisex and feature white stripes on either off-white or black fabric, and are available in both men and women's sizes.

The Dominican Republic is a culturally-diverse country located in the heart of the Caribbean. Like many other countries in the region, it includes both thriving and neglected communities. One of its most neglected communities are rural Bateyes, impoverished villages that dot the outskirts of current and former sugarcane plantations. 

Cana's Development Program trains local hires to assemble high-end fashion shoes, allowing workers to develop valuable trade skills and leave low-paying jobs behind. Significant focus is placed on single-income homes, typically ran by women, to alleviate socio-economic pressure.

Profits from each pair of Cana Shoes fund educational programs by organizations such as MOSCTHA, an NGO established in 1985 to help impoverished communities in Haiti and in the Dominican Republic. For Edison Suero, Cana's founder, the ability to create sustainable sources of income for such programs has been a life-long dream. 

Your shoes' journey begins in different parts of the world. The hemp and sugarcane materials used in our design are aggregated from international suppliers, make their way to a processing factory in Santo Domingo, and finally become the individual pieces our artisans sew, stitch, and put together.

Our future forecast is aimed towards localizing this process even further by investing in equipment, local suppliers, and training programs. Our ultimate goal is to host the entire process in the batey communities we serve. Cana is built on transparency, so please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.

Please use the following universal size chart to determine your shoe size. We recommend rounding up if you normally wear a half size. Please make sure to email us your size as Indiegogo does not give you the option to pick your size. info@canashoes.com. 

Indiegogo is a crowdfunding platform that helps teams raise money for their projects and products. In this platform, teams can submit and present their products to the community and the backers can easily support it by buying or simply contributing with a symbolic amount of money. Indiegogo it's not an online store.

They are made out of sugarcane and hemp, two easily found and naturally produced materials.The sugarcane braided midsoles and reinforced leather heels ensure strong support for the insole, while the canvas material your feet cool and fresh. Our first designs are unisex and feature white stripes on either off-white or black fabric, and are available in both men and women's sizes.The Dominican Republic is a culturally-diverse country located in the heart of the Caribbean. Like many other countries in the region, it includes both thriving and neglected communities. One of its most neglected communities are rural Bateyes, impoverished villages that dot the outskirts of current and former sugarcane plantations. Cana's Development Program trains local hires to assemble high-end fashion shoes, allowing workers to develop valuable trade skills and leave low-paying jobs behind. Significant focus is placed on single-income homes, typically ran by women, to alleviate socio-economic pressure.Profits from each pair of Cana Shoes fund educational programs by organizations such as MOSCTHA, an NGO established in 1985 to help impoverished communities in Haiti and in the Dominican Republic. For Edison Suero, Cana's founder, the ability to create sustainable sources of income for such programs has been a life-long dream. Your shoes' journey begins in different parts of the world. The hemp and sugarcane materials used in our design are aggregated from international suppliers, make their way to a processing factory in Santo Domingo, and finally become the individual pieces our artisans sew, stitch, and put together.Our future forecast is aimed towards localizing this process even further by investing in equipment, local suppliers, and training programs. Our ultimate goal is to host the entire process in the batey communities we serve. Cana is built on transparency, so please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.Please use the following universal size chart to determine your shoe size. We recommend rounding up if you normally wear a half size. Please make sure to email us your size as Indiegogo does not give you the option to pick your size. info@canashoes.com. Indiegogo is a crowdfunding platform that helps teams raise money for their projects and products. In this platform, teams can submit and present their products to the community and the backers can easily support it by buying or simply contributing with a symbolic amount of money. Indiegogo it's not an online store.",32.0,0,"2 Campaigns
London Alexander is the quintessential line for the man in pursuit of exquisite exclusivity.

London Alexander grew up in Squamish, British Columbia. Alexander's career choice stemmed from silk screening hand sewn t-shirts for friends. His Aunt owned stores in Victoria and Squamish where she sold her own line of leather goods for men. It was while working in these stores London began learning the fashion trade. His Aunt was instrumental in teaching him basic technical skills and soon after London began applying this knowledge into his own designs.

We are the company that caters to the man who wants clean, well made clothing. All of our pieces are hand-sewn here in Vancouver, British Columbia. We support local business and in return we want our community to support local fashion.
We use only the highest quality fabrics available and hand assemble them locally. This way, we can guarantee our clientele a high street brand from a local designer.

Alexander's passion is contagious. ""I just love to design things. I find there's a lot of the same stuff out there, and I enjoy doing little details on things like zippers, buttons, and sleeve-tags.""

By the age of 21 Alexander had launched his first line of Menswear - LRMA Clothing - debuted at Vancouver's Eco Fashion Week.  It was here he wowed the audience and sparked the interest of Vancouver's press.
After refining his line and finding more of himself in each piece, Alexander changed the name of his Menswear line from - LRMA Clothing - to simply - LONDON ALEXANDER.

Alexander's attention detail has his line's popularity expanding rapidly through word of mouth and by choice selection. Recently one of London's designs was selected to be worn by Chris Haslam, a professional skateboarder from Canada.
""It's going to come down to: detail, fit, quality, and garment construction.""

""It's [the line] growing faster than I could've dreamed, I have new distributors calling weekly placing orders and asking for Summer/Spring 2013 lookbooks this far in advance, I need to be able to meet demands and keep people interested""
Right now you can find London Alexander in select cities across Canada &
Up until now all aspects of production have been overseen by London Alexander himself. All expenses of production, marketing, and distribution have been paid for by London, through his part-time job.
Our goal, with your help, is to cover fabric and shipping costs for the upcoming Summer/Spring 2013 line. As well as help us secure showroom space in Vancouver &
column2: Toronto, so come next year we will have a place to display our new lines and attract future retailers.

column1: As a young company we face many challenges, many of which can be overcome with your help.

We use only the finest fabrics from around the world and getting them isn't cheap. Your donation will help cover fabric and shipping costs for the upcoming lines, as well as costs of assembly here in Canada.
100% of our line is manufactured here in Vancouver, British Columbia.
This allows us to support our local economy and oversee all aspects of production, while maintaining the highest standard of quality.
However, by keeping all stages of production here in Canada, our expenses are much higher than brands who outsource overseas.
We accommodate for this by refining our line to only the best styles.

A couple ways we have overcome these costs is by:
establishing healthy relationships with factories here in Vancouver and by keeping the company small.
That means a lot more work for everyone on the team but, we're proud of our product and thats all that matters.
But the challenges don't stop at manufacturing.

Our line needs to be seen by potential buyers and distributors.
Having a showroom is the best way to display our pieces.

Your donations would also go towards showrooms:
One here in Vancouver as well as one in Toronto.
We have already found the two spaces, however financing is the biggest issue.
We are a diverse group of like minded individuals who aspire to share our vision of fashion with the world.
We hope to continue our dream of making the best Menswear right here in Canada.

How GRMTAC Began

I started out as a volunteer, designing custom apparel for a government agency's nonprofit side.  They would not (and still do not) allow public sale of their items.  As my designs became more popular, I became more frustrated.  I felt that anyone should be able to buy them.  What was available to the public seemed very in-your-face and lacking in artistic vision.  I helped generate more than $1 million designing for a limited audience and now I bring similar, better designs to you.  

The name: GRMTAC is short for Green Monster Tactical.  It is an abbreviation I created (and copyrighted) that represents the olive drab green body armor worn by certain military and law enforcement personnel during our operations.

The project is simple: by contributing to GRMTAC, you will help to generate more cool apparel.  

All of the funding being requested is going to production and inventory.  We have already secured our website
column2:
the design work is ongoing and there is no overhead.  All we need is the capital to bring 18 other designs (and growing) to life.  

A long term goal for GRMTAC is to support not only to the Wounded Warrior Project and Sheepdog Impact Assistance, but also the Innocence Project, which provides DNA testing to those wrongly convicted of crimes.  We are partriots who stand up for justice and stand against injustice.  

Investor Perk: $10 GRMTAC Steel Chevron Logo Bottle Opener

Thank you!

Thank you for all backers. This crowdfunding campaign succeeded, now on sale in general! You can purchase Orphe on Amazon and others.

皆様のおかげでスマートフットウェアOrpheのクラウドファンディングキャンペーンは成功し、現在一般発売中です！Amazon他で購入いただけます。
column2:
/>

What is orphe?

Orphe is a smart-shoes system designed for performance that functions both as a customizable lighting system and a musical instrument/audio-visual controller. The sole of each shoe contains advanced motion sensors, around 100 full-color, serially-controlled LEDs, and a wireless module (patent pending). This technology allows users to intuitively express themselves in new and interesting ways by freely mapping interactions between their movement sand light and sound. We also provide a system that makes it easy for users to share the assets they've created online, and we hope to grow a community of artists and performers working in different media and genres who can take inspiration from each other's use of Orphe hardware and applications.

Orpheは照明となり楽器ともなる、パフォーマンスに特化したスマートシューズです。この靴のソールには最新のモーションセンサ、約100のフルカラーシリアル制御LED、 無線モジュールなどが内蔵されており、ユーザは自分のモーションと光と音のインタラクションを自由にマッピングして、直感的に様々な新しい表現を追求することができます（特許出願済）。

また、web上でユーザが自分のデザインしたアセットを簡単にシェアできるシステムを提供することで、異なるジャンルのアーティスト同士が触発し合えるようなシェアシステムを提供します。

Who are we?


no new folk studio Inc. is a Japanese hardware startup launched in November, 2014. We create technology for artists and performers with a focus on wireless interaction and the Internet of Things (IoT).

What people are saying about Orphe:

column1: ""L.A. Lights were pretty great (and perhaps the original wearable), but they have nothing onOrphe.""
""The Orphe is not your average wearable system.""
""They're like those light-up shoes that you had when you were a kid -- the ones that blink and flash, activated by the pressure of your tread -- but they're also 200 percent cooler than that.""

""Le projet vise à créer une nouvelle forme d’art, mettant en relation les mouvements, la musique et la lumière, en se servant de ce nouveau support audio-visuel… Les possibilités de création deviennent infinies !""

Shoe Design

Our goal has been to design shoes that will serve as a canvass or palette for the artists and performers who wear them.

Using applications on their smartphones or other devices to customise their shoes' LEDs, Orphe users can wear whatever colours they want. We’ve designed white and black prototypes that look good no matter what colour the lights are.

Finding a way to make shoes that have batteries and a host of electronic components inside them has been very challenging, but through close collaboration between a traditional shoemaker and our engineers we’ve been able to achieve a minimalist design that functions well both as an interface and as footwear.

Orpheのユーザはスマートフォン等のアプリケーションを通じて、好きな色の光を纏うことが出来ます。我々はどんな色を選択しても魅力的に見える白と黒の二種類の靴をデザインしました。

靴のデザインについては、日本の伝統的な靴職人をチームに招き入れました。多数の電子部品や電池を内蔵するOrpheの製法を確立することは大変にチャレンジングですが、エンジニアと靴職人が綿密に話し合うことでミニマルなデザインの中にインタフェースとしての機能とスニーカーとしての機能を両立させることができました。

Black Shoes

White Shoes

On-board electronics


Each Orphe shoe contains a small unified circuit board with an ARM Cortex-M3 microprocessor, invensense mpu9150 motion-tracking device, wireless module (Bluetooth LE), and charging circuit. Each sole is also surrounded by a high density LED tape with lights that can be controlled individually by the microprocessor. We have already created two trial circuit boards for use in our prototypes.

OrpheにはARM Cortex-M3プロセッサ、InvenSense MPU-9150、 Bluetooth LEモジュール、そして充電回路が一体となった小型の電子基板が内蔵されます。また、オリジナルソールの側面には高密度のシリアル制御のLEDテープが取り付けられ、マイクロプロセッサによってすべてのLEDが個別制御されます。我々はすでに２回試作基板をつくり、それらをプロトタイプに使用しています。

Orphe shoes can be used in conjunction with various applications on smartphones or computers via a Bluetooth connection. We provide a free iOS application that allows users to control the lights on the shoes and integrate Orphe into their performances (Android and OSX versions are stretch goals and will be developed if enough funds are raised). We also want to release an SDK to make it easy for anyone to create applications that make use of the Orphe hardware, and we encourage users to develop and release their own applications.

OrpheはスマートフォンやコンピュータにBluetoothで接続し様々なアプリケーションと連携することのできるスマートシューズです。我々はOrpheの光り方を操作したり、Orpheで演奏を行うためのベーシックなiOS専用アプリケーションを無償で提供します（android版、OSX版はファンディング達成金額に応じて提供が決まります）。また我々はOrpheと連携するアプリケーションをつくるためのSDKを公開したいと考えています。ユーザ自身が自分の開発したアプリケーションをマーケットに公開することも促進していきます。

Development update #1
column6:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">

Easily and intuitively create custom illumination designs

The shoes' illumination can be controlled easily and intuitively using a tablet, and the designs you create can be uploaded to the shoes. We will also make it easy to upload your illumination designs and share them with your friends on the Internet.

タブレットを使って簡単に靴の光り方を操作することができます。またデザインした色をweb上にアップロードして友人とシェアすることが可能です。
column7:
/>

Orphe's lights can be set to change along with the speed and orientation of a dancer's movements, allowing for various forms of expression and performance - giving motion an “aura”, for example, or creating a design using after-images. (The image above is an unedited photo taken with a normal DSLR camera without any CGI).

Orpheは向きや速度に応じて光の強さや色を変え、動きをオーラのように見せることや残像で模様を表現することができます。

Control various performance elements with your feet.

The 9-axis sensors embedded in each sole pick up the movements of each shoe in real time. These data can then be used to wirelessly control various external devices, allowing the shoes to function as musical instruments, video game controllers, foot switches, etc.

ソールに内蔵された９軸センサはリアルタイムに靴の動きを検出し、コンピュータに送信します。このデータは光や音に変換するだけでなく、ビデオゲームのコントローラとして利用することや、インターネットに接続された様々なモノを操作することができます。

Share sound/light/gesture designs

Sounds, lighting designs, and gestures can be uploaded and shared with other users on the Internet. For example, a user might practice by imitating the gestures of a dancer they want to emulate.

Webを通じて自分のデザインした音、光、ジェスチャをアップロードし、他のユーザーにシェアすることができます。例えば上手なダンサーのシェアしたジェスチャを真似することで、ダンスの練習を効果的にすることができます。

Open API

We have open-sourced elements of our Orphe software and made it easy for other developers to create various applications for our hardware. We provide libraries for open source platforms such as OpenFrameworks, Processing, Pure Data, and Max/MSP, and we encourage the entire user community to further extend the system's capabilities.

我々はOrpheのプログラムを一部オープンにし、他のデベロッパーがOrpheを使った様々なアプリケーションを簡単に開発できるようにします。我々はOpenFrameworks, Processing, Pure data, Max/MSP といったオープンソースプラットフォームに対応したライブラリを提供し、ユーザーコミュニティ全体でOrpheを更に進化させていくことを促進します。

Funding goals and perks

We need funding to:

column1: • Make the metal moulds for our custom soles
• Make uppers (the parts of a shoe above the sole)
• Make approximately 100 LED lights for each pair of shoes.
• Cover the cost of developing software applications

Because new moulds have to be made for each size of shoe, the amount of money we raise will determine how many sizes we can produce. If we raise enough we may also be able to increase the number of engineers working on the project and extend the compatibility of our software application to other operating systems.

If we raise $30,000: 3 shoe sizes + iOS application

If we raise $50,000: 5 shoe sizes + iOS, OSX applications

If we raise $70,000: 7 shoe sizes + iOS, OSX, Android applications

ファンディングの資金は主に
• 特殊形状ソールの金型の製造
• アプリケーションの開発費

に使われます。

特に特殊形状ソールの金型の製造は靴のサイズ毎に金型をつくる必要があるため、我々はファンドの達成額に応じてサイズ展開の数を変えていきます。また達成額に応じてエンジニアを増員し、対応アプリケーションも増やしていきます。
• 達成額30000ドルの場合：3サイズの展開, iOS App
<li>達成額50000ドルの場合：5サイズの展開, iOS App &amp
<li>達成額70000ドルの場合：7サイズの展開, iOS App, OS X App &amp

Perks

Risks &
column2:
Challenges

Creating smart-shoes with embedded circuit boards and batteries that can withstand a dancer’s movements will not be easy. We are a very small startup without enough people and money to accomplish this on our own. Thanks to our many supporters who have enthusiastically contributed to taking on this challenge, however, we have reached a point at which we are confident we will be able to manufacture Orphe on a medium scale provided we can raise enough funds.

At present we have produced our second prototype shoe and completed our basic software application, and we have also fabricated custom soles to hold the electronic components and uppers designed by a master shoemaker. As long as we don’t run into problems with durability or the production process the current prototype models are ready to be turned into shoes we can ship to backers.

The first hurdle we will have to overcome in manufacturing Orphe shoes is the fabrication of metal moulds for the custom soles needed to hold the electronic components. This is expensive, and new moulds must be made for each size of shoe. As a result, even if we meet our minimum funding goal we won't necessarily be able to produce a satisfactory range of sizes. We will decide what sizes to produce based on the level of funding we receive and then send backers the one best suited to their measurements.

The biggest risk of a change in our final product is related to the battery. In our current prototype we are using lithium-ion polymer batteries with protective circuits, and right now they are capable of providing over three hours of continuous use on a single charge. We may use a different battery, however, if we can find one that carries a larger charge, is safer, and is small enough to fit inside a shoe. If this occurs it may result in minor changes to the design of our shoes.

We may run into difficulties that will delay shipment of our product. We will post regular updates to keep backers informed of our progress and respond to comments and questions as quickly as we can.

※Delivery of perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

基板や電池、LEDを内蔵し、ダンサーの激しい動きにも耐えるスマートシューズを製造することは容易ではありません。我々はとても小さなスタートアップ企業であり、人手も予算も十分ではありません。

しかし一方でこのチャレンジングなプロジェクトに献身的に参加してくださる多くのサポーターのおかげで、現在の我々は適正な予算が確保できればOrpheの中量生産が可能な状況まで至ることができました。

現在我々は２回目の試作基板と基礎的なアプリケーションを完成させ、また電子部品を内蔵できる特殊形状のソールと熟練した靴職人のデザインしたアッパー部を完成させています。耐久性や生産手順の確定といった問題を除けば、現在の試作でも普通の靴として履くことができ、パフォーマンスを行うことができます。

このチャレンジを行う上でまずネックとなるのは、電子部品を内蔵できる特殊形状のソールの金型の製造です。金型の製造はそれぞれが高価な上に靴のサイズの分必要になります。そのため最低限のゴールを達成した場合でも十分なサイズ展開ができるわけではありません。我々は達成金額に応じてサイズ展開を決定し、その後backerに最適なサイズの靴を郵送します。

またこのチャレンジを行う上でもっとも変更のリスクが高いのは、電池に関する仕様です。我々は現在の試作に保護回路付きのリチウムイオンポリマー電池を使用しています。現在の仕様では一回の充電で３時間以上の連続使用が可能です。しかしスニーカーに内蔵できるほど小さく、大きな放電を行える、より安全な電池を探すことができれば、電池を変更する可能性があります。この変更によってスニーカーのデザインにも若干の変更が加えられる可能性があります。

Development process

Right now we are developing Orphe at a shared factory/office called “DMM.make AKIBA” in Akihabara, Tokyo, and using the machines available there we have been able to construct many Orphe prototypes.

私たちは東京、秋葉原のシェアファクトリー付きのシェアオフィス DMM.make AKIBA に入居しており、Orpheの試作品の多くはそのファクトリー内の機械を使って作られました。

Timeline

Supporters

no new folk studio Inc. is supported by ABBA Lab Inc., a company that invests in Internet of Things (IoT) hardware prototyping.

no new folk studio はIoT(Internet of things)ハードウェアのプロトタイピングへの投資育成を行っている株式会社ABBA Labのサポートを受けています。

We are receiving assistance from Cerevo, a hardware startup company founded by Takuma Iwasa and based in Tokyo since 2007, in developing Orphe and bringing it to market as a consumer product.

株式会社Cerevoは岩佐琢磨氏が2007年に設立したハードウェアスタートアップの先駆け的企業です。Orpheの製品化に当たって、我々は株式会社Cerevoの協力を受け開発を進めます。
column4:
/>

We are also receiving support from GUGEN, a contest that recognizes devices that represent “what will be normal in the future” and supports their realization as products.

「未来のふつう」となるデバイスやアイデアを評価し、具現化をサポートするコンテスト「GUGEN」のサポートを受けています。

Special Thanks

column1:
Artists and performers wanted !

The Orphe system is not only for dancers. It can be used to augment art and performance in a wide range of fields including music, photography, and exhibition sports. If you are an artist or performer who would like to do something new using Orphe, we’d like to hear from you. We’ll provide whatever support we can to anyone who wants to create new forms of expression with the Orphe system.

Orpheはダンサーのためだけの靴ではありません。ミュージシャン、フォトグラファー、エキシビジョンスポーツなど、工夫によって様々なジャンルのパフォーマンスで活躍します。

Orpheを使って何か新しいことがしたいと思ったアーティスト、パフォーマーの方はお気軽にご連絡ください。私たちはOrpheとユーザが新しい表現を創造することを支援していきます！

","Thank you!Thank you for all backers. This crowdfunding campaign succeeded, now on sale in general! You can purchase Orphe on Amazon and others.皆様のおかげでスマートフットウェアOrpheのクラウドファンディングキャンペーンは成功し、現在一般発売中です！Amazon他で購入いただけます。What is orphe?Orphe is a smart-shoes system designed for performance that functions both as a customizable lighting system and a musical instrument/audio-visual controller. The sole of each shoe contains advanced motion sensors, around 100 full-color, serially-controlled LEDs, and a wireless module (patent pending). This technology allows users to intuitively express themselves in new and interesting ways by freely mapping interactions between their movement sand light and sound. We also provide a system that makes it easy for users to share the assets they've created online, and we hope to grow a community of artists and performers working in different media and genres who can take inspiration from each other's use of Orphe hardware and applications.Orpheは照明となり楽器ともなる、パフォーマンスに特化したスマートシューズです。この靴のソールには最新のモーションセンサ、約100のフルカラーシリアル制御LED、 無線モジュールなどが内蔵されており、ユーザは自分のモーションと光と音のインタラクションを自由にマッピングして、直感的に様々な新しい表現を追求することができます（特許出願済）。また、web上でユーザが自分のデザインしたアセットを簡単にシェアできるシステムを提供することで、異なるジャンルのアーティスト同士が触発し合えるようなシェアシステムを提供します。Who are we?no new folk studio Inc. is a Japanese hardware startup launched in November, 2014. We create technology for artists and performers with a focus on wireless interaction and the Internet of Things (IoT).What people are saying about Orphe:
L.A. Lights were pretty great (and perhaps the original wearable), but they have nothing onOrphe.""
The Orphe is not your average wearable system.""
They're like those light-up shoes that you had when you were a kid -- the ones that blink and flash, activated by the pressure of your tread -- but they're also 200 percent cooler than that.""

Le projet vise à créer une nouvelle forme d’art, mettant en relation les mouvements, la musique et la lumière, en se servant de ce nouveau support audio-visuel… Les possibilités de création deviennent infinies !""

Shoe DesignOur goal has been to design shoes that will serve as a canvass or palette for the artists and performers who wear them.Using applications on their smartphones or other devices to customise their shoes' LEDs, Orphe users can wear whatever colours they want. We’ve designed white and black prototypes that look good no matter what colour the lights are.Finding a way to make shoes that have batteries and a host of electronic components inside them has been very challenging, but through close collaboration between a traditional shoemaker and our engineers we’ve been able to achieve a minimalist design that functions well both as an interface and as footwear.Orpheのユーザはスマートフォン等のアプリケーションを通じて、好きな色の光を纏うことが出来ます。我々はどんな色を選択しても魅力的に見える白と黒の二種類の靴をデザインしました。靴のデザインについては、日本の伝統的な靴職人をチームに招き入れました。多数の電子部品や電池を内蔵するOrpheの製法を確立することは大変にチャレンジングですが、エンジニアと靴職人が綿密に話し合うことでミニマルなデザインの中にインタフェースとしての機能とスニーカーとしての機能を両立させることができました。Black ShoesWhite ShoesOn-board electronicsEach Orphe shoe contains a small unified circuit board with an ARM Cortex-M3 microprocessor, invensense mpu9150 motion-tracking device, wireless module (Bluetooth LE), and charging circuit. Each sole is also surrounded by a high density LED tape with lights that can be controlled individually by the microprocessor. We have already created two trial circuit boards for use in our prototypes.OrpheにはARM Cortex-M3プロセッサ、InvenSense MPU-9150、 Bluetooth LEモジュール、そして充電回路が一体となった小型の電子基板が内蔵されます。また、オリジナルソールの側面には高密度のシリアル制御のLEDテープが取り付けられ、マイクロプロセッサによってすべてのLEDが個別制御されます。我々はすでに２回試作基板をつくり、それらをプロトタイプに使用しています。Orphe shoes can be used in conjunction with various applications on smartphones or computers via a Bluetooth connection. We provide a free iOS application that allows users to control the lights on the shoes and integrate Orphe into their performances (Android and OSX versions are stretch goals and will be developed if enough funds are raised). We also want to release an SDK to make it easy for anyone to create applications that make use of the Orphe hardware, and we encourage users to develop and release their own applications.OrpheはスマートフォンやコンピュータにBluetoothで接続し様々なアプリケーションと連携することのできるスマートシューズです。我々はOrpheの光り方を操作したり、Orpheで演奏を行うためのベーシックなiOS専用アプリケーションを無償で提供します（android版、OSX版はファンディング達成金額に応じて提供が決まります）。また我々はOrpheと連携するアプリケーションをつくるためのSDKを公開したいと考えています。ユーザ自身が自分の開発したアプリケーションをマーケットに公開することも促進していきます。Development update #1Easily and intuitively create custom illumination designsThe shoes' illumination can be controlled easily and intuitively using a tablet, and the designs you create can be uploaded to the shoes. We will also make it easy to upload your illumination designs and share them with your friends on the Internet.タブレットを使って簡単に靴の光り方を操作することができます。またデザインした色をweb上にアップロードして友人とシェアすることが可能です。Orphe's lights can be set to change along with the speed and orientation of a dancer's movements, allowing for various forms of expression and performance - giving motion an “aura”, for example, or creating a design using after-images. (The image above is an unedited photo taken with a normal DSLR camera without any CGI).Orpheは向きや速度に応じて光の強さや色を変え、動きをオーラのように見せることや残像で模様を表現することができます。Control various performance elements with your feet.The 9-axis sensors embedded in each sole pick up the movements of each shoe in real time. These data can then be used to wirelessly control various external devices, allowing the shoes to function as musical instruments, video game controllers, foot switches, etc.ソールに内蔵された９軸センサはリアルタイムに靴の動きを検出し、コンピュータに送信します。このデータは光や音に変換するだけでなく、ビデオゲームのコントローラとして利用することや、インターネットに接続された様々なモノを操作することができます。Share sound/light/gesture designsSounds, lighting designs, and gestures can be uploaded and shared with other users on the Internet. For example, a user might practice by imitating the gestures of a dancer they want to emulate.Webを通じて自分のデザインした音、光、ジェスチャをアップロードし、他のユーザーにシェアすることができます。例えば上手なダンサーのシェアしたジェスチャを真似することで、ダンスの練習を効果的にすることができます。Open APIWe have open-sourced elements of our Orphe software and made it easy for other developers to create various applications for our hardware. We provide libraries for open source platforms such as OpenFrameworks, Processing, Pure Data, and Max/MSP, and we encourage the entire user community to further extend the system's capabilities.我々はOrpheのプログラムを一部オープンにし、他のデベロッパーがOrpheを使った様々なアプリケーションを簡単に開発できるようにします。我々はOpenFrameworks, Processing, Pure data, Max/MSP といったオープンソースプラットフォームに対応したライブラリを提供し、ユーザーコミュニティ全体でOrpheを更に進化させていくことを促進します。Funding goals and perksWe need funding to:
Make the metal moulds for our custom soles
Make uppers (the parts of a shoe above the sole)
Make approximately 100 LED lights for each pair of shoes.
Cover the cost of developing software applications

Because new moulds have to be made for each size of shoe, the amount of money we raise will determine how many sizes we can produce. If we raise enough we may also be able to increase the number of engineers working on the project and extend the compatibility of our software application to other operating systems.If we raise $30,000: 3 shoe sizes + iOS applicationIf we raise $50,000: 5 shoe sizes + iOS, OSX applicationsIf we raise $70,000: 7 shoe sizes + iOS, OSX, Android applicationsファンディングの資金は主に
特殊形状ソールの金型の製造
アプリケーションの開発費
に使われます。特に特殊形状ソールの金型の製造は靴のサイズ毎に金型をつくる必要があるため、我々はファンドの達成額に応じてサイズ展開の数を変えていきます。また達成額に応じてエンジニアを増員し、対応アプリケーションも増やしていきます。
達成額30000ドルの場合：3サイズの展開, iOS App
達成額50000ドルの場合：5サイズの展開, iOS App & OS X App
達成額70000ドルの場合：7サイズの展開, iOS App, OS X App & Android Application

PerksRisks & ChallengesCreating smart-shoes with embedded circuit boards and batteries that can withstand a dancer’s movements will not be easy. We are a very small startup without enough people and money to accomplish this on our own. Thanks to our many supporters who have enthusiastically contributed to taking on this challenge, however, we have reached a point at which we are confident we will be able to manufacture Orphe on a medium scale provided we can raise enough funds.At present we have produced our second prototype shoe and completed our basic software application, and we have also fabricated custom soles to hold the electronic components and uppers designed by a master shoemaker. As long as we don’t run into problems with durability or the production process the current prototype models are ready to be turned into shoes we can ship to backers.The first hurdle we will have to overcome in manufacturing Orphe shoes is the fabrication of metal moulds for the custom soles needed to hold the electronic components. This is expensive, and new moulds must be made for each size of shoe. As a result, even if we meet our minimum funding goal we won't necessarily be able to produce a satisfactory range of sizes. We will decide what sizes to produce based on the level of funding we receive and then send backers the one best suited to their measurements.The biggest risk of a change in our final product is related to the battery. In our current prototype we are using lithium-ion polymer batteries with protective circuits, and right now they are capable of providing over three hours of continuous use on a single charge. We may use a different battery, however, if we can find one that carries a larger charge, is safer, and is small enough to fit inside a shoe. If this occurs it may result in minor changes to the design of our shoes.We may run into difficulties that will delay shipment of our product. We will post regular updates to keep backers informed of our progress and respond to comments and questions as quickly as we can.※Delivery of perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.基板や電池、LEDを内蔵し、ダンサーの激しい動きにも耐えるスマートシューズを製造することは容易ではありません。我々はとても小さなスタートアップ企業であり、人手も予算も十分ではありません。しかし一方でこのチャレンジングなプロジェクトに献身的に参加してくださる多くのサポーターのおかげで、現在の我々は適正な予算が確保できればOrpheの中量生産が可能な状況まで至ることができました。現在我々は２回目の試作基板と基礎的なアプリケーションを完成させ、また電子部品を内蔵できる特殊形状のソールと熟練した靴職人のデザインしたアッパー部を完成させています。耐久性や生産手順の確定といった問題を除けば、現在の試作でも普通の靴として履くことができ、パフォーマンスを行うことができます。このチャレンジを行う上でまずネックとなるのは、電子部品を内蔵できる特殊形状のソールの金型の製造です。金型の製造はそれぞれが高価な上に靴のサイズの分必要になります。そのため最低限のゴールを達成した場合でも十分なサイズ展開ができるわけではありません。我々は達成金額に応じてサイズ展開を決定し、その後backerに最適なサイズの靴を郵送します。またこのチャレンジを行う上でもっとも変更のリスクが高いのは、電池に関する仕様です。我々は現在の試作に保護回路付きのリチウムイオンポリマー電池を使用しています。現在の仕様では一回の充電で３時間以上の連続使用が可能です。しかしスニーカーに内蔵できるほど小さく、大きな放電を行える、より安全な電池を探すことができれば、電池を変更する可能性があります。この変更によってスニーカーのデザインにも若干の変更が加えられる可能性があります。Development processRight now we are developing Orphe at a shared factory/office called “DMM.make AKIBA” in Akihabara, Tokyo, and using the machines available there we have been able to construct many Orphe prototypes.私たちは東京、秋葉原のシェアファクトリー付きのシェアオフィス DMM.make AKIBA に入居しており、Orpheの試作品の多くはそのファクトリー内の機械を使って作られました。TimelineSupportersno new folk studio Inc. is supported by ABBA Lab Inc., a company that invests in Internet of Things (IoT) hardware prototyping.no new folk studio はIoT(Internet of things)ハードウェアのプロトタイピングへの投資育成を行っている株式会社ABBA Labのサポートを受けています。We are receiving assistance from Cerevo, a hardware startup company founded by Takuma Iwasa and based in Tokyo since 2007, in developing Orphe and bringing it to market as a consumer product.株式会社Cerevoは岩佐琢磨氏が2007年に設立したハードウェアスタートアップの先駆け的企業です。Orpheの製品化に当たって、我々は株式会社Cerevoの協力を受け開発を進めます。We are also receiving support from GUGEN, a contest that recognizes devices that represent “what will be normal in the future” and supports their realization as products.「未来のふつう」となるデバイスやアイデアを評価し、具現化をサポートするコンテスト「GUGEN」のサポートを受けています。Special Thanks

Artists and performers wanted !The Orphe system is not only for dancers. It can be used to augment art and performance in a wide range of fields including music, photography, and exhibition sports. If you are an artist or performer who would like to do something new using Orphe, we’d like to hear from you. We’ll provide whatever support we can to anyone who wants to create new forms of expression with the Orphe system.Orpheはダンサーのためだけの靴ではありません。ミュージシャン、フォトグラファー、エキシビジョンスポーツなど、工夫によって様々なジャンルのパフォーマンスで活躍します。Orpheを使って何か新しいことがしたいと思ったアーティスト、パフォーマーの方はお気軽にご連絡ください。私たちはOrpheとユーザが新しい表現を創造することを支援していきます！",27.0,1,"1 Campaign

0,"


Introducing Polish to Gel By Hydracol. Polish to Gel turns ANY regular nail polish into a Gel in an easy step system. The Polish to Gel Systems have a unique formula that is designed to specifically hydrate and condition so no more weak, dry  and brittle nails. 

A formulated clear gel that can be mixed with ANY regular nail polish transforming it into gel polish.  YES !!!  that’s correct, you can literally turn ANY regular polish into a gel polish.          

Polish to Gel comes in 2 unique formulas

Polish to Gel INSTANT - NO lamp needed - Turn ANY polish into a gel,  NO lamp needed. This groundbreaking formula dries within minutes and has been designed for those that love gel polish but the process seems too daunting.  Mix Polish to Gel INSTANT with any regular polish, apply as normal polish, let dry for 2 minutes and you are done.

Polish to Gel - Turn ANY polish into a gel. Designed for those that love Shellac and Gel Polish. You no longer have to buy expensive gel polishes, no more wishing your favourite polish colour is a gel and no more wasting all your regular polishes sitting in your cupboard at home.
column3:
/>


Polish to Gel cures in a UV or LED lamp, is instantly dry and has the long-lasting wear of a gel polish. You can now make ANY polish a shiny, flawless colour that hydrates the nail and lasts 14 days.

column1: The Polish to Gel Systems will literally turn your favourite nail polish into a gel polish in a few easy steps, imagine the freedom creating your own custom colours.

I have been a Nail Technician for over 15 years and you can imagine my excitement when Shellac entered the market. Finally a product that made my job so much easier and had all my clients walking out my salon so happy.
Shellac took over from all the other regular polishes we had, we had over 350 amazing colours just sitting there.
BUT what if i could turn all my 350 polishes into a gel ?
What an incredible range we would have, even better, what if a client could literally bring in their favourite colour and i could make it into a gel ?
You can customise Polish to Gel to create any colour, no more wishing that colour was a gel colour and no more spending fortunes on gel polishes.

The polish to gel system will allow you to turn all your regular polishes into a gel instantly. Each 20ml bottle will give you over 20 pairs of hands. You can have a new colour every 2 weeks for 20 weeks !!
Support Our Campaign Any Way You Can!
● Pass on the link of this campaign to all your friends.
● Select one of the thank-you-packages we’re offering as a gift for you or a friends or loved one.
● Link this campaign in one of your blog posts or share it on your Facebook page.
● E-mail us and share with us your feedback.

We are looking to raise $18,000.  The funds we receive for this campaign will go straight into the production and development as well as increasing the Polish to Gel awareness. We also will start developing Hydra Gel Instant, A range of 30 gel colours that dry instantly.
We need your help to take this revolutionary new product to the next level.
We guarantee all perks purchased will be fullfilled.

column4: >NEW - gBlog: UGIAJ, LIGHT FOAM INDESTRUCTIBLE GLASSES

column1: ganzo: Ugiaj Milano Sunglasses
TechTripper: Super flexible UGIAJ Sunglasses can be twisted, turned or crushed
MODA è DONNA: L’EDIZIONE LIMITATA DEGLI OCCHIALI UGIAJ MILANO
DESIGNSPOTTER: Ugiaj Milano sunglasses

column2: CO.: Ugiaj Milano | Limited edition

column1: Coolfactory: Ugiaj Milano: li stropicci in borsa e tornano sempre come nuovi!

column2: art=2139"" rel=""noopener nofollow""> UGIAJ MILANO, GLI OCCHIALI STROPICCIABILI

column1:
Our sunglasses UGIAJ, entirely designed and manufactured in Italy, have some characteristics such as security, deformability, practicality, we believe no other sunglasses on the market today can boast.

We wanted to make a pair of glasses in addition to being aesthetically ""beautiful"" could be worn with the maximum safety even in all occasions particularly delicate, as under the helmet of the scooters or during a game of tennis, without fear that any accidental impact can cause a dangerous hurt, and  we have succeeded!
Indeed for its absorptive capacity to impact our glasses UGIAJ may be considered protective, but without losing its vocation which eyewear trend.

Fully floating UGIAJ eyewear is ideal for those who want to do water sports windsurf, sailing etc.. etc. or just protect your eyes from the sun even enjoy a swim without fear of seeing them disappear to the bottom.
UGIAJ is composed of a soft frame, devoid of stiff corners and without any mechanism metal or rigid plastic, for fastening of the temples that makes dangerous every other eyewear.

This frame is made of ethyl vinyl acetate, ""EVA"", a foam cellulation closed high-quality, non-toxic, non-irritating, totally waterproof, flexible and above all, extremely light, a feature which gives the product the first excellence The maximum weight of 15 gr.

The frame is made with EVA can be manipulated, bent, twisted, under pressure over and over again, but it will resume its original shape with a slight manipulation but without undergoing changes in physical state.
The lens are made in optical Class 1 features comply with the current rules on safety and protection from ultraviolet radiation (UVA-UVB) and all other features required by current regulations.

These lenses have very high breaking strength and high elastic capacity, the test to leakage of the lenses from their position of use is absolutely negative because the lenses themselves are closed to sandwich between the two parts of the twin frame, therefore only the Forced break the glasses would permit the escape and this validation of our extreme safety glasses.

The extreme ease of assembly and disassembly of the temples and the subsequent insertion to the central body of the glasses always in two different colors per side, it allows an easier matching with respect to clothing worn or a most suitable condition at the time of the day.

With UGIAJ not have to worry about them if you carelessly left on the cushion of a chair or car seat, or if inserting them in your back pocket you forgot to take them off before you sit down, they will not break under any circumstances.

Who we are
Irene and Angelo, respectively stylist / designer and inventor and manufacturer of accessories for companies operating in various sectors, from fashion to design.

What have we done
We have developed an idea of multipurpose glasses you can wear it in all situations, whether for recreation, entertainment, sports, but also suitable for a workplace. The main feature of these glasses is that they can withstand the unexpected inattention or newspapers such as the fall, crushing, etc. etc.. We made a soft deformable frame to absorbing shocks and devoid of any rigid point that it would adversely affect the strength and safety. Even though the lenses of optical class A are soft and sandwiched between the two parts of the shell can not get out of their seats. Up to now have been produced prototypes with machining in small scale to verify both the procedure of realization and the maintenance of the technical characteristics described.

Use of funds
We're asking you to help us do Ugiaj become a production reality. We built our prototypes and numerous samples. We stated our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We are looking for funds to put Ugiaj in production. We know what we're doing. The funding will be used for the purchase of the raw material, for the realization of new punches high precision in replacement of those used for the prototypes, for the molding of frames and lenses, and for the assembly. Achieved the financial goal we can deliver the glasses finished in less than 20 days. working. For distribution and all the administrative aspect / logistics we have chosen and agreed to by a specialized company that we are ensured the highest quality and professional service.

","Press Coverage

UGIAJ is composed of a soft frame, devoid of stiff corners and without any mechanism metal or rigid plastic, for fastening of the temples that makes dangerous every other eyewear.

This frame is made of ethyl vinyl acetate, ""EVA"", a foam cellulation closed high-quality, non-toxic, non-irritating, totally waterproof, flexible and above all, extremely light, a feature which gives the product the first excellence The maximum weight of 15 gr.

The frame is made with EVA can be manipulated, bent, twisted, under pressure over and over again, but it will resume its original shape with a slight manipulation but without undergoing changes in physical state.
The lens are made in optical Class 1 features comply with the current rules on safety and protection from ultraviolet radiation (UVA-UVB) and all other features required by current regulations.

These lenses have very high breaking strength and high elastic capacity, the test to leakage of the lenses from their position of use is absolutely negative because the lenses themselves are closed to sandwich between the two parts of the twin frame, therefore only the Forced break the glasses would permit the escape and this validation of our extreme safety glasses.

The extreme ease of assembly and disassembly of the temples and the subsequent insertion to the central body of the glasses always in two different colors per side, it allows an easier matching with respect to clothing worn or a most suitable condition at the time of the day.

With UGIAJ not have to worry about them if you carelessly left on the cushion of a chair or car seat, or if inserting them in your back pocket you forgot to take them off before you sit down, they will not break under any circumstances.
Who we are Irene and Angelo, respectively stylist / designer and inventor and manufacturer of accessories for companies operating in various sectors, from fashion to design.

What have we done We have developed an idea of multipurpose glasses you can wear it in all situations, whether for recreation, entertainment, sports, but also suitable for a workplace. The main feature of these glasses is that they can withstand the unexpected inattention or newspapers such as the fall, crushing, etc. etc.. We made a soft deformable frame to absorbing shocks and devoid of any rigid point that it would adversely affect the strength and safety. Even though the lenses of optical class A are soft and sandwiched between the two parts of the shell can not get out of their seats. Up to now have been produced prototypes with machining in small scale to verify both the procedure of realization and the maintenance of the technical characteristics described.

Use of funds We're asking you to help us do Ugiaj become a production reality. We built our prototypes and numerous samples. We stated our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We are looking for funds to put Ugiaj in production. We know what we're doing. The funding will be used for the purchase of the raw material, for the realization of new punches high precision in replacement of those used for the prototypes, for the molding of frames and lenses, and for the assembly. Achieved the financial goal we can deliver the glasses finished in less than 20 days. working. For distribution and all the administrative aspect / logistics we have chosen and agreed to by a specialized company that we are ensured the highest quality and professional service.",13.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>Since I got the idea to do My tshirt line a couple years ago, I've been obsessed with the idea of wearable art.  My next venture into this concept is neckties! Ties are an area where one can have a bit of leeway.  Fun ties are in &amp
column2:
accepted in many workplaces.  Cool, edgy ties are good for the nightlife and can be a discreet and subtle indicator of what you're into without saying a word or making anyone feel uncomfortable.  They're not just ties, they're a conversation piece!

See the screenprinted ties here :  Screenprinted Ties

What You GetI have 13 designs created and ready to be voted on with your wallets!  Too often people click ""like"" or say they want something, then forget about it after the creator has shelled out the cash to make it happen.  With this fundraiser I will only print the designs that people order.  It's market research in a way while covering my own ass financially.  

What you get : there are several options available. You can donate a small or large amount just because you want to see this happen.  The most obvious way to help is to order a tie (or two or three).  You can buy items from my previous fundraisers, the Deconstructed Beauty tshirts, my book ""Gagged"", as well as other original art that will be listed in the gallery.  There will also be a limited number of hand made ties that include a tie with 16 spikes and hand painted one of a kind ties.  This page will be updated often as various perks sell out. 

As always helping to spread the word is a great way to help out as well.  Posting on social media - twitter, facebook, instagram, pinterest, etc is invaluable and much appreciated! 

Julie Simone
