years ago I had a fall which has led to a chronic pain condition
affecting both my knees. As a result I use a wheelchair. I am seeking sponsorship for an upcoming event in Orlando, Florida.
do Cheerleading 'stunting' from my wheelchair. This had never been
done before. I had to fight initially to get acceptance from the
local gyms and national governing bodies but once they saw what I
had achieved in the first month of my return to the sport they soon
began take notice. I now have a team comprising myself, a â€˜flyerâ€™

column2: >Some American coaches came to the UK

column1: in 2010 and met with me at the national championships in Bournemouth.
They organised an invitation for my team to perform at the 2011
Cheerleading World Championships at Disney World, Orlando, Florida.
the success of last yearâ€™s performance, the organisers of the 2012
World Championships (the IASF) have once again invited us to perform
We have been working on our routine and believe we can once again
â€˜wowâ€™ the crowd with an even better performance than last year. I
believe this is important as it heightens awareness of disability and
what disabled people are capable of. It also inspires other
wheelchair users to get involved in sport.
next time we have a bad competition or a bad day for that
matter...I'll remember this. As a mom of a special needs child this
really touched my heart and gave me even more hope for his future and
the goals he can still achieve even if he is restricted to a chair.
are AWESOME! I am in Japan and I saw your Video a half hour before
the earthquake hit. Once the power came back on and I saw it again to
help keep me positive and determined! Thanks!â€

I tried to avoid making this request of you guys, hoping that one of the many big businesses I've been contacting over the last couple of months would be willing to sponsor us in order to get their logo on the back of my chair.  Sadly what with the recession and the Olympics no-one has been willing or able to help so I'm reaching out to you! 
We HAVE to go to this event, we've been working REALLY hard to get an awesome routine together and if it means I have to sell my soul, I will be getting on a plane on the 18th April. Any and all your donations will be very gratefully received!

The money raised will be used to fund the flights to Orlando and accommodation while the comp is going on, for myself (Rick) and my backspot (and girlfriend) Jayme.  By performing as we do I get to continue to do something that I love, I get to cheer, but more than that, we show the world that disability isn't the end to dreams, and we forge further into the future where more wheelchair users and people with mobility difficulties can cheer just like anyone else.
Any money raised over the target amount will be put aside and used to get the team to future competitions.

Even a contribution of Â£1 or $1 will help make this dream a reality, because if just everyone who has ""liked"" our Facebook page each contributed a dollar we'd be beyond our target,  but to try and help things along a bit i've come up with some perks for you guys.

$1 may seem a small donation, but I know all too well, that sometimes it is all you can give.  Just think however, if everyone gave $1 how soon that would reach our goal.  by donating just a dollar and claiming this perk, I'll put a special thanks to you on my Facebook page, each and every one of you!
$5 donations will get your name added to a thank you list which is gonna be printed on a t-shirt we'll wear while in Florida at Worlds.
$10 will get your name on the t-shirt as above and i will also send you an ""I (heart) WPSCheer"" fridge magnet and personal thank you note from me on one of our postcards
$30 all of the above and your photo (sensible images only) on our website on the ""extra special fans"" page
$75 all of the above and a WPSCheer t-shirt with your name on the back along with the names of everyone else who's donated $5 or more.

$100 all of the above and a personal phone call or Skype call where I'll thank you over enthusiastically and you can ask me questions like ""what's your favourite food?"" ""How do you train for partner stunt?"" ""which was your favourite spice girl""
column2: >or anything else you can think of, and yeah you can even ask me questions about my disability if you want to

column1: $250 all of the above and your name and photo, or company name and logo, published on our website as one of our Sponsors
$300 + I'm open to suggestions, maybe you'd like a partner stunt lesson or to come over for dinner! contact me to discuss ideas before donating!

Please spread the word, share the request on Facebook, ask your friends and those at your gym, see if anyone at work is willing to chip in too.  Just get the word out there, returning to Worlds this year makes Wheelchair partner stunt more than just a gimmick, it makes it a reality and something that's worth keeping to give a lasting legacy for others in the future.

0,"

 

Modern Cyclist Apparel x Life-Saving Fashion

As members of the alternative transportation community, we couldn’t understand why we were forced to sacrifice fashion for function in order to stay safe when riding our bikes, scooters, or skateboards.

So, we did something about it.

In October 2015, we decided we were through complaining about the lack of clothing that combined safety and style, and we put our heads together to create a line of cyclist apparel that was fashionable and fun, with the ability to save lives of urban cyclists.

From there, Urban Circus was born.

Our high visibility jacket can reduce the risk of accidents on the road by 70% with its fluorescent and reflective technology, all without sacrificing fashion or comfort.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

Certifiably Safe Cycling

The Urban Circus High Visibility Cycling Jacket comes equipped with enough reflective and fluorescent material to keep you visible in any lighting condition, any time, day or night.

But don’t just take our word for it.

Our jacket complies with the European Standardisation Organisation (ESO) as certified protective visibility clothing for non-professional use (reference NF EN-1150), so you can ride with peace of mind every time you zip up.

 

 

Fluorescent Material for Daytime Commutes

Don’t risk your safety during your morning or afternoon rides.

The Urban Circus High Visibility Cycling Jacket features polyester fabric designed with specific pigments to capture invisible UV light that is emitted by the sun and is reflected through visible light.

By making the material appear more colorful and pairing the fluorescence with a contrasting fabric, the visibility of the jacket is increased under direct sunlight and low natural light, so you never need to worry about getting lost under cloud cover, fog, at dusk, or at dawn.

 

Retroreflective Material for Night Rides

Don’t just count on the red blink of your bike’s reflectors to keep you visible in the dark.

Our retroreflective material combines glass beads with a prismatic technology that join forces to reflect light back in the direction of its source (e.g. a car’s headlights) from any angle, so you’re always riding in the light.

column1:
Get the most out of your cycling apparel with two stylish jackets in one.

When your safety is on the line, use Urban Circus’ unique high visibility material to help you stand out from the crowd and reduce your risk of road accidents by 70%.

Trying to blend into the crowd? Shift gears and flip things inside out with a look that’s a little more discrete but just as fashionable — perfect for everyday wear.

 

Sometimes, you need a little extra storage.

With two large pockets in the front and an additional pocket in the back for added convenience, you never need to worry about finding a safe place to stash your valuables.

Need to stay connected on the go?

The left sleeve of the Urban Circus cycling jacket features a waterproof touchscreen pocket to keep you in the loop.

*Practice safe cycling. Don’t text and ride.

 

Putting pedal to the metal doesn’t mean you need to be a sweaty mess. 

Our jacket’s technology keeps you cool thanks to its breathable membrane, back ventilation, and underarm zips that kick perspiration to the curb.

 

 

 

Ride rain or shine thanks to our jacket’s hydrophilic polyurethane treated (PU) membrane that is impermeable to all liquids — even the heaviest of rainfalls — and watch dirt and water slide right off its durable coating.
Can I wash my Urban Circus Cycling Jacket?

Absolutely! Our jacket is treated with a Durable Water Repellent coating so dirt slides right off. When it comes time for a wash, simply turn the jacket inside out (dark side out), keep the water temperature low and avoid tumble drying.
What happens if the jacket doesn’t fit?
Hey, these things happen. Urban Circus will be happy to replace your jacket with the right size, free of charge.
What happens if I don’t like the jacket and want to return it?
We’re not going to lie — we’re pretty confident that you’re going to fall in love with this jacket. But, in the off chance it’s not for you, we guarantee to provide a full refund, no questions asked.
Where do you ship and how much does it cost?
We ship worldwide at a flat fee of $25 CAD. Good news for our Canadian and French friends — shipping is free to anywhere in these countries!
Is the Urban Circus cycling jacket breathable?
Yes! Our jacket’s technology keeps you cool thanks to its PU membrane, back ventilation, and underarm zips for extra breathability.
Can this jacket replace my bike lights?
No. Reflectors are required by law. Our ESO certified jacket is designed to increase your safety on the road while acting as a substantial addition and complement to your bicycle reflectors.
Can I get a discount if I order a large quantity?
Of course! If you would like to order more jackets than the quantities listed in our pledge options, please send us a message. We’ll be happy to work out a competitive deal for you.
We are so excited to bring Urban Circus to life and to help make roads safer for cyclists everywhere.

We’ll see you on the road!
The Urban Circus Team

GET YOUR FLUX HERE

www.fluxundies.com
 

 

FLUX is patent-pending underwear with a unique built-in protective panel. It completely replaces pads and tampons and can be worn alone. With over 10 features, FLUX is your go to underwear for periods, incontinence, postpartum, mobility issues, active wear, and everyday wear. Your all-in-one panty.
column2: >

column31:
> 
Eco-friendly, machine washable, anti-microbial, comfortable, leak-proof, four-way stretch, moisture wicking, and detachable. What more could you look for in one pair of pants!

column5:
> 
Every woman has used a disposable pad or tampon. Yet, most of us don't know what's in them. Manufacturers of pads and tampons are not legally required to disclose the ingredients in their products - yet most of them contain chemicals and irritants. We've got nothing to hide.
Our undies are kind to your skin and eco-friendly.
column14:
> 
Buy yours, and help her with our #ByYouForHer mission. Every backer will be listed on our website to show the world how many people have supported the cause.

Our names are Luke Nash-Jones and Martin Costello. We are relatively well-known in the British patriotic community for our promotion of Brexit and our fondness for the Donald. You may know our news channel the RedPill Factory.
Many people want one of our bright red MBGA baseball caps, modelled so well by Nigel Farage, Gavin McInnes, and Raheem Kassam.
Now is your chance to get your very own.

Details: Bright red cotton MBGA cap, featuring embroidered white text (a bit smaller than on some of the prototypes) boldly stating ""Make Britain Great Again"", with the MBGA lion on the side, signed by the team, and supplier dependent, likely featuring an adjustable strap on the back. There may be a Union Jack motif too if possible. These caps are a one-size-fits-all item.

To supply these hats at an affordable price (after production costs, and shipping the hats to ourselves, we won't be making much, which is awkward with our camera and other alternative journalism costs), we need to make a bulk order of a few hundred.
We are sure there is a high demand for this incredible symbol of pride in Western civilisation. This is your chance to be one of the first fifty people to order a MBGA cap.

You will be making a bold statement for Western civilisation, as you tell the likes of Sadiq Khan that Britain is actually pleased to welcome Donald Trump. From now forward, MBGA caps, t-shirts, stickers, hoodies, as well as British flags and other patriotic items will be worn with pride.

We have professional graphic design software and experience. We are ordering hat samples to consider, eager for a good quality product. There is always a risk the suppliers won't want to provide such a patriotic niche item, but we have two suppliers offering currently, and we are determined to make this work.
Please use the Indiegogo share tools to get your friends to get a hat too! Let's make the 13th and 14th of July a magical weekend! God bless.

column8: >Oceanica Watch Company is a small watch company based on Long Island, New York. We have been around since early 2018 and have had Four succesful campaigns to raise funds to produce watches, you the enthusiasts really strive for in terms of Quality, Cut, Finish, Movement, Components, and Packaging - only we try to strive for the best possible price we can give our backers! This time around, we have gone even further and sourced an amazing custom case, dial, higher quality movement, and components which far exceed the quality of anything we have ever produced before. We are still keeping it affordable, and STILL improving the quality year upon year as we grow !
column10: >The giant manta ray is found worldwide in tropical, subtropical, and temperate bodies of water and is commonly found offshore, in oceanic waters, and near productive coastlines.
column11: >Mantas evolved from bottom-dwelling stingrays hence the name of our last successful dive watch, eventually developing more wing-like pectoral fins. The mouths of most rays lie on the underside of the head, while in mantas, they are right at the front. Manta rays and devil rays are the only ray species that have evolved into filter feeders.
column12: >A manta ray sighting is one of the most breathtaking experiences a diver can have. Watching such an enormous ray glide through the ocean with such grace and effortlessness, it’s easy to fall for the manta’s spell.
column16: >The Manta Ray Takes Key Characteristics and design language from the early 1960s Skin Divers, we have applied modern materials and design to a true and tested dive style watch! This design was super popular in the 1960s for amazing comfort and versatility on the wrist. I really do love and enjoy vintage divers from the past - especially from the 60-70s era of swiss made skin divers. This is one of the main reasons why I chose to custom make this case with modern materials, a great robust movement materials. This is the kind of watch that will last a lifetime if taken care of properly. It is something that one day you can hand down to your children and still have a bit of the past!
column24: > The Manta Ray case was custom built to our specifications and fits a wide variety of wrist sizes. The idea of the Manta Ray was to combine a vintage aesthetic dive case and incorpororate it into a modern dive watch with modern elements and parts. The case is crafted of the industry standard for well built timepieces, solid 316L Stainless Steel and features mirror polishing on the sides of the case while the top portion including the caseback are finely brushed, without any sharp edges or error. This is a true dive watch and is water pressure tested in our factory to 200 Meters, the standard for a true diving watch. The case also features a beautifully signed Manta Ray screwed down crown and caseback with proper sealing for that 200 Meters. Instead of a standard etched caseback, we created a 1:1 embossed moulded caseback of the Manta Ray which features amazing detail and is quite visuaully appealing to the eyes. Now, the dimensions are what most dive enthusiasts are looking for - a standard 40MM case diameter, a 47.5MM lug to lug distance, and a very slim profile of just 11.8MM in thickness. My wrist is 6.5"" which is not too big...and this thing wears perfectly across and conforms like a glove, with extreme comfort! Comfort is key when it comes to a well built timepiece because hey, you will be wearing it a lot! In between the lugs it is 22MM - which can accomodate numerous straps from any company you wish. However, considering the comfort of these rubber straps we have produced, I do not think you will be needing one! Below is an illustration after the cases were cut for our prototypes, and are in the cooling proccess before being brushed and further polished, much grease is needed in the cooling process of metal so the photo is a bit dirty!
column28: >FREE TROPIC GENUINE CUSTOM RUBBER QUICK-RELEASE BAND! $30 VALUE!
column32: >
column35: >We have chosen to go with our most popular color choices from past Oceanica campaigns and customer requests, Blue and Black. The dials are matte finished and extremely legible, allowing the end user to tell the time at a glance, whether diving or just working in the office. The markers and bold, bright, and hand applied. Both dial options feature Swiss Made BGW9 Lume, which has a blue glow to it, and is filled in deep. The lume is potent, long-lasting, and done extremely well. This is something I know most enthusiasts need and strive for - which is why we went the extra mile not to only fill the markers with BGW9 lume, but also fill the bezel with BGW9 lume! It is a bit more expensive than layering on a printed dial, but it is well worth it in my opinion and gives off a much stronger and potent glow which will last you the night. A nice reference to the old dive watches of the mid 1900's is the red ""MANTA RAY"" text on the black matte dial, which was featured on some of the first true tool dive watches of mechanical watches. The bezel itself is 120 Clicks , and can be used to time up to 60 minutes for diving...or whatever it is you may want to time! The hands are also vintage like in their broad pointer shape mimicking early dive watches of some other famous swiss brands as well. However, this is truly our design - and this is not a homage watch or anything of that nature. Lastly, we have included a genuine Sapphire crystal with inner anti-reflective coating x3 for increased legibility and crisp time telling.
column43: > This is a big release for Oceanica as we have really stepped up in the movement department! Our other 4 watches did use the NH35 movement, which is a great and reliable movement of course - but the Japanese Made Miyota 9015 caliber is such a great and robust movement, it is even considered to be a competitor to the Swiss Made ETA 2824 movement by watch journalists. This movement features beautifully striped mainplates, 26 jewels, a beat rate of 4 HZ ( 28,800 Beats Per Hour ) which allows the seconds hand to sweep so smooth as any watch can. The accuracy also is quite consistent on these movements and the prototypes are keeping within +2 seconds per day! This is great news and I am really happy to be providing this movement to our backers in such an affordable package. If you take a look around , dive watches with this movements can be upwards of 600 USD! We are all about pleasing our customers, and by providing excellent value for money is just one way we can help give back to the watch community.
column44: >SELF ADJUSTABLE CUSTOM RUBBER DEPLOYANT BAND
column47: > A true dive watch should be on a nice rubber band, and adjustable. That is just what we have done this time around. We designed a custom Oceanica deployant clasp signed with our branding! This strap has a nice checkered design and side taper. The clasp itself is milled out of solid 316L Stainless steel, and is really tough! The two button action to release the band is solid and clicks down firmly, something DEFINITELY needed on a watch which will accompany you in the depths of the ocean. The band can be adjusted without tools by a clamp mechanism and can fit up to a 9 inch wrist. Also, It is extremely flexible and comfortable straight out of the box. I am one to really dislike rubber bands that are stiff and dont conform well..well I would not make something that fits like that either!
column49: >PACKAGING - CUSTOM HANDMADE WOOD BOX
column51: >Our standard Oceanica custom hand made wood box will be provided with each Oceanica Manta Ray. The logo is embossed into the wood and gives it a nice beachy, dive watch feel if you know what I mean. It can be used to store other items such as straps as well. Inside you will receive your custom Oceanica Metal 1 year warranty card as well as any extra bands from the campaign. The top slides in and out with the push of a thumb!
column53: > Each Watch will come with a Signed and Dated 1 Year Warranty card
column54: >valid upon delivery of watch - We have been able to solve most small problems which happen very rarely by working closely with a watchmaker near our residence.
column55: >SHIPPING - FREE WORLDWIDE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING WITH TRACKING
column56: > All Manta Rays will be shipped Internationally for FREE included with your purchase. We do use USPS International priority and from the past 1000 watches we have shipped it usually takes around 7-9 business days, which is pretty good for these times. In the USA USPS Priority insured mail will take around 2-5 Business days and is rather quick, reliable, and easy to track.
column57: >REVIEWS BY THE WATCH PROS
column67: >CONTACT US AT ANY TIME!

Introducing Komrads APL:

A high-quality sneaker entirely built out of re-used, recycled materials and… apples!

Important: This is a flexible campaign, meaning if you buy now at a 35% discount (89 euro iso 139 euro), you will surely get your shoes at the end of our campaign.

So please support us on the path to zero impact!
column2:
>

Our Story

About 2 years ago Mark &
column3:
Greet, the founders of Komrads, had a dream:

A dream to make a sneaker with the lowest possible impact on the planet we live on, a sneaker where no natural commodities had to be harvested.

A sneaker where no animals had to be killed or harmed, where no rain forests had to be burned down and replaced by huge rubber plantations!

A sneaker that is a genuine solution to the problem!
column4:
>

It took us more than a year of thinking out of the box, as well as trial and error. Now, we are proud to present our newest collection: Komrads APL:

column1: • The upper is made of Apple Eco Leather. The production of apple products is faced every year with a significant amount of waste. This waste, mostly Apple peel and core, is developed into a new raw material. The result is a durable high-quality alternative to leather with at least 50% of recycled apple fiber.- 100% vegan.
• The sole is made of 100% recycled rubber from car tires, colored with ecological paint
• The laces are made of recycled plastic bottles
• The inner sole is ergonomic, breathable and made out of recycled materials
• To control our ecological footprint, we are producing in Europe, so we limit our international transport to an absolute minimum! No social unacceptable working conditions.

column2: >We are proud to present our first Komrads APL collection:
column4:
>

About the project owner

We are Greet and Mark - two sneaker addicts and world lovers! We have been providing quality footwear for a few years through our Komrads brand. 

Our four children and their future is the main inspiration behind our advocacy on environmental awareness. We contribute to the change of the fashion industry, one of the most polluting industries we have. Support us and be part of the solution.
column5:
>

What are the funds for?

Pre-orders will allow us to finance the production of this new product line. Our main development costs will come from the fabrication of mold and the high minimum order of our raw material suppliers. 

If we go beyond this initial objective, we will be able to build a stock inventory and create new designs shortly.

Become a part of changing our world for the better. Order a pair of Komrads APL today to get a special launch price. 

 

Order Today!

column4: >We are told that we must dress a certain way, move in ways that won't provoke negative attention
column5: our society and media often teach us that we need to respectfully translate ourselves into the ""norm"" or we become ostracized or attacked. Those who fall outside of expected gender roles are cast as deviant, black &amp
column6: PoC bodies are frequently deemed ""threatening"" by their very existence, and survivors of sexual assault are typically blamed for inviting their attackers by virtue of what they were wearing. Often,
column9: > it feels safer not to be ourselves.

column2: >The moment we choose to love we begin to move against domination, against oppression. The moment we choose to love we begin to move towards freedom, to act in ways that liberate ourselves and others.

column4: >We wanted to use our first Spring Up Bow Ties look book to showcase people who express their self-love through their style. Style is not the only way to express self-love, and it is not accessible to many for lack of emotional and financial support
column5: yet those who choose to express their self-love through style are a visual reminder to the rest of us that loving ourselves is the first step towards liberation.

column4: >Spring Up creates a space for learning and healing around issues of violence in higher education. You can learn more about our work at timetospringup.org. We created a bow tie line, Spring Up Bow Ties, to fund our work so we can be sustainable and self-sufficient
column5: all proceeds from Spring Up Bow Ties go to support our mission. You can check out our bow tie shop at springupbowties.com. We're launching our nonprofit later this fall, but we're making a lookbook to showcase our Fall/Winter 2014 Bow Tie Collection this month in Wynwood, Miami.

column1: In a world that takes so much away from us, we have to be intentional about giving back to ourselves. Our bow ties are a metaphor for self-care
column2: style is not necessarily just style, it is a way to invest in yourself. We make something affirming you can wear, but it’s important to take that further in your life.

column1: Our lookbooks take place in a fantastical world where many styles can coexist and difference or uniqueness is seen as an asset to the community. The Wynwood murals are the perfect location to depict that fantastical world filled with vibrant street styles showcasing our hand-sewn free-style bow ties for our first full collection.

Be sure to check out the gallery to see some of what we have put together so far!

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

We're ready to shoot the lookbook at the end of August, and roll out the collection in mid-September. We put together an amazing team in Miami, including a stylist, photographer, models, and production staff who are willing to donate their time to this project so your support goes exclusively to the nuts and bolts of pulling this off!  We've cut our expenses down to an operating budget of $2,500 for four days of preparation and shooting.

column1:
• For $5, we'll thank you and shout out your support on social media. 
  • For $10, we'll send you a Spring Up bumper sticker of our logo and a social media shout out

• For $25, we'll send you a copy of the lookbook, a bumper sticker and thank you on social media
  • For $100, we'll send you a bow tie from our current stock, the lookbook, a bumper sticker, and thank you on social media
• For $250, we'll include you or a loved one as a sponsor in the lookbook,  send you a bow tie from our current stock, the lookbook, a bumper sticker, and thank you on social media

Other Ways You Can Help

      Support this project by sharing across social media platforms, and by connecting with us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter!

Those who fall outside of expected gender roles are cast as deviant, black & PoC bodies are frequently deemed ""threatening"" by their very existence, and survivors of sexual assault are typically blamed for inviting their attackers by virtue of what they were wearing. Often, it feels safer not to be ourselves.

column1: The moment we choose to love we begin to move against domination, against oppression. The moment we choose to love we begin to move towards freedom, to act in ways that liberate ourselves and others.

We wanted to use our first Spring Up Bow Ties look book to showcase people who express their self-love through their style. Style is not the only way to express self-love, and it is not accessible to many for lack of emotional and financial support

~My Story~

My name is Lauren Saraswati Zavlunov.
An  ever aspiring Yogini. Mother. Jewelry Designer. Musician. Educator. Explorer.

Ever since I can remember, I have been enamored with stones of all kinds. Childhood found me collecting pebbles and artifacts from every sojourn - tumbling them repeatedly in my hands and treasuring them deep in my pockets.

Today, designing beautiful jewelry with a deep spiritual and emotional message has blossomed into a practice for me. Motherhood, the Divine feminine, and spirituality are all inspirations for my collections.  I specialize in creating custom malas for meditation, but have been also very drawn to creating unique jewelry collections to not only bring joy and light to me personally through their creation, but to share that light with my clients and the world.

I hope that my work brings you a little slice of peace, a touch of inspiration, a dream of the exotic, and a gentle reminder to nurture your own goals and life intentions. Jewelry can be intensely personal: handed down from mother to daughter, gifted to friends and lovers as they share their life journeys…and I am so honored to have my work be a part of your stories. My hope now is that you will be a part of mine.

My heart is brimming with ideas and I have yearned for a chance to start a full collection that explores all seven chakras (or energy points) within the body.

I have been asked many times by clients for chakra charms to add to malas, or necklaces and bracelets. Every time I searched for a design out there I never found one that really resonated with me. I would love to bring a sleek and simple design into being that lets the ancient Sanskrit symbols speak for themselves.


~My Goal~

My goal is to create a beautiful and delicate small charm of each Sanskrit symbol for the seven chakras. If my financial goal is not reached to create all seven, I will explore as many chakras as I can!


~Be a Part of the Journey~

Help me start this beautiful journey! Many may not know the capital needed to create a full collection. Jewels of Saraswati is single woman owned (and run!) business and every aspect of your jewelry touches my hands. Without assistance, I would not be able to create more than one charm. My dream is to launch all 7 charms as a collection so that customer can choose which chakra resonates most with them at a given time.

Every piece I create is not only an artistic journey but a spiritual and emotional one. I have already sketched the design for each charm/pendant to be created. My aim is the blend the joy and mystery of spirituality with a chic and minimal design and, as I move Jewels of Saraswati further into eco-friendly initiatives, I would like to cast this design in recycled silver and offer it as part of an eco-conscious collection.

Your contribution will assist me in the physical creation of these designs, one that I know will resonate with so many people both in the Yoga community and beyond!!


~How Your Contribution Will Be Used~

Your contribution will assist in getting this design through the early stages of creation all the way to creating the first pendants and molds so that it can be cast to the finished necklace designs. Any left over funds will be used toward production of the pendants and any costs of launching the collection.

Your contribution will go directly towards:
CAD Designs (This means a designer will take my original sketches and create a 3D image in professional software.)
Wax Carvings- (artisans will then carve the wax from this image)
Molds for casting
Casting
Casting Labor
Polishing
Finishing
Materials (silver)
Shipping costs
Shipping materials

column1: Most pledges will receive a reward of gratitude and pieces from the present Jewels of Saraswati Collections! Scroll down to see all the pledge levels or look to the right column of this campaign page.
Pledge $10 and get a 20% off coupon to the shop!
Pledge $25- Infinity Arm Sari
A sterling silver infinity charm and beautiful turquoise and brown colored hand-dyed silk. Wraps around any sized wrist.
Pledge $55- Receive an Infinity Arm Sari AND One Pair of Sterling Silver Lotus and Rudraksha Earrings (A $118 value)
Pledge$100- Receive one pair of Lotus Earrings with Green Aventurine Gemstones AND Awakening Love Arm Sari with Peruvian Opal ($168 Value)
$200 Pledge- Receive one Sterling Sanskrit Love Necklace with Peruvian Opal, Emerald and Pink Tourmaline, Sterling Eco-Friendly Anahata Pendant  AND Infinity Arm Sari ($308 value)

$300 Pledge- Receive one Sanskrit Love Necklace with Opal, Emerald and Pink Tourmaline gemstones, one Sterling Anahata Heart Chakra Pendant, one Awaking Love Arm Sari with sterling lotus and Opal gemstone, AND one Infinity Arm Sari Silk Wrap bracelet.
Pledge $500- Be the first to receive the entire chakra collection when it is complete!

This collection is a big dream for me. Pledging $500 will bring you as close to the project as you can get!  You will be the absolute first to receive the entire collection of 7 chakra necklaces before it is presented to the public and before it is up on the site for purchase. You can stay in touch with me about the project and I will send you insider details about the stages of completion, photos and other fun anecdotes. Although I cannot promise a specific delivery date as there are many variables in creating the design, I estimate Spring 2014 at the latest.

In the event I do not reach my funding goal, and cannot create all the chakra necklaces, I will gift you as many chakra necklaces as I can produce in addition to a 108 bead custom mala with your choice of up to three gemstones.
*There may be restrictions on gemstones due to availability, pricing and design constraints. However, I will do my best to create the mala of your dreams!
You can see more about Jewels of Saraswati at www.jewelsofsaraswati.com and view some samples of my work in the gallery section of this campaign.

I am so grateful for each and every viewer of this message! If you feel you cannot contribute today, then please feel free to assist by sharing this link with others on Facebook, twitter and by using the ""share this campaign"" link at the top of the page. Spreading the word about this campaign is one of the best ways to help and will be so appreciated. This is a truly a dream for me!
My name is Lauren Saraswati Zavlunov. An  ever aspiring Yogini. Mother. Jewelry Designer. Musician. Educator. Explorer.

Ever since I can remember, I have been enamored with stones of all kinds. Childhood found me collecting pebbles and artifacts from every sojourn - tumbling them repeatedly in my hands and treasuring them deep in my pockets.Today, designing beautiful jewelry with a deep spiritual and emotional message has blossomed into a practice for me. Motherhood, the Divine feminine, and spirituality are all inspirations for my collections.  I specialize in creating custom malas for meditation, but have been also very drawn to creating unique jewelry collections to not only bring joy and light to me personally through their creation, but to share that light with my clients and the world. I hope that my work brings you a little slice of peace, a touch of inspiration, a dream of the exotic, and a gentle reminder to nurture your own goals and life intentions. Jewelry can be intensely personal: handed down from mother to daughter, gifted to friends and lovers as they share their life journeys…and I am so honored to have my work be a part of your stories. My hope now is that you will be a part of mine.My heart is brimming with ideas and I have yearned for a chance to start a full collection that explores all seven chakras (or energy points) within the body. I have been asked many times by clients for chakra charms to add to malas, or necklaces and bracelets. Every time I searched for a design out there I never found one that really resonated with me. I would love to bring a sleek and simple design into being that lets the ancient Sanskrit symbols speak for themselves.~My Goal~My goal is to create a beautiful and delicate small charm of each Sanskrit symbol for the seven chakras. If my financial goal is not reached to create all seven, I will explore as many chakras as I can!~Be a Part of the Journey~Help me start this beautiful journey! Many may not know the capital needed to create a full collection. Jewels of Saraswati is single woman owned (and run!) business and every aspect of your jewelry touches my hands. Without assistance, I would not be able to create more than one charm. My dream is to launch all 7 charms as a collection so that customer can choose which chakra resonates most with them at a given time.Every piece I create is not only an artistic journey but a spiritual and emotional one. I have already sketched the design for each charm/pendant to be created. My aim is the blend the joy and mystery of spirituality with a chic and minimal design and, as I move Jewels of Saraswati further into eco-friendly initiatives, I would like to cast this design in recycled silver and offer it as part of an eco-conscious collection.Your contribution will assist me in the physical creation of these designs, one that I know will resonate with so many people both in the Yoga community and beyond!!~How Your Contribution Will Be Used~

Your contribution will assist in getting this design through the early stages of creation all the way to creating the first pendants and molds so that it can be cast to the finished necklace designs. Any left over funds will be used toward production of the pendants and any costs of launching the collection.

Your contribution will go directly towards:CAD Designs (This means a designer will take my original sketches and create a 3D image in professional software.)Wax Carvings- (artisans will then carve the wax from this image)Molds for castingCastingCasting LaborPolishingFinishingMaterials (silver)Shipping costsShipping materials

column4: >Ligneah is our new material made of soft wood.  Support our first production of Pixel-Wood Sneakers and other wood fashion accessories.

column5: >        The Italian award for green companies

column1: LA STAMPA: ""The"" Fifth Element ""has also arrived in the fashion world. Fabrics, leather, plastic and metal will henceforth share the privilege of being used to make clothes and accessories with wood.....""
IL SOLE 24 ORE: ""Fashion has another leather, made of laser, wood and cotton.....""
ELLE: ""Today we are faced with this new discovery: Ligneah, that is an extraordinary new material made from wood but ductile and plastic like leather.....""
MATERIAL CONNEXION ITALIA: "" After fabrics, leather, plastic and metal, soft wood is the fifth element of fashion

column2: >                                Vai alla Versione Italiana

column3: >Hello, my name is Marta Antonelli and I'm 26 years old. I design and create wood bags with my father. Over the last 12 months, I have experimented with the application of wood for producing bags and shoes.

column4: > ""Our strength is  in innovation - we turn wood into a soft and pliable material""
> How can we accomplish this seemingly impossible feat? Indeed, wood's rigid and heavy appearance belies its true nature.
>We processed a method whereby wood becomes flexible and soft. At this point, however, any further development will require your support.

> As I left the IED in June 2012, I pondered on fashion's traditional association with animal materials such as suede, python skin, and leather. What makes these materials so befitting for fashion? May it be their softness? Or is it perhaps their weaving and intricate pattern?

>For weeks, we searched for an eco-friendly material, recyclable, durable but soft at the same time - not disregarding those of plant origin - that could replace animal skin. All the sudden, it dawned on us: wood was our answer. Then we realized the first fashion accessories collection entirely in wood.
>
>This new ""skin"", Ligneah,  was created in September 2012 by Marcello and Marta Antonelli
column5: accessories were designed by   Marta Antonelli.  Ligneah is more than leather : is ecofriendly, cruelty-free, plant derived recyclable and there is no waste in the processing phase.

column4: >At the outset, we manually bonded extremely light wood sheets but our results were far from satisfactory -the material kept on breaking. We tried numerous approaches to no avail. Success was finally attained by laser-etching the wood sheets and bonding them with a natural material.

>We succeeded much to our surprise. Today, however, I can confidently claim that wooden shoes and bags are akin to those made of animal skin but for one minor yet very significant detail: their plant origin.

>We conducted laboratory tests to verify the level of wear and water resistance of our materials (waterproofing conferred by a water protection layer applied on wood). Once improved to overcome all tests and patented, our wooden skin was finally ready for use.

>Now we present Ligneah, a material made from thin sheets of wood, which are bonded to a fabric using an environment-friendly adhesive. Furthermore, to ensure the material is pliable and soft like leather, wood sheets are micro laser etched. Our ultimate goal is environmental preservation
column5: a tree will produce about 100 shoes and 200 bags
column6: what is more, the wood used comes from ethically managed forests in accordance with the whole ecosystem and, by planting a tree for every product sold, we return to the environment 300% more trees than those used
column7: all this thanks to an agreement with TreeNation. Our forest is located in Niger: http://www.tree-nation.com/forests/674

column4: >We introduce you our first Sneakers Collection: Pixel-Wood. The thin wood sheets, thanks to the laser engraving, become like a picture composed by small pixel.
>Our shoes are entirely made in wood and  with a latex sole
column5: they are available and in three different variety of wood (with a visible wood grain): walnut, orange or white multilaminar wood .

column4: >Our goal has been partially attained: we have created our first prototypes made entirely of wood and turned wood into a pliable material. However, this is not the end of the journey. Help us improve and continue our pursuit of eco-friendly materials. We require  Euro 10,000:
> To present our new limited edition collection of wooden shoes, bags and accessories.
>To fine-tune our material and conduct further experiments, improving the Ligneah brand.
>If you wish to contribute, please review our perks and choose the one you fancy the most
column5: no matter where your preference lies, your fashion choice will be a cruelty-free one. If you do not want to contribute with a perk, share this link with all your friends
column6: the greater the awareness, the easier it would be to make today's fashion a cruelty-free one.

column4: >On the other hand, do not hesitate to contact us should your blog deal with issues of environmental sustainability connected with fashion.
>Finally, if you are a retailer offering eco-friendly bags and accessories, please contact us to discuss a mutually beneficial collaboration.

column3: >

column4: > We can't ship outside Europe, our material is still at an early stage and we could have problem with customs , we can send only the first perk outside Europe: LIGNEAH WOOD SHEET. We apologize for the inconvenience.
>You will receive a 24x 24 CM wood sheet to use our material in your own project!

> Looking for an accessory designed for the eco-conscious women, lightweight yet elegant and indestructible? Take advantage of a 60% discount off the original price on this women's wallet available in five colors. We will plant a tree on your behalf in Niger and you shall receive the Tree Nation certificate.

>Perk 100 Euro:   “FEBE” MINI SHOPPER ON SALE Congratulations! You will receive a beatiful, small perforated bag in Ligneah fabric, limited edition, on sale (full price 140 €!) and available in various colours. Furthermore, you shall receive a certificate from Tree Nation attesting to the tree planted on your behalf in Niger.

>NATURE AT YOUR FEET! You can choose  the first sneakers model for man and woman made entirely in wood and latex. You can costumized it by choosing the type of wood and model (man or woman). For example: woman model with white multilaminar wood. Furthermore, you shall receive a certificate from Tree Nation attesting to the tree planted on your behalf in Niger.

> If you choose this perk, you will be among the selected few to receive our large shopper bag, limited edition, available in four colors: gray, green, light green or pink. Hurry up, it's on sale (full price 550 €)! Only 8 units available. Furthermore, you shall receive a certificate from Tree Nation attesting to the tree planted on your behalf in Niger.

>At checkout, you will not be able to provide: your size, man or woman model and type of wood.In about three weeks you will receive a message from us to request your shoe size, woman or man model and type of wood. We apologize for the inconvenience.
>Check out the length (in centimeters) of the sneaker you use to wear for be ensure to receive the right size.
>US men's sizes 6,5 -11 | US women's sizes 5 - 9,5 |. (Women with a shoe size above US 9,5 could use men's sizes
column5: we suggest choosing one size below your own). Half US sizes available.

column4: >EURO Men’s sizes : 39-45| | EURO   Women’s sizes: 35-41 (Women with a shoe size above 41 could use men's sizes
column5: we suggest choosing one size below your own). No EURO half measures available.

column2: e.g., US man / woman size or your EURO man / woman size)

column1: This is the amount of the postage to add for your area, you can add the shipping cost to the perk's contribution, or by making a different free contribution.

For example if you live in UK and select a Pixel Wood Sneakers perk, the contribution field will display €160. To add shipping costs you'll have to manually type in €180. If you're going to choose more perks, you can add the TOTAL postage to one of the contributions.
You can also find and follow Ligneah on:

column2: >

column1: 1) When can we choose the color of wood, or the Men/Women sneakers size?
A: Following the end of the project, backers will be contacted to confirm color choices and men/women size. So keep an eye out on your Indiegogo message box!
2)Are there any other colors / patterns available on Indiegogo?
No. For now we are only doing three colours: walnut, white multilaminar and orange multilaminar wood.
3) I would like to buy the accessories too, can I do that in 1 contribution?
A: Unfortunately, you will have to pay in 2 separate contributions.
4) I'd like to buy 2 or more Pixel Wood, can I pay extra using the same perk?
A: No, you would have to place them in a separate order.
5) Am I suppose to manually add shipping?
A: Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk.
6) I forgot to add the shipping costs. What to do?

A: No problem, just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the actual amount you need to pay. Select ""No perk, I just want to contribute."" Pay for it and done! Remember to make your payment by logging on to the same account with which you have performed the first purchase, so we can connect the two payments.
Ligneah è il nostro nuovo materiale composto da legno morbido. Aiutaci nella nostra prima produzione di Pixel-Wood: le prime sneakers in legno. Vi proponiamo altri accessori moda totalmente in legno.
IL Premio Italiano per le imprese green

LA STAMPA:     ""Il ""quinto elemento"" è arrivato anche nel pianeta moda. Tessuti, pelle, plastica e metallo dovranno d'ora in poi condividere il privilegio di essere utilizzati per realizzare abiti e accessori con il legno.....""
IL SOLE 24 ORE: ""La moda ha un'altra pelle, fatta di laser, legno e cotone.....""
ELLE: ""Oggi siamo di fronte a questa nuova scoperta: Ligneah, ovvero uno straordinario nuovo materiale ottenuto dal legno ma duttile e plastico come la pelle......""
MATERIAL CONNEXION ITALIA: "" Dopo tessuti, pelle, plastica e metallo, arriva il legno morbido: il quinto elemento della moda
Ciao, sono Marta Antonelli, ho 26 anni e insieme a mio padre disegno e creo borse di legno. Ho trascorso gli ultimi 12 mesi a sperimentare l’applicazione del legno nella produzione di borse e scarpe.
“L’innovazione è la nostra forza, il legno diventa morbido.”
Come è possibile? Non pensate solo al legno come un materiale rigido, pesante.
Abbiamo scoperto il modo di renderlo flessibile e morbido e vogliamo chiedervi un aiuto per continuare nel nostro lavoro.

Uscita dallo IED nel Giugno 2012 riflettevo sul fatto che la maggior parte della moda si focalizza su materiali di origine animale: pelle di camoscio, pitone, pelle di vitello. Cosa hanno questi materiali di origine animale che li rende così unici? La morbidezza? La tramatura?

Io e mio padre pensammo per settimane ad un possibile materiale ecologico, riciclabile, resistente ma allo stesso tempo morbido, magari anche vegetale, che fosse in grado di sostituire la pelle animale. Alla fine, ci venne in mente il legno!
Realizzammo la nostra prima linea di prototipi e ora siamo qui per chiedere il vostro supporto per produrre la nostra prima collezione.

Questa nuova ""pelle"",Ligneah, nasce nel Settembre 2012  dall’idea di Marcello e Marta Antonelli, gli accessori sono disegnati da Marta Antonelli.Le nostre borse e scarpe sono ecologiche, di origine vegetale e riciclabili.

Inizialmente, provammo ad applicare su alcuni fogli di legno, dei leggeri tagli a mano, ma il legno si spezzava. Continuammo molte altre volte fino a che non capimmo che la cosa migliore era creare sui fogli di legno delle trame con il laser e accoppiarli con un materiale naturale.
Non ci crederete ma ci riuscimmo, e oggi posso dire con sicurezza che scarpe e borse di legno sono molto simili alla pelle animale ma con l’unica differenza che provengono dai vegetali.

Abbiamo effettuato test di laboratorio per verificare il livello di usura e impermeabilità del nostro materiale (impermeabilità conferitagli da un protettivo ad acqua che noi applichiamo sul legno). Una volta superati tutti i test, la nostra nuova pelle era finalmente pronta.
Vi presentiamo Ligneah, ovvero un  materiale composto da sottili fogli di legno, accoppiati ad un tessuto  tramite un collante a basso impatto ambientale
column2: successivamente vengono effettuate sul legno delle micro incisioni  al laser
column3: ciò rende il materiale maneggevole e morbido come la pelle.

column1: Puntiamo  alla conservazione dell'ambiente:  con un albero si realizzano circa 200 borse e 100 scarpe. Il legno che utilizziamo, proviene da foreste gestite eticamente nel rispetto dell'intero ecosistema. Inoltre, piantando per ogni prodotto venduto, un albero, ne immettiamo nell’ambiente il 300% in più rispetto al nostro consumo e questo grazie all'accordo con TreeNation. Potete visitare virtualmente il nostro bosco che si trova in Niger: http://www.tree-nation.com/forests/674.

Ecco a voi la nostra prima collezione di sneakers: Pixel-Wood. Le abbiamo chiamate così perchè la lavorazione laser rende il legno composto da piccolissimi pixel, mantenendo le sue venature originali.
Le nostre scarpe sono interamente composte da legno e lattice
column2: sono disponibili in tre tipi di legno : noce (che ha le visibili venature tipiche del legno) multilaminare bianco e multilaminare arancione.

column1: Questi sono i nostri prototipi e grazie al vostro supporto, potremmo lanciare la nuova linea di sneakers in legno.

column2: >

column1: Il nostro obiettivo è stato in parte raggiunto: abbiamo creato i nostri primi prototipi completamente in legno, abbiamo reso il legno duttile, ma non vogliamo fermarci qui. Aiutaci a migliorare e continuare la ricerca di materiali ecosostenibili, ci servono 10.000 EURO per:
-          Presentare la nostra nuova collezione in edizione limitata di borse ed accessori in legno.
-          Perfezionare il nostro materiale ed effettuare nuove sperimentazioni, migliorando il marchio Ligneah.
Se volete aiutarci, date un’occhiata ai nostri premi e scegliete quello più vicino ai vostri gusti, farete una scelta alla moda ma allo stesso tempo cruelty-free.
Donare non è l'unico modo di aiutarci: diffondete questo link a tutti i vostri amici, più gente ci conosce e più avremo il modo di rendere la moda di oggi cruelty free.
Inoltre se possiedi un blog che tratta argomenti di moda ed ecosostenibilità econtattaci, saremo lieti di conoscervi.
Se siete invece dei rivenditori e vi interessano i materiali eco-sostenibili, contattaci, siamo pronti a collaborare con te.
COSA AVRANNO IN CAMBIO I NOSTRI SOSTENITORI:
Riceverai un foglio in legno laserato Ligneah di 24 x 24 CM da utilizzare come vuoi: sia che tu voglia semplicemente toccare con mano il nostro materiale sia utilizzarlo nei tuoi progetti.

Se volete avere un accessorio per donna ecosostenibile, leggero  ma allo stesso tempo indistruttibile ed elegante potete approfittare dello sconto sul prezzo originale (140 euro!).  Questo portafogli da donna è disponibile in cinque colori: grigio, arancione, verde, verde chiaro e rosso, tutti realizzati in frassino. Grazie a questo contributo, verrà piantato un albero a tuo nome in Niger e riceverai il certificato Tree Nation.

Complimenti! Riceverai una fantastica borsa piccola traforata in tessuto Ligneah  scontata (prezzo originale 280). Potrai inoltre scegliere il colore ma affrettati, poiché è in edizione limitata! In più riceverai il certificato di  Tree Nation che pianterà un albero a tuo nome in Niger! I colori disponibili sono: grigia con interno giallo, nera con interno turchese, verde chiara ed arancione. Tutte realizzate in frassino.
160 euro : PIXEL-WOOD LE NOSTRE SNEAKERS DI LEGNO:

LA NATURA AI TUOI PIEDI! Se hai deciso di supportarci con questo premio, vuol dire che sarai tra le prime persone al mondo ad avere ai piedi le nostre  sneakers realizzate interamente in legno e lattice: un ottimo sostituto alla pelle animale! Ma non finisce qui, in più riceverai il certificato di  Tree Nation che pianterà un albero a tuo nome in Niger! Puoi scegliere il modello (uomo o donna) e il tipo di legno utilizzato: noce (walnut wood), legno multilaminare bianco (white multilaminar wood) e legno multilaminare arancione (orange multilaminar). E' possibile abbinare tutti e tre i tipi di legno sia al modello femminile che maschile anche se non presenti nella foto (es. modello da donna con legno multilaminare bianco).

250 euro: Atlantea Borsa Grande Se scegli di supportarci con questo premio sarai tra i primi a ricevere la nostra shopper grande in edizione limitata e con un incredibile sconto (550 euro è il prezzo originale)! Atlantea è disponibile in quattro colori: nero, verde, verde chiaro o rosa. Affrettati sono solo 8! In aggiunta riceverai il certificato di  Tree Nation che pianterà un albero a tuo nome in Niger!
In Italia, per tutti i prodotti è prevista la spedizione gratuita.
COME SCEGLIERE LA DIMENSIONE DELLE NOSTRE SNEAKERS DI LEGNO:

Una volta arrivato al check out non avrai la possibilità di inserire il tuo numero di scarpe. Entro tre settimane riceverai una nostra e-mail in cui ti richiediamo la tua taglia. Ci scusiamo per il disagio.

Puoi scegliere il modello donna o uomo delle nostre sneakers in legno: ti suggeriamo di misurare la lunghezza in centrimetri della suola della sneaker che utilizzi abitualmente e vedere a che taglia corrisponde nella tabella in basso:

EURO Uomo: 39-45 | | EURO  femminile: 35-41 (Se una donna ha un numero di scarpe più grande di 41, è possibile utilizzare il dimensionamento degli uomini, ma noi suggeriamo di scegliere una taglia in meno). Non abbiamo mezze misure Euro.
(Si prega di essere molto specifico con le dimensioni, vale a dire USA Misura uomo / donna o la tua taglia europea uomo / donna)

Potete vedere le spese di spedizione per ogni paese, disegnate nella mappa sottostante, è possibile aggiungerle quando si seleziona il premio o in una donazione separata effettuata con lo stesso account.

Se per esempio vivete in Gran Bretagna e selezionate il premio Pixel Wood Sneakers, la finestra mostrerà €160. Per aggiungere €20 di spese di spedizione dovete scrivere nell'apposito spazio €180. Se selezionate più premi, potete aggiungere le spese di spedizione totali in uno dei due premi.
Potete trovare e seguire Ligneah anche su:

column2: >

column1: 1) Quando potrò scegliere il colore del legno o il modello Maschile o Femminile e la misura delle sneakers?
R: Alla fine del progetto sarete contattati per confermare il colore del legno, il modello Maschile o Femminile e la misura delle vostre sneakers. Controllate la casella di posta Indiegogo.
2) Ci sono altri colori/trame disponibili su Indiegogo?
R: No. Per il momento produciamo solo tre colori: noce, legno multi laminare bianco e arancione.
3) Vorrei comprare anche gli accessori, posso farlo in un unico premio ?
R: Sfortunatamente dovrai pagare I 2 premi separatamente.
4) Vorrei comprare 2 o più paia di Pixel Wood, posso pagare usando lo stesso premio?
R: No, dovrai ordinarle scegliendo due volte lo stesso premio.
5) Devo aggiungere manualmente le spese di spedizione ?
R: Sì, devi aggiungere le spese di spedizione all’inizio del premio selezionato.
6) Ho dimenticato di aggiungere le spese di spedizione. Come posso fare?

R: Nessun problema, clicca CONTRIBUTE NOW e inserisci la somma da pagare. Seleziona ""No perk, I just want to contribute."" Effettua il pagamento collegandoti con lo stesso account con il quale hai eseguito il primo acquisto, così possiamo collegare i due pagamenti ed è fatta.

","Ligneah is our new material made of soft wood.  Support our first production of Pixel-Wood Sneakers and other wood fashion accessories.
The Italian award for green companies

LA STAMPA: ""The"" Fifth Element ""has also arrived in the fashion world. Fabrics, leather, plastic and metal will henceforth share the privilege of being used to make clothes and accessories with wood.....""
IL SOLE 24 ORE: ""Fashion has another leather, made of laser, wood and cotton.....""
ELLE: ""Today we are faced with this new discovery: Ligneah, that is an extraordinary new material made from wood but ductile and plastic like leather.....""
MATERIAL CONNEXION ITALIA: "" After fabrics, leather, plastic and metal, soft wood is the fifth element of fashion.....""

Hello, my name is Marta Antonelli and I'm 26 years old. I design and create wood bags with my father. Over the last 12 months, I have experimented with the application of wood for producing bags and shoes.
""Our strength is  in innovation - we turn wood into a soft and pliable material""
How can we accomplish this seemingly impossible feat? Indeed, wood's rigid and heavy appearance belies its true nature.
We processed a method whereby wood becomes flexible and soft. At this point, however, any further development will require your support.

As I left the IED in June 2012, I pondered on fashion's traditional association with animal materials such as suede, python skin, and leather. What makes these materials so befitting for fashion? May it be their softness? Or is it perhaps their weaving and intricate pattern?

For weeks, we searched for an eco-friendly material, recyclable, durable but soft at the same time - not disregarding those of plant origin - that could replace animal skin. All the sudden, it dawned on us: wood was our answer. Then we realized the first fashion accessories collection entirely in wood.
This new ""skin"", Ligneah,  was created in September 2012 by Marcello and Marta Antonelli
column2: accessories were designed by   Marta Antonelli.  Ligneah is more than leather : is ecofriendly, cruelty-free, plant derived recyclable and there is no waste in the processing phase.

column1: At the outset, we manually bonded extremely light wood sheets but our results were far from satisfactory -the material kept on breaking. We tried numerous approaches to no avail. Success was finally attained by laser-etching the wood sheets and bonding them with a natural material.

We succeeded much to our surprise. Today, however, I can confidently claim that wooden shoes and bags are akin to those made of animal skin but for one minor yet very significant detail: their plant origin.

We conducted laboratory tests to verify the level of wear and water resistance of our materials (waterproofing conferred by a water protection layer applied on wood). Once improved to overcome all tests and patented, our wooden skin was finally ready for use.

Now we present Ligneah, a material made from thin sheets of wood, which are bonded to a fabric using an environment-friendly adhesive. Furthermore, to ensure the material is pliable and soft like leather, wood sheets are micro laser etched. Our ultimate goal is environmental preservation
column2: a tree will produce about 100 shoes and 200 bags
column3: what is more, the wood used comes from ethically managed forests in accordance with the whole ecosystem and, by planting a tree for every product sold, we return to the environment 300% more trees than those used
column4: all this thanks to an agreement with TreeNation. Our forest is located in Niger: http://www.tree-nation.com/forests/674

column1: We introduce you our first Sneakers Collection: Pixel-Wood. The thin wood sheets, thanks to the laser engraving, become like a picture composed by small pixel.
Our shoes are entirely made in wood and  with a latex sole
column2: they are available and in three different variety of wood (with a visible wood grain): walnut, orange or white multilaminar wood .

column1: Our goal has been partially attained: we have created our first prototypes made entirely of wood and turned wood into a pliable material. However, this is not the end of the journey. Help us improve and continue our pursuit of eco-friendly materials. We require  Euro 10,000:
-  To acquire and produce new material.
-   To present our new limited edition collection of wooden shoes, bags and accessories.
-  To fine-tune our material and conduct further experiments, improving the Ligneah brand.
If you wish to contribute, please review our perks and choose the one you fancy the most
column2: no matter where your preference lies, your fashion choice will be a cruelty-free one. If you do not want to contribute with a perk, share this link with all your friends
column3: the greater the awareness, the easier it would be to make today's fashion a cruelty-free one.

column1: On the other hand, do not hesitate to contact us should your blog deal with issues of environmental sustainability connected with fashion.
Finally, if you are a retailer offering eco-friendly bags and accessories, please contact us to discuss a mutually beneficial collaboration.

We can't ship outside Europe, our material is still at an early stage and we could have problem with customs , we can send only the first perk outside Europe: LIGNEAH WOOD SHEET. We apologize for the inconvenience.
You will receive a 24x 24 CM wood sheet to use our material in your own project!

Looking for an accessory designed for the eco-conscious women, lightweight yet elegant and indestructible? Take advantage of a 60% discount off the original price on this women's wallet available in five colors. We will plant a tree on your behalf in Niger and you shall receive the Tree Nation certificate.

Perk 100 Euro:   “FEBE” MINI SHOPPER ON SALE Congratulations! You will receive a beatiful, small perforated bag in Ligneah fabric, limited edition, on sale (full price 140 €!) and available in various colours. Furthermore, you shall receive a certificate from Tree Nation attesting to the tree planted on your behalf in Niger.

NATURE AT YOUR FEET! You can choose  the first sneakers model for man and woman made entirely in wood and latex. You can costumized it by choosing the type of wood and model (man or woman). For example: woman model with white multilaminar wood. Furthermore, you shall receive a certificate from Tree Nation attesting to the tree planted on your behalf in Niger.

If you choose this perk, you will be among the selected few to receive our large shopper bag, limited edition, available in four colors: gray, green, light green or pink. Hurry up, it's on sale (full price 550 €)! Only 8 units available. Furthermore, you shall receive a certificate from Tree Nation attesting to the tree planted on your behalf in Niger.

At checkout, you will not be able to provide: your size, man or woman model and type of wood.In about three weeks you will receive a message from us to request your shoe size, woman or man model and type of wood. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Check out the length (in centimeters) of the sneaker you use to wear for be ensure to receive the right size.
US men's sizes 6,5 -11 | US women's sizes 5 - 9,5 |. (Women with a shoe size above US 9,5 could use men's sizes

e.g., US man / woman size or your EURO man / woman size)

column1: This is the amount of the postage to add for your area, you can add the shipping cost to the perk's contribution, or by making a different free contribution.

For example if you live in UK and select a Pixel Wood Sneakers perk, the contribution field will display €160. To add shipping costs you'll have to manually type in €180. If you're going to choose more perks, you can add the TOTAL postage to one of the contributions.
You can also find and follow Ligneah on:
1) When can we choose the color of wood, or the Men/Women sneakers size?
A: Following the end of the project, backers will be contacted to confirm color choices and men/women size. So keep an eye out on your Indiegogo message box!
2)Are there any other colors / patterns available on Indiegogo?
No. For now we are only doing three colours: walnut, white multilaminar and orange multilaminar wood.
3) I would like to buy the accessories too, can I do that in 1 contribution?

6) I forgot to add the shipping costs. What to do?

Ligneah è il nostro nuovo materiale composto da legno morbido. Aiutaci nella nostra prima produzione di Pixel-Wood: le prime sneakers in legno. Vi proponiamo altri accessori moda totalmente in legno.
IL Premio Italiano per le imprese green

LA STAMPA:     ""Il ""quinto elemento"" è arrivato anche nel pianeta moda. Tessuti, pelle, plastica e metallo dovranno d'ora in poi condividere il privilegio di essere utilizzati per realizzare abiti e accessori con il legno.....""
IL SOLE 24 ORE: ""La moda ha un'altra pelle, fatta di laser, legno e cotone.....""
ELLE: ""Oggi siamo di fronte a questa nuova scoperta: Ligneah, ovvero uno straordinario nuovo materiale ottenuto dal legno ma duttile e plastico come la pelle......""
MATERIAL CONNEXION ITALIA: "" Dopo tessuti, pelle, plastica e metallo, arriva il legno morbido: il quinto elemento della moda.....""
Ciao, sono Marta Antonelli, ho 26 anni e insieme a mio padre disegno e creo borse di legno. Ho trascorso gli ultimi 12 mesi a sperimentare l’applicazione del legno nella produzione di borse e scarpe.
“L’innovazione è la nostra forza, il legno diventa morbido.”
Come è possibile? Non pensate solo al legno come un materiale rigido, pesante.
Abbiamo scoperto il modo di renderlo flessibile e morbido e vogliamo chiedervi un aiuto per continuare nel nostro lavoro.

Uscita dallo IED nel Giugno 2012 riflettevo sul fatto che la maggior parte della moda si focalizza su materiali di origine animale: pelle di camoscio, pitone, pelle di vitello. Cosa hanno questi materiali di origine animale che li rende così unici? La morbidezza? La tramatura?

Io e mio padre pensammo per settimane ad un possibile materiale ecologico, riciclabile, resistente ma allo stesso tempo morbido, magari anche vegetale, che fosse in grado di sostituire la pelle animale. Alla fine, ci venne in mente il legno!
Realizzammo la nostra prima linea di prototipi e ora siamo qui per chiedere il vostro supporto per produrre la nostra prima collezione.

Questa nuova ""pelle"",Ligneah, nasce nel Settembre 2012  dall’idea di Marcello e Marta Antonelli, gli accessori sono disegnati da Marta Antonelli.Le nostre borse e scarpe sono ecologiche, di origine vegetale e riciclabili.

Inizialmente, provammo ad applicare su alcuni fogli di legno, dei leggeri tagli a mano, ma il legno si spezzava. Continuammo molte altre volte fino a che non capimmo che la cosa migliore era creare sui fogli di legno delle trame con il laser e accoppiarli con un materiale naturale.
Non ci crederete ma ci riuscimmo, e oggi posso dire con sicurezza che scarpe e borse di legno sono molto simili alla pelle animale ma con l’unica differenza che provengono dai vegetali.

Abbiamo effettuato test di laboratorio per verificare il livello di usura e impermeabilità del nostro materiale (impermeabilità conferitagli da un protettivo ad acqua che noi applichiamo sul legno). Una volta superati tutti i test, la nostra nuova pelle era finalmente pronta.
Vi presentiamo Ligneah, ovvero un  materiale composto da sottili fogli di legno, accoppiati ad un tessuto  tramite un collante a basso impatto ambientale
column2: successivamente vengono effettuate sul legno delle micro incisioni  al laser
column3: ciò rende il materiale maneggevole e morbido come la pelle.

column1: Puntiamo  alla conservazione dell'ambiente:  con un albero si realizzano circa 200 borse e 100 scarpe. Il legno che utilizziamo, proviene da foreste gestite eticamente nel rispetto dell'intero ecosistema. Inoltre, piantando per ogni prodotto venduto, un albero, ne immettiamo nell’ambiente il 300% in più rispetto al nostro consumo e questo grazie all'accordo con TreeNation. Potete visitare virtualmente il nostro bosco che si trova in Niger: http://www.tree-nation.com/forests/674.

Ecco a voi la nostra prima collezione di sneakers: Pixel-Wood. Le abbiamo chiamate così perchè la lavorazione laser rende il legno composto da piccolissimi pixel, mantenendo le sue venature originali.
Le nostre scarpe sono interamente composte da legno e lattice
column2: sono disponibili in tre tipi di legno : noce (che ha le visibili venature tipiche del legno) multilaminare bianco e multilaminare arancione.

column1: Questi sono i nostri prototipi e grazie al vostro supporto, potremmo lanciare la nuova linea di sneakers in legno.

Il nostro obiettivo è stato in parte raggiunto: abbiamo creato i nostri primi prototipi completamente in legno, abbiamo reso il legno duttile, ma non vogliamo fermarci qui. Aiutaci a migliorare e continuare la ricerca di materiali ecosostenibili, ci servono 10.000 EURO per:
-          Presentare la nostra nuova collezione in edizione limitata di borse ed accessori in legno.
-          Perfezionare il nostro materiale ed effettuare nuove sperimentazioni, migliorando il marchio Ligneah.
Se volete aiutarci, date un’occhiata ai nostri premi e scegliete quello più vicino ai vostri gusti, farete una scelta alla moda ma allo stesso tempo cruelty-free.
Donare non è l'unico modo di aiutarci: diffondete questo link a tutti i vostri amici, più gente ci conosce e più avremo il modo di rendere la moda di oggi cruelty free.
Inoltre se possiedi un blog che tratta argomenti di moda ed ecosostenibilità econtattaci, saremo lieti di conoscervi.
Se siete invece dei rivenditori e vi interessano i materiali eco-sostenibili, contattaci, siamo pronti a collaborare con te.
COSA AVRANNO IN CAMBIO I NOSTRI SOSTENITORI:
Riceverai un foglio in legno laserato Ligneah di 24 x 24 CM da utilizzare come vuoi: sia che tu voglia semplicemente toccare con mano il nostro materiale sia utilizzarlo nei tuoi progetti.

Se volete avere un accessorio per donna ecosostenibile, leggero  ma allo stesso tempo indistruttibile ed elegante potete approfittare dello sconto sul prezzo originale (140 euro!).  Questo portafogli da donna è disponibile in cinque colori: grigio, arancione, verde, verde chiaro e rosso, tutti realizzati in frassino. Grazie a questo contributo, verrà piantato un albero a tuo nome in Niger e riceverai il certificato Tree Nation.

Complimenti! Riceverai una fantastica borsa piccola traforata in tessuto Ligneah  scontata (prezzo originale 280). Potrai inoltre scegliere il colore ma affrettati, poiché è in edizione limitata! In più riceverai il certificato di  Tree Nation che pianterà un albero a tuo nome in Niger! I colori disponibili sono: grigia con interno giallo, nera con interno turchese, verde chiara ed arancione. Tutte realizzate in frassino.
160 euro : PIXEL-WOOD LE NOSTRE SNEAKERS DI LEGNO:

LA NATURA AI TUOI PIEDI! Se hai deciso di supportarci con questo premio, vuol dire che sarai tra le prime persone al mondo ad avere ai piedi le nostre  sneakers realizzate interamente in legno e lattice: un ottimo sostituto alla pelle animale! Ma non finisce qui, in più riceverai il certificato di  Tree Nation che pianterà un albero a tuo nome in Niger! Puoi scegliere il modello (uomo o donna) e il tipo di legno utilizzato: noce (walnut wood), legno multilaminare bianco (white multilaminar wood) e legno multilaminare arancione (orange multilaminar). E' possibile abbinare tutti e tre i tipi di legno sia al modello femminile che maschile anche se non presenti nella foto (es. modello da donna con legno multilaminare bianco).

250 euro: Atlantea Borsa Grande Se scegli di supportarci con questo premio sarai tra i primi a ricevere la nostra shopper grande in edizione limitata e con un incredibile sconto (550 euro è il prezzo originale)! Atlantea è disponibile in quattro colori: nero, verde, verde chiaro o rosa. Affrettati sono solo 8! In aggiunta riceverai il certificato di  Tree Nation che pianterà un albero a tuo nome in Niger!
In Italia, per tutti i prodotti è prevista la spedizione gratuita.
COME SCEGLIERE LA DIMENSIONE DELLE NOSTRE SNEAKERS DI LEGNO:

Una volta arrivato al check out non avrai la possibilità di inserire il tuo numero di scarpe. Entro tre settimane riceverai una nostra e-mail in cui ti richiediamo la tua taglia. Ci scusiamo per il disagio.

Puoi scegliere il modello donna o uomo delle nostre sneakers in legno: ti suggeriamo di misurare la lunghezza in centrimetri della suola della sneaker che utilizzi abitualmente e vedere a che taglia corrisponde nella tabella in basso:

EURO Uomo: 39-45 | | EURO  femminile: 35-41 (Se una donna ha un numero di scarpe più grande di 41, è possibile utilizzare il dimensionamento degli uomini, ma noi suggeriamo di scegliere una taglia in meno). Non abbiamo mezze misure Euro.
(Si prega di essere molto specifico con le dimensioni, vale a dire USA Misura uomo / donna o la tua taglia europea uomo / donna)

Potete vedere le spese di spedizione per ogni paese, disegnate nella mappa sottostante, è possibile aggiungerle quando si seleziona il premio o in una donazione separata effettuata con lo stesso account.

Se per esempio vivete in Gran Bretagna e selezionate il premio Pixel Wood Sneakers, la finestra mostrerà €160. Per aggiungere €20 di spese di spedizione dovete scrivere nell'apposito spazio €180. Se selezionate più premi, potete aggiungere le spese di spedizione totali in uno dei due premi.
Potete trovare e seguire Ligneah anche su:
1) Quando potrò scegliere il colore del legno o il modello Maschile o Femminile e la misura delle sneakers?
R: Alla fine del progetto sarete contattati per confermare il colore del legno, il modello Maschile o Femminile e la misura delle vostre sneakers. Controllate la casella di posta Indiegogo.
2) Ci sono altri colori/trame disponibili su Indiegogo?
R: No. Per il momento produciamo solo tre colori: noce, legno multi laminare bianco e arancione.
3) Vorrei comprare anche gli accessori, posso farlo in un unico premio ?
R: Sfortunatamente dovrai pagare I 2 premi separatamente.
4) Vorrei comprare 2 o più paia di Pixel Wood, posso pagare usando lo stesso premio?
R: No, dovrai ordinarle scegliendo due volte lo stesso premio.
5) Devo aggiungere manualmente le spese di spedizione ?
R: Sì, devi aggiungere le spese di spedizione all’inizio del premio selezionato.
6) Ho dimenticato di aggiungere le spese di spedizione. Come posso fare?

R: Nessun problema, clicca CONTRIBUTE NOW e inserisci la somma da pagare. Seleziona ""No perk, I just want to contribute."" Effettua il pagamento collegandoti con lo stesso account con il quale hai eseguito il primo acquisto, così possiamo collegare i due pagamenti ed è fatta.",52.0,0,"1 Campaign
