We're delighted to see so many articles about LIVALL! That way, more people can have the chance to learn about LIVALL Smart Cycling Helmet.
iPhoneness: LIVALL Smart Cycling Helmet with HR, SOS, Walkie-Talkie
Upwire:  LIVALL Sets New Smart Helmet Standard for Cyclists
newson6:  LIVALL Introduces Latest Indiegogo Campaign, Launches Series of Smart Helmets
Cool Wearable: LIVALL BH81H Smart Cycling Helmet with HRM

Q: How do I use the helmet's functions?A: To use functions like the heart rate monitor, SOS Alert, and data sharing, download the LIVALL Riding App.Q: How do I get the LIVALL Riding App?A: It's free in Apple's App Store and Google Play Store, or you can go to http://www.LIVALL.com/appdownload/ and follow the instructions to download it. You can log in with your Facebook account, or sign up for a LIVALL account using the App.Q: How do I charge a LIVALL product?                                  A: Connect a standard Micro USB at the back of the helmet below the indicator. Q: What material is the helmet made of?A: This helmet is light, made from US-manufactured EPS foam which is bonded by PC to create a helmet which is durable and can resist high-speed impact by. The LIVALL helmet has been awarded many safety certifications such as BQB, CPSC (US), FCC ID (US), CE (EU), EN1078 (EU), AS/NZS2063 (AU), C-TICK (AU), ROHS. Thanks to the air circulation design inside the helmet, it also keeps you cool!  Q: How long does the LIVALL battery last?A: The batteries inside LIVALL Road Bike Helmet and Mountain Bike Helmet are built to last on average up to Max. 10hrs for lighting and 3-6hrs for music + lighting.Q: I remember LIVALL launched a campaign on indieGOGO last year. So what is the difference between the previous campaign and this one now?A: LIVALL did launch another campaign last year on IndieGOGO for a different model BH100 and accessories like charging phone holder and cadence sensor. This time we introduce our latest models BH81H(for road bike) with additional heart rate monitor, and MT1(for mountain bike) which is much lighter in weight(310g) than the former BH100. Besides, the connection between the helmet and other devices has been greatly simplified with much better user experience! Q: How can i choice the size and color?A: We'll send you an email for final confirmation of your helmet size and color choices before shipment.",64.0,3,"2 Campaigns

column2:
>INTRODUCING RENEWED APPAREL

We’re going to let you in on a little secret. Not everything that gets thrown away is trash.  In fact, a lot of what ends up in landfill looks like this:
column3:
>

Instead of becoming your favorite weekend shirt or a puffy jacket keeping you warm as you climb to the top of Mt Hood, these clothes and millions like them, are sent to landfills.
column6: >We're fixing all of this needlessly discarded apparel and creating a brand new product category called:
column8: >This is your first chance to get your hands on it!
column9:
>The Renewal Workshop transforms slightly damaged, excess and returned apparel from top brands such as:

We renew everything from outerwear to casual shirts to pants to dresses. We receive these items in bulk from our brand partners.  Each item is inspected, graded, repaired (if necessary), cleaned, and labeled. Every piece of Renewed Apparel is one-of-kind and always certified to the quality standards of the original brand.

We love this planet. We also love the people who work hard to design and make great things. Little problems like broken zippers and missing buttons should not destroy all the natural resources, time, labor, creativity and care that go into making something. Good clothing should be part of our lives, not our landfill. 

With a single click, you can be part of converting the mountains of discarded items trashing our planet into that perfect outfit for your next yoga class, ski trip, family hike, or date night.
column10: >Do something good. Get something great.
column11:
>Renewed in America

The Renewal Workshop isn't just renewing clothing. We're also restoring jobs, specifically, new sustainable manufacturing jobs here in the US. All of our great perks are made in our new factory, in a town called Cascade Locks, Oregon.  This is the first of many renewal facilities that we are planning to open across the country.

column4: >WallX. More Features. More Functionality. Less Wallet.

column1: WallX's elasticity keeps all of its contents secure - even if it's shaken upside down. It's also washable, leaving you free to take it with you wherever you go.
WallX offers more functionality than any other wallet available

column2: >Black WallX color logo options: white, grey, blue, green, pink

column6: >With multiple style and color options, there's a WallX for everyone

column2: >A Cautionary Tale: The Coffee Shop Story
>My friend and I were at our local coffee shop one afternoon last year. As I left, I

column1: realized I forgot my wallet on the table inside. I panicked and ran back to the table, but when I got there,
it was already gone. I approached the barista and asked if they had found my
wallet. When she asked me to describe it, I tried to be as precise as possible,
but she still wanted more details. To my relief, she handed me my wallet and
explained why I had to be so specific
column2: there had been nine wallets left in the

>This made me realize something important that we usually don’t think about: Both men and women carry oversized, inconvenient wallets.  Like myself, many men remove them from their pockets while sitting to avoid discomfort. In doing so, we take the risk of forgetting them and leaving them on desks, tables, and dashboards. Women often carry their heavy wallets in their purses, weighing down their shoulders and neck.

> After the coffee house experience, which was not the first time I forgot my wallet somewhere, I set out with the intention of finding a wallet that I could carry and sit on comfortably in my pocket.  This meant it had to be light, thin and still have high capacity to fit everything I needed inside. After a long and exhausting search, I realized that it just didn’t exist. So I set out to create my own solution, and that is how WallX™ began.

> But, it was no easy task. It took over a year to perfect my idea because I wanted it to be stylish, as well as functional and high capacity. I wanted my wallet to feel almost invisible, so I sought advice from several sewers, fashion designers, and fabric experts.

> A lot of science went into making WallX. It had to be light and small enough to fit into any pocket without being bulky or stiff, and hold everything that old fashioned wallets twice the size would hold. To achieve all of these features, I knew that I had to use the highest quality elastic available.
> It couldn’t be just any elastic
column3: it had to look sophisticated while being able to withstand vigorous wear and tear. I had to search around the U.S. to finally find what I felt was the perfect elastic that behaved and held up to my standards.  Because of its elastic material, WallX is able to expand and contract according to the users needs. As it stretches, WallX's elasticity keeps all of the users cards and bills securely inside.

column2: >It’s also washable, meaning it won’t be damaged by sweat or water, leaving the user free to carry it while working out, biking, motorcycling, golfing, hiking, at the beach, traveling – going anywhere and doing just about anything.

>With the help of some amazing designers, I was able to ensure WallX remained ultra-stylish, for both men and women, without sacrificing comfort and function. But that was not enough. I had to find sewers who could construct the wallets in a way that would make WallX functional, practical, and long lasting. Once I had what I thought was the perfect answer, I made samples to give to as many men and women as possible to try and give their feedback. The input we received from nearly everyone, was that the WallX made the everyday use of a wallet far easier to wear, much more comfortable and much more convenient—and it kept them more organized. For some, they even stated that it literally changed their lives!

>With your help, I want to launch WallX to the next level. Your contributions will cover production costs. I feel that WallX is truly on the cutting edge of wallet design, and with your support it will only get better. Every donation helps and is deeply appreciated. Thank you.

>In order to put WallX into as many pockets as possible, I designed the perks with affordability in mind. Because WallX would make a great gift for the upcoming holiday season, I will guarantee delivery before 12/25 if your donation is made before 12/1, and only if made through PayPal. Any donations after 12/1 will receive a WallX as timely as possible, but I cannot guarantee a delivery date. When making a donation, please include a memo with your desired delivery address as well as any color preference for your WallX.

column7: >Like us on Facebook to receive the most recent updates on WallX at www.facebook.com/WallXWallet.

column2: >Thank you to our wonderful production team for producing and editing our campaign video: Kellen and Alex of VitaLUX Entertainment.
>Thank you Lauren and Jeremy for hosting our campaign video.

column5: >Thank you Austin for designing the Indiegogo Campaign.

column2: >Thank you Jeff for all your help.
>Thank you Carol K. for all your advice.
>Thank you Patsy for being top dog.

column4: >Pepsom with YOU= A recordbreaking success

>How many times have you or your team wished for something that would help alleviate aching muscles, soothe away stress - all without having to take medications or drugs? PEPSOM, THE NEW GENERATION OF EPSOM SALT is affordable and effective. JOIN US and become part of an AMAZING SUCCESS STORY. BECOME A PART OF PEPSOM'S FOUNDATION. BECOME A REGISTERED CONTRIBUTOR TO THE PEPSOM .  JOIN OUR TOP SPORT PROFESSIONALS - be amongst the first to get involved and help to spread the word. You and your teams/ group can benefit in many ways. Pepsom is a special blend of natural mineral (magnesium sulfate) combined with 100% natural ingredients - a soaking aid that helps to alleviate sore muscles, aching feet, stiffness and stress. It is available right now on 20,000 shelves, but few people know of it until we launch our advertising. It is in the First Aid sections of all Walgreens, Kroger, Jewel-Osco, Cub Foods and 30 other chains (visit our website to see locations) and on www.WalMart.com, Target.com, Amazon.com, Drugstore.com, etc.and now in homes across America. It is in locker rooms of the NBA, NFL, U.S. Olympic Water Polo teams, NCAA athletes, coaches and athletic trainers. People are discovering Pepsom, becoming repeat customers and spreading the word. WITH YOU, PEPSOM WILL GET RECOGNITION as a key product for all pro and amateur sports teams.  See our testimonials below. Pepsom has the same potential as Arm &
column5: Hammer, because like Epsom salt, baking soda was just another commodity until it was branded - and it is now a multi $ Billion company. Once we are funded TOGETHER WE WILL BLAST ADVERTISING. So hurry to help now because many major investment companies will not want us to affiliate others later. The PEPSOM story may soon be broadcast by a major network, so it may be too late to get involved later. Read below to LEARN HOW TO GET YOUR TEAM/NAME CONNECTED FOREVER WITH PEPSOM, as one of the very first PEPSOM PARTICIPANTS.

column1: YOUR CONTRIBUTION WILL MAKE HISTORY in many ways. Everyone should LEARN ABOUT PEPSOM and it's vast benefits as soon as possible - We need you to help us make that happen NOW!<span style=""font-family: Arial

column4: >A former Coca-Cola analyst and CFO of Nabisco International/Richardson Vicks: ""Pepsom is the American Dream in Technicolor and will become a ""case study"" in Harvard Business School.""

>Gary Uribe former UCLA Asst. Athletic Performance Coach: ""John, thank you for providing me with samples of Pepsom Fire-Ice product. I have distributed these samples to a few of our football-athletes to utilize over the course of a 2-month period. The feedback I have received from those athletes has been very positive. They have reported that they have received relief from aches and pains and an overall improvement in muscle recovery. Thank you!""

>A gym owner wrote, ""We love the display. All of our parents are excited to know its available, and our head coach used it the the other night after she hurt her knee while teaching, and she says it was amazing. She says it beats Epsom salt hands down.""

column3: >Another customer wrote ""I'm a satisfied customer of Pepsom Sport Salt. I'm a former collegiate athlete. I was wondering how I could order BULK amounts of the Sport Salt? Please let me know if there is way to order BULK on-line or through a distributor. I'm dealing with numerous herniated discs in my back and I've found your product to be the BEST on the market.""
>These are just a few of the many unsolicited testimonials we've received.

>YOUR CONTRIBUTION CAN MAKE A TREMENDOUS IMPACT on AFFORDABLE HEALTH and WELLNESS, ATHLETIC/FITNESS RECOVERY, and also INCREASE U.S. manufacturing and jobs growth. LET'S MAKE CROWDFUNDING HISTORY. WITH YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS, it enables us to keep up the momentum to become another Red Bull, or Facebook-type of company - PEPSOM will CATCH ON FIRE"" with your help. PEPSOM NEEDS YOUR HELP TO BRING AWARENESS AND CONTRIBUTIONS for the company's GROWTH, ADVERTISING and completion of PEPSOM FUNDRAISING PROGRAM, which will enable teams and organizations to raise funds also.
column4: >Explanation: Once PEPSOM is funded, we are committed to the development of making the most dynamic new fundraising programs for SPORTS TEAMS, NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS, CHURCHES and other meaningful causes. So in addition to helping build Pepsom's brand awareness, you are laying the groundwork for the Pepsom Fundraising Program, which will mean that AFTER WE LAUNCH THIS PROGRAM, WHENEVER YOUR TEAM NEEDS TO RAISE FUNDS FOR NEW UNIFORMS, TRIPS, ATHLETIC GEAR, YOU'LL BE ABLE TO SELL PEPSOM IN A BEAUTIFUL DISPLAY- NO MORE CAR WASHES, or SELLING of PRODUCTS which people don't need or really want. Did your mom buy 10 boxes of something that she didn't need or want, just to help out? Pepsom is a soaking aid that virtually everyone needs! If the athletes use it after their games, imagine how effective it is for everyday aches and pains? Most people suffer occasionally from soreness and aching feet. It is effective for stress relief, also! Pepsom products retail for $3.00 - $6.50 (depending on size) - a price anyone can afford, perfect for retail and fundraising. By helping us to achieve our INDIEGOGO GOAL, the PEPSOM Fundraising Program can also begin right around the same time. See our displays here!

column5: >Once you contribute, your team will earn the right to be able to sign up for the PEPSOM FUNDRAISING PROGRAM. Even if you are not interested in fundraising, AS A PEPSOM CONTRIBUTOR YOU WILL BE LISTED FOREVER AS PART OF THE HISTORY OF PEPSOM. Besides donating, please use Facebook, YouTube(send videos of testimonials or show how Pepsom works for you.) Our interested people at CNN.com will also be alerted about this INDIEGOGO campaign.

column6: >Pepsom is the ""New Generation of Epsom Salt""

column5: >The Pepsom Group, recipient of ""2011 Emerging Business of the Year"" developed the first National brand of Epsom Salt for first aid and sports usage. We improved this age-old ""cure-all"" mineral and now YOU can be a part of Pepsom. a

>Join us to make ""Pepsom Sports"" become a household name by helping this young company fund operations, blast our PEPSOM marketing campaign, and to quickly form our PEPSOM Fundraising Program. Since the product is already on the shelves, together we'll ""light the fire"" under Pepsom! Even without advertising, it has already experienced a 63% growth in some retail chains. IMAGINE THE NEW GROWTH THAT YOU CAN CLAIM YOU PARTICIPATED IN - BRINGING PEPSOM AWARENESS TO SPORTS AND RETAIL WORLDS

>Our founders are John Brown, President with 30 years of retail experience leading to the vast distribution of Pepsom, and the Vice-President and Creative Director Miya Haag, whom created all marketing and designed the vibrant zip-lock pouches which now make the products ""pop"" in the midst of an otherwise dull first aid section.
>Our CFO has over 30 years of expertise with some of the top companies in the World.

>The Company's Advisory Board includes an Executive VP of a professional basketball team, Culp, mentioned above (athletic trainer of 4 U.S. and World Championship teams), former CFO of Nabisco Int'l, etc and 3 retired Senior Executives of Walgreens, Winn-Dixie chains and Perrigo
>In 2005 while we were working on another project, the Executive VP of 6,000 store retail chain approached Brown and said ""John, bring me Epsom salt, I can't keep it in stock!""
column7: >That was the beginning of a two year odyssey of R &amp
column8: D, contracting chemists, pouring our time, financial, other resources into Pepsom, and never even took a salary.

column4: >We created Pepsom- a new soothing blend with minerals, refreshing formulas with spearmint, wintergreen and peppermint - with 100% natural ingredients and an smooth-flow formula and brought it to the VP of a professional basketball team. Impressed, it was then brought to their head athletic trainer Ron Culp.   Culp already used 2000 lbs of this mineral per season with some other soothing ingredients. After further research, Pepsom Sports with wintergreen and spearmint blends were formulated. Culp and other major sports icons have SINCE joined the Pepsom Group.

column5: >Fast forward - Pepsom  has gained distribution in U.S. food, drug and mass retailers, the internet, and we need your help. It is in 20,000 stores, yet people only currently learn about Pepsom through word-of-mouth. Fortunately it is so effective that word is spreading, because once people use it, they never stop! THE SPORTS ICONS IN THE PEPSOM GROUP are committed to making PEPSOM INTO A MAJOR SPORTS BRAND.

>WITH YOUR CONTRIBUTION, YOUR NAME OR YOUR TEAM'S NAME WILL JOIN IN WITH THESE AWARD-WINNING AND IMPORTANT EARLY SUPPORTERS OF PEPSOM. BECOME A CONTRIBUTOR TODAY! BE LISTED AMONGST THE FIRST ON OUR LIST OF PEPSOM VISIONARIES - ON OUR ""PEPSOM - I WAS FIRST"" PLAQUE - which will hang in our corporate headquarters forever!!!

column4: >PEPSOM IS THE FIRST NATIONAL BRAND IN FIRST AIDS.

column8: >Although the product is everywhere, we need to advertize and market to ""light the fire"" under the distribution. WE ALREADY HAVE A MAJOR BROADCASTING COMPANY excited about PEPSOM and they have offered us a major discount in advertising, but we have to act fast!  Also, a major INC 500 Internet company has offered to put matching funds because they LOVE PEPSOM AND KNOW IT IS THE NEXT BIG PRODUCT ON THE INTERNET, but to take them up on this offer, WE HAVE TO ACT FAST!!!  Pepsom IS ALREADY ON WALGREENS.COM, WALMART.COM, AMAZON.COM, TARGET.COM AND MORE....so HELP US BY CONTRIBUTING, SO WE CAN ALL GET THE WORD OUT!!!

column5: >ACT NOW! BY CONTRIBUTING NOW, YOU WILL HELP athletes and the younger generation learn of where they can get the recovery/relief they need for their aching muscles, sore joints,  YOU WILL HELP THIS YOUNG COMPANY become the strongest new brand in SPORTS and RETAIL,  YOU WILL HELP PEPSOM to launch the PEPSOM FUNDRAISING PROGRAM, AND MOST IMPORTANTLY, become part of PEPSOM HISTORY.  <span style=""font-family: Arial
column7: >Please do everything possible including CONTRIBUTING, SENDING THIS OUT BY FACEBOOK, TWITTER, MAKE YOUTUBE VIDEOS showing how you use Pepsom (if we love it, we'll post it on our website!)  YOUR HELP will make Pepsom become the fastest growing sports and retail brand. By helping PEPSOM with a contribution, you are lining yourself and your TEAM up to be in the first groups that will be authorized to have a PEPSOM FUNDRAISER for your own team! This is truly a WIN-WIN.

column5: >Please be generous and creative in your efforts:

>- If it is not there yet, ask the managers ""When are you getting Pepsom?"", and then follow up
>- Take exciting photos, videos using Pepsom, blog about your results, other unique usages (that we can publish!)
>- Let your teammates, trainers, coaches, moms, and even grandparents know about the benefits and campaign

column1: How many times have you or your team wished for something that would help alleviate aching muscles, soothe away stress  - all without having to take medications or drugs? PEPSOM, THE NEW GENERATION OF EPSOM SALT is affordable and effective. JOIN US and become part of an AMAZING SUCCESS STORY. BECOME A PART OF PEPSOM'S FOUNDATION. BECOME A REGISTERED CONTRIBUTOR TO THE  PEPSOM .  JOIN OUR TOP SPORT PROFESSIONALS - be amongst the first to get involved and help to spread the word.  You and your teams/ group can benefit in many ways.  Pepsom is a special blend of natural mineral (magnesium sulfate) combined with 100% natural ingredients - a soaking aid that helps to alleviate sore muscles, aching feet, stiffness and stress. It is available right now on 20,000 shelves, but few people know of it until we launch our advertising.  It is in the First Aid sections of all Walgreens, Kroger, Jewel-Osco, Cub Foods and 30 other chains (visit our website to see locations) and on www.WalMart.com, Target.com, Amazon.com, Drugstore.com, etc.and now in homes across America.  It is in locker rooms  of the NBA, NFL, U.S. Olympic Water Polo teams, NCAA athletes, coaches and athletic trainers.  People are discovering Pepsom, becoming repeat customers and spreading the word.  WITH YOU, PEPSOM WILL GET RECOGNITION as a key product for all pro and amateur sports teams.  See our testimonials below.   Pepsom has the same potential as Arm & Hammer, because like Epsom salt, baking soda was just another commodity until it was branded - and it is now a multi $ Billion company.  Once we are funded TOGETHER WE WILL BLAST ADVERTISING.  So hurry to help now because many major investment companies will not want us to affiliate others later.  The PEPSOM story may soon be broadcast by a major network, so it may be too late to get involved later. Read below to LEARN HOW TO GET YOUR TEAM/NAME CONNECTED FOREVER WITH PEPSOM, as one of the very first PEPSOM PARTICIPANTS.
YOUR CONTRIBUTION WILL MAKE HISTORY in many ways. Everyone should LEARN ABOUT PEPSOM and it's vast benefits as soon as possible - We need you to help us make that happen NOW!
A former Coca-Cola analyst and CFO of Nabisco International/Richardson Vicks: ""Pepsom is the American Dream in Technicolor and will become a ""case study"" in Harvard Business School.""

Gary Uribe former UCLA Asst. Athletic Performance Coach: ""John, thank you for providing me with samples of Pepsom Fire-Ice product. I have distributed these samples to a few of our football-athletes to utilize over the course of a 2-month period. The feedback I have received from those athletes has been very positive. They have reported that they have received relief from aches and pains and an overall improvement in muscle recovery. Thank you!""

A gym owner wrote, ""We love the display. All of our parents are excited to know its available, and our head coach used it the the other night after she hurt her knee while teaching, and she says it was amazing. She says it beats Epsom salt hands down.""

Another customer wrote ""I'm a satisfied customer of Pepsom Sport Salt. I'm a former collegiate athlete. I was wondering how I could order BULK amounts of the Sport Salt? Please let me know if there is way to order BULK on-line or through a distributor. I'm dealing with numerous herniated discs in my back and I've found your product to be the BEST on the market.""
These are just a few of the many unsolicited testimonials we've received.

YOUR CONTRIBUTION CAN MAKE A TREMENDOUS IMPACT on AFFORDABLE HEALTH and WELLNESS, ATHLETIC/FITNESS RECOVERY, and also INCREASE U.S. manufacturing and jobs growth.  LET'S MAKE CROWDFUNDING  HISTORY.  WITH YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS, it enables us to keep up the momentum to become another Red Bull, or Facebook-type of company - PEPSOM will CATCH ON FIRE"" with your help. PEPSOM NEEDS YOUR HELP TO BRING AWARENESS AND CONTRIBUTIONS for the company's GROWTH, ADVERTISING and completion of PEPSOM FUNDRAISING PROGRAM, which will enable teams and organizations to raise funds also. Explanation: Once PEPSOM is funded, we are committed to the development of making the most dynamic new fundraising programs for SPORTS TEAMS, NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS, CHURCHES and other meaningful causes. So in addition to helping build Pepsom's brand awareness, you are laying the groundwork for the Pepsom Fundraising Program, which will mean that AFTER WE LAUNCH THIS PROGRAM, WHENEVER YOUR TEAM NEEDS TO RAISE FUNDS FOR NEW UNIFORMS, TRIPS, ATHLETIC GEAR, YOU'LL BE ABLE TO SELL PEPSOM IN A BEAUTIFUL DISPLAY- NO MORE CAR WASHES, or SELLING of PRODUCTS which people don't need or really want. Did your mom buy 10 boxes of something that she didn't need or want, just to help out? Pepsom is a soaking aid that virtually everyone needs!  If the athletes use it after their games, imagine how effective it is for everyday aches and pains?  Most people suffer occasionally from soreness and aching feet. It is effective for stress relief, also!   Pepsom products retail for $3.00 - $6.50 (depending on size) - a price anyone can afford, perfect for retail and fundraising. By helping us to achieve our INDIEGOGO GOAL,  the PEPSOM Fundraising Program can also begin right around the same time. See our displays here!

Once you contribute, your team will earn the right to be able to sign up for the PEPSOM FUNDRAISING PROGRAM. Even if you are not interested in fundraising, AS A PEPSOM CONTRIBUTOR YOU WILL BE LISTED FOREVER AS PART OF THE HISTORY OF PEPSOM. Besides donating, please use Facebook, YouTube(send videos of testimonials or show how Pepsom works for you.) Our interested people at CNN.com will also be alerted about this INDIEGOGO campaign.
Pepsom is the ""New Generation of Epsom Salt""

The Pepsom Group, recipient of ""2011 Emerging Business of the Year"" developed the first National brand of Epsom Salt for first aid and sports usage. We improved this age-old ""cure-all"" mineral and now YOU can be a part of Pepsom. a

Join us to make ""Pepsom Sports"" become a household name by helping this young company fund operations, blast our PEPSOM marketing campaign, and to quickly form our PEPSOM Fundraising Program. Since the product is already on the shelves, together we'll ""light the fire"" under Pepsom! Even without advertising, it has already experienced a 63% growth in some retail chains. IMAGINE THE NEW GROWTH THAT YOU CAN CLAIM YOU PARTICIPATED IN - BRINGING PEPSOM AWARENESS TO SPORTS AND RETAIL WORLDS

Our founders are John Brown, President with 30 years of retail experience leading to the vast distribution of Pepsom, and the Vice-President and Creative Director Miya Haag, whom created all marketing and designed the vibrant zip-lock pouches which now make the products ""pop"" in the midst of an otherwise dull first aid section.
Our CFO has over 30 years of expertise with some of the top companies in the World.

The Company's Advisory Board includes an Executive VP of a professional basketball team, Culp, mentioned above (athletic trainer of 4 U.S. and World Championship teams), former CFO of Nabisco Int'l, etc and 3 retired Senior Executives of Walgreens, Winn-Dixie chains and Perrigo.

In 2005 while we were working on another project, the Executive VP of 6,000 store retail chain approached Brown and said ""John, bring me Epsom salt, I can't keep it in stock!"" That was the beginning of a two year odyssey of R & D, contracting chemists, pouring our time, financial, other resources into Pepsom, and never even took a salary.

We created Pepsom- a new soothing blend with minerals, refreshing formulas with spearmint, wintergreen and peppermint - with 100% natural ingredients and an smooth-flow formula and brought it to the VP of a professional basketball team.  Impressed, it was then brought to their head athletic trainer Ron Culp.   Culp already used 2000 lbs of this mineral per season with some other soothing ingredients. After further research, Pepsom Sports with wintergreen and spearmint blends were formulated.  Culp and other major sports icons have SINCE joined the Pepsom Group.

Fast forward - Pepsom  has gained distribution in U.S. food, drug and mass retailers, the internet, and we need your help.  It is in 20,000 stores, yet people only currently learn about Pepsom through word-of-mouth.  Fortunately it is so effective that word is spreading, because once people use it, they never stop! THE SPORTS ICONS IN THE PEPSOM GROUP are committed to making PEPSOM INTO A MAJOR SPORTS BRAND.

WITH YOUR CONTRIBUTION, YOUR NAME OR YOUR TEAM'S NAME WILL JOIN IN WITH THESE AWARD-WINNING AND IMPORTANT EARLY SUPPORTERS OF PEPSOM. BECOME A CONTRIBUTOR TODAY! BE LISTED AMONGST THE FIRST ON OUR LIST OF PEPSOM VISIONARIES - ON OUR ""PEPSOM - I WAS FIRST"" PLAQUE - which will hang in our corporate headquarters forever!!!
PEPSOM IS THE FIRST NATIONAL BRAND IN FIRST AIDS.

Although the product is everywhere, we need to advertize and market to ""light the fire"" under the distribution. WE ALREADY HAVE A MAJOR BROADCASTING COMPANY excited about PEPSOM and they have offered us a major discount in advertising, but we have to act fast!  Also, a major INC 500 Internet company has offered to put matching funds because they LOVE PEPSOM AND KNOW IT IS THE NEXT BIG PRODUCT ON THE INTERNET, but to take them up on this offer, WE HAVE TO ACT FAST!!!  Pepsom IS ALREADY ON WALGREENS.COM, WALMART.COM, AMAZON.COM, TARGET.COM AND MORE....so HELP US BY CONTRIBUTING, SO WE CAN ALL GET THE WORD OUT!!!

ACT NOW! BY CONTRIBUTING NOW, YOU WILL HELP athletes and the younger generation learn of where they can get the recovery/relief they need for their aching muscles, sore joints,  YOU WILL HELP THIS YOUNG COMPANY become the strongest new brand in SPORTS and RETAIL,  YOU WILL HELP PEPSOM to launch the PEPSOM FUNDRAISING PROGRAM, AND MOST IMPORTANTLY, become part of PEPSOM HISTORY.  Please do everything possible including CONTRIBUTING, SENDING THIS OUT BY FACEBOOK, TWITTER, MAKE YOUTUBE VIDEOS showing how you use Pepsom (if we love it, we'll post it on our website!)  YOUR HELP will make Pepsom become the fastest growing sports and retail brand. By helping PEPSOM with a contribution, you are lining yourself and your TEAM up to be in the first groups that will be authorized to have a PEPSOM FUNDRAISER for your own team! This is truly a WIN-WIN.
What We Need & What You'll Get
We have carefully projected our budgets for growth, advertising/marketing and the Pepsom Fundraising Program launch as follows:

Although we have specific campaign goals, any level of support is deeply appreciated.  We'll always perform in the highest level of integrity which is important to continue to build Pepsom into a major worldwide brand.             Pepsom is for everyone in the U.S, and globally as well.
ALL CONTRIBUTORS WILL BE LISTED ON A HISTORICAL PLAQUE THAT WILL BE PROMINENTLY PLACED IN THE PEPSOM GROUP CORPORATE HEADQUARTERS, TITLED ""PEPSOM - I WAS FIRST!""
WE HAVE OTHER PERKS AS WELL, AND CAN SWAP SOME OUT, IF DESIRED:)
Please be generous and creative in your efforts:
- Add excitement by spreading this appeal with Youtube, Facebook, Tweets and blogs
-  Inform media, friends and family of how Pepsom soothes soreness and stress
- Whenever you're in the first aid sections of retail drug, grocery, sporting goods stores, point to the shelves and say ""Look at Pepsom, I was there first and helped to make this happen!""
- If it is not there yet, ask the managers ""When are you getting Pepsom?"", and then follow up
- Take exciting photos, videos using Pepsom, blog about your results, other unique usages (that we can publish!)
- Let your teammates, trainers, coaches, moms, and even grandparents know about the benefits and campaign
- Send your feedback and inspirational ideas to continue Pepsom's record-breaking recognition
- Send this INDIEGOGO PEPSOM Campaign link to your friends and family

- Be creative! Are you in media, do you teach yoga, train fitness to others, use Pepsom in a clever way? Does your friend write newsletters, teach stress-relief? Spread the word and we'll post your name with accomplishments
Remember, many incredibly prominent executives and athletic trainers LOVE PEPSOM so tell your coach and trainers, friends and families to get them involved. Please use the INDIEGOGO SHARE TOOLS!
Now, please view the other â€œperksâ€ that we are providing,to your right.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: living in San Francisco since 2000. Gerry was born in Dublin, Ireland.  After traveling to many different festivals and celebrations

handmade clothing for these festivities. The clothing ranged broadly,
but his patched denim jeans became his signature piece <span style=""font-style: italic
favorite!  He custom made over 20 different versions of the patched
jeans for his friends before the demand was so large that he needed to
take them to the streets. This was the beginning of his unique

When Sonas becomes a success, it will have more of an impact on helping animals and will be a great example to other business to not waste and to be more socially responsible.  We want you to support our ideology on business.
column2: >Gerry has always viewed the jeans as a

column1: source of happiness: Sonas. Itï¿½s good times. Liberation! Confidence and
individuality. Community and celebration. Itï¿½s the feeling of
exuberance, like the ecstatic high of being with all your best friends
at once. We at Sonas thought we would share some of this spirit that has
kept us living. We want to be that example that just because you are a company, doesn't mean you have to forget to give. Help us succeed, so that we can help others succeed too.

All money received is going strait to production.  We are paying the sewers, washers, cutters, the people who store our denim, the fit models, the pattern adjusters...and on and on.  The more money we receive, the more jeans that we can put into production and have in stores for people to learn about and be inspired by.  We wanted to be able to earn capital without handing over more ownership interest in our brand.  It's important for us to stay to true to our values which is why we want to hold onto as much of the company as we can...

Please forward this off to your friends if any of this resonates with you and what you believe in.  Help us spread the Sonas and get people to choose something good and look cool at the same time too!!!

living in San Francisco since 2000. Gerry was born in Dublin, Ireland.  After traveling to many different festivals and celebrations
around the globe, he picked up the handy skill of fashioning his own
handmade clothing for these festivities. The clothing ranged broadly,
but his patched denim jeans became his signature piece and everybodyï¿½s
favorite!  He custom made over 20 different versions of the patched
jeans for his friends before the demand was so large that he needed to
take them to the streets. This was the beginning of his unique

When Sonas becomes a success, it will have more of an impact on helping animals and will be a great example to other business to not waste and to be more socially responsible.  We want you to support our ideology on business.  Gerry has always viewed the jeans as a
source of happiness: Sonas. Itï¿½s good times. Liberation! Confidence and
individuality. Community and celebration. Itï¿½s the feeling of
exuberance, like the ecstatic high of being with all your best friends
at once. We at Sonas thought we would share some of this spirit that has
kept us living. We want to be that example that just because you are a company, doesn't mean you have to forget to give. Help us succeed, so that we can help others succeed too.
What We Need & What You Get

All money received is going strait to production.  We are paying the sewers, washers, cutters, the people who store our denim, the fit models, the pattern adjusters...and on and on.  The more money we receive, the more jeans that we can put into production and have in stores for people to learn about and be inspired by.  We wanted to be able to earn capital without handing over more ownership interest in our brand.  It's important for us to stay to true to our values which is why we want to hold onto as much of the company as we can...

Please forward this off to your friends if any of this resonates with you and what you believe in.  Help us spread the Sonas and get people to choose something good and look cool at the same time too!!!",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns

InvolvedFan.com is a revolutionary crowdfunding website that has been featured in ESPN.com, ESPN The Magazine, Florida Tennis Magazine, WorldTennisMagazine.com, and other media outlets.  InvolvedFan.com brings fans and professional athletes together by giving fans a way to help support the athletes who need financial assistance for career expenses including travel, lodging, coaching, equipment, and competition entry fees.  In return for supporting the athletes, the fans get to personally connect with the pro athletes on a level like never before through in-person meetings, private lessons, one-on-one Skype sessions, and more.

This campaign is to allow InvolvedFan.com to build a new website with all the functionalities needed for success, including full automation.  InvolvedFan.com needs the new website in order to take off as a company to the next level and to help athletes as best as possible.  The InvolvedFan.com founder, who is a huge sports fan and is passionate about helping athletes reach their full potential, built the current InvolvedFan.com website.  The problem is that he is not a web-designer, and as a result the InvolvedFan.com is extremely basic and does not have the capabilities and functionalities needed to take the InvolvedFan.com to the next level.

Despite common belief to the contrary, the vast majority of professional athletes, especially those in individual and Olympic sports, struggle financially in their pursuit of success.  So many professional athletes do not succeed because of financial constraints, which often means the athlete cannot travel to competitions at which they should be competing, cannot afford proper coaching, and compete with inferior equipment.  With your help, a new website can be built, which will allow InvolvedFan.com to have the functionalities to really take off and to allow fans to support the athletes that really need the financial boost.

After getting quotes from multiple web-designers, we decided to go with a company that can build the website we need for $15,000.  The website will have full automation, one-click social media integration, and a seemless payment system, among other functionalities.  The founder of InvolvedFan.com, who runs the website out of a passion to help athletes and to connect fans and professional athletes, does not have the resources to pay for this necessary upgrade to the website.

If you help us build this new website, your perks will include, depending on the level of support you provide: autographs from professional athletes on the website, a free subscription to the InvolvedFan.com newsletter, and more.

You likely have a connection to one or more of the professional athletes listed on InvolvedFan.com, whether they compete for your country, are someone you follow, or is a friend or family member.  These athletes need your help more than they let on.  They really need your support, and in order for that to happen, they need a fully-functioning website to call their own.

If you cannot contribute, but you know a web-designer who can build this website for us at a discounted price, please let us know.  We are willing to give some equity to a web-designer who will build the website at no cost.

We want to thank everyone who supported dizm through our Indiegogo campaign.  Although we didn't reach our ultimate goal, the dizm brand is stronger than ever and we invite you to find out more or buy our dizm Eco Eyewear directly at dizmeyewear.com.
Hello Indiegogo!  Thanks for checking us out!
What happened to your last pair of plastic sunglasses?  The odds are that they were either misplaced or thrown out.

In 2011, Americans generated more than 32 million tons of plastic trash.  Less than 8% was recycled.  The remaining plastic lasts forever in landfills.  That’s the best-case scenario.  Even worse is that it will break down into incredibly small components that end up in our water supply or our food.  dizm hopes to do our part and help ease our reliance on using plastic in many of our everyday products.

dizm Eco Eyewear offers a full line of stylish, performance sunglasses with biodegradable frames to lessen the impact on our outdoor playgrounds.  As active lovers of all things outdoors and based here in Hermosa Beach, CA, we’ve created our sunglasses with design rooted in Southern California outdoor lifestyle with a look equally at home at the beach, on the boat deck or in the mountains.

Our sunglass frames are handmade with RB Cellulose Acetate that is a 100% renewable, recyclable, biodegradable and compostable plant-based material.  In contrast to our competitors who use petroleum-based materials in their frames, ours are made from renewable plant based raw materials.  With the appropriate environmental conditions, the frames will decompose into water, carbon dioxide and biomass.
Learn more about dizm Eco Eyewear and “dizm dayz” at dizmeyewear.com.

We searched the world for new materials to make sunglasses that are environmentally friendly, but do not require any sacrifice in fit, quality or design. We introduced our line of handmade sunglasses last year with frames crafted from a 100% renewable and biodegradable plant-based material. They are great glasses, but the handmade manufacturing process is expensive.

Your pledge enables us to pay for tooling that allows us to ""injection mold"" our glasses, making it possible to offer our glasses at more affordable prices.  Raising $12K allows us to tool our existing collection of six styles. With every additional $2K raised, we will be able to design more pieces and expand our collection.
Please support with whatever level you're comfortable. We'll pay you back with some great rewards and high-quality, eco-friendly sunglasses that you'll love.
- Polarized, impact- and scratch-resistant CR39 lens
- No paint which can scratch and chip
Our sunglasses are “Optical Quality,” meaning you may take the frames to a local optician to have prescription lenses added. The frames are wire injected for a custom flex fit.

Polarized lenses reduce reflected glare such as sunlight that bounces off water, snow, cars or roads.  CR39 polarized lenses offer superior impact and scratch resistance while still maintaining an extremely clear lens.  The CR39 lens material was originally created to replace traditional glass in aircraft windshields

dizm lenses offer 100% Ultraviolet (UV) eye protection.  UV eye protection matters as UV radiation from the sun can damage not only the skin of your eyelid but also the cornea, lens and other parts of the eye. UV exposure also contributes to the development of certain types of cataracts and possibly vision loss in later life.

dizm frames feature Base 6 curvature meaning they have a ""middle of the road"" wrap to them: not too little, not too much. But just enough of a wrap to give you side coverage to protect you from the Sun’s harmful rays.

We recognize that there are risks in any project. To minimize the risk, we have already identified and qualified the eco material and the manufacturer. We have been previously successful in creating a line of handmade eco sunglasses as well a line of injection molded glasses and believe we have done everything that is needed to minimize the risks.

Good Friday Clothing is a Faith based life style clothing company. Our
goal is to inspire people to Make Everyday A Good Friday

live, by the people you impact, and by the clothes you wear. Our shirts come across as subtle, but there is message behind each design that is bold, and expressive. We want our shirts to reflect what is in

your heart by what you wear across your chest.

Be among the first to receive a Good Friday Clothing tee shirt!

What your contribution will go to.

With a successful campaign we will fund production costs and supply
inventory. With additional funds we will start on the next collection to

be launched in August 2014.

We also believe in giving back. Good
Friday plans to donate 10% of our sales to help support our local
community programs, international outreach, missionary sponsorship, and

other various organizations we come across to support.

other various organizations we come across to support.",3.0,0,"1 Campaign
I make beautiful jewelry and accessories using the nearly 3,000 year old technique of chainmaille.
Chainmaille, or just simply maille, is a flexible material composed
of small interlocking rings or loops of chain. Traditionally, it was
used to make armour and is still in use today for items like gloves to protect your hands when using sharp knives in the kitchen or shark bite

suits. 

Not being a deep sea diver, my preferred use is in
jewelry. I like to describe my style as ""Leather and Lace"" because I
take something that is traditionally masculine and tough and make it
beautiful. My favorite way of doing this is to add beads and crystals.
Of course, I still do plenty of traditional pieces. They are classics
for a reason after all! My real enjoyment, however, comes in playing

with the classics and tweaking them into something fun and unique. 

Chainweaver
is located in Berks County, Pennsylvania, and I am the owner and

operator. The purpose to this campaign is to be able to purchase enough supplies to create a starting inventory so I can start attending craft shows and open an Etsy page.

Now for the pictures!
Stretchy Byzantine Bracelet
The above bracelet is a combination of silicone rubber and anodized
aluminum rings.                **The rubber rings are latex free and the

aluminum are nickel free**

See the gallery for color choices.


The Dragon's Treasure set

I named this Dragon's Treasure because the large rings around the crystals remind me of a dragon claw clasping a glowing ember. Crystal choices: fire opal (shown), crystal clear, amethyst, siam (looks like a ruby), emerald, fuschia, sapphire, rose, purple velvet, and capri blue. To be perfectly honest, if you have a favorite color of Swarovski crystal, ask me. If I can get it in the right size, I'll probably be willing to do it. A girl can never have too many crystals!


Celtic Knot set


Celtic Knot is a delicate chain of ""knots"" of helm chain made of anodized aluminum with a Swarovski crystal center. See gallery for picture of color options. (Also purple velvet which is a nice dark purple.. I couldn't get a pic on that one)


Altered Viper Basket bracelet

This is a great choice for a guy. Simple, clean lines in the black and silver make a piece that can be worn every day. Girls, that doesn't mean you can't mix it up with some color and make a statement! You will have a choice of design of all silver, silver outside/ solid alternate color inside, or silver outside/ alternating color inside. See the gallery for color choices.
Hollywood Glamour Bracelet
This is a bracelet I designed for a charity auction and loved so much
I made it part of my regular inventory. It is made using anodized
aluminum and tiny silver beads in each of the large rings that really
make it sparkle in the sun!
The Treasure Within necklace
This necklace is made using anodized aluminum and Swarovski pearls.
Once I have the funds to play around a little bit with the size of
rings, I intend to offer color choices on the aluminum as well. For now,
it is only available in silver.

UPDATE!!: I have raised $120 Outside of IndieGoGo by selling things online. That much closer! WOOO.

Hello all! My name is Christopher I am 20 years old. I live in Tampa and I hate buying gas and I love Tesla.

Before I get into it, Here is how I ended up here. First I checked my bank account to see if I had enough. Well that made me cry on the inside. So clearly I had to look elsewhere. I asked my mom. She laughed in my face. I asked my friends. They laughed in my face. I made a blog and put ads on it. Nobody cared so I made no money. I tried online surveys. Lets just say working 8 hours for 25 cents is rather depressing. I applied to endless jobs, not much luck (still working on that). I tried selling on ebay, kinda helped. I entered sweepstakes. Still waiting. So now I turn to this, and social media. Facebook, Twitter, Blogger, and Tumblr. Hoping for some sort of result. 

 So much money and time is wasted at gas stations. Where I live it is $3.69 right now. This pains me to no end. I can not afford to go places with these gas prices. Well I can, it just hurts my soul. I have built my Tesla Model S online countless times. Checked the price. Looked over everything. I need this beautiful wonderful piece of amazingness. The idea of never buying gas again, having a silent car, and charging it at home (or at the mall. They have charging stations) just makes me go crazy with want/need. 

I am all about the betterment of the world around us. I obsess over the little things I can do to help the environment. Just so you have an idea, at every home I have lived in I have planted large gardens for honeybees, butterflies, hummingbirds, birds, ect. Anything I think of that I could help, I pretty much do. 

So you can imagine the pain I feel when I turn my car on and see the fumes from the exhaust. Even though I drive a ""gas friendly"" car, it is still polluting the air around all of us. I like my air clean, and the trees green.

So anyway, every time I build my Tesla, It comes out to $88,470.00   This also pains me. I do not in any way have the funds to afford such a thing. I have a plan to open a business and donate money to environmental campaigns. Hoping that I too become successful so I can afford my dream car. I thought it wouldn't hurt to try this as well. I am currently going to school for Business Administration. It takes 35 minutes to get there, 20 miles. 40 miles round trip. Gas= gone. 

Every bit of money will go towards the car. I have picked the 85 kWh Battery. With the 265 miles range. I do not need the higher up version. I chose against the lower end one because it does not have the mile range nor does it have the unlimited mile warranty. I drive all the time so this is important to me. Especially once tesla gets the lower portion of the U.S. charged up I plan on driving to California. I could technically go there now by going up and around but mountains are not my friend. 

The reason for asking for more than I need is because of the tax that is taken out on this site. Then there is shipping. Dealing with my insurance and having money set aside to make sure all financial aspects are okay.  

So if anyone out there understands my pain and wants to donate I thank you a million. Even sharing to get the word out is awesome. Help out this nature lover of making his dream to not pollute the air with gas again come true.

/>

The Sailor Starlights and Chibi-Girls!

Fashion/Beauty Portraits inspired by the classic anime, Sailor Moon! I've already done the Inner and Outer Senshi, now onto the fan-favorites. The Starlights, Chibi-Moon and Chibi-Chibi as well as Helios!!
• My name is Eric, I'm a Commercial Fashion Photographer in NYC, I've been featured in Vogue Italia, shot with Major Model Managment, and Ford Models!
• I am one of the creators of Sailor Moon the Movie: The Independent Short, which reached over 1Million views on youtube!
• Anyone who contributes will be apart of taking Sailor Moon to a new refreshing and creative stand-point, especially with the upcoming re-make of the Anime in late 2013!
• I funded the Inners out of pocket and it wasn't easy - 2 months of hard work and planning! I need 600 dollars for studio space, a make-up artist, props
• The Perks: Anything from, tumblr/instagram/facebook shoutouts, prints, high resolution files, original props from the shoot and an e-vite to the photo shoot with the cast and crew!

• In more detail, the funds will go to Studio Space, Lighting, Food/Transporation for the models/crew, Props!!!, Make-Up/Make-Up Artist, Wigs (I wish we were born with Teal hair, but we are not,) Colored Contacts.

Above the Goal!!

  • If I get above the goal I've asked for I will do some special characters... I don't know, anyone love - lets do some fan-favorites from PGSM or Sera Myuu!

The Impact

  • Sailor Moon has always been there for me, for my friends, for a lot of people around the world. It's what has made me the creative person I am today - every year I have found a way to create, design and conquer a new way to keep Sailor Moon alive, refreshing, hot, sexy, beautiful and overall fun for the fans! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute and I get it, you're buying so much Sailor Moon Merchandise, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Ask fellow Moonies to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign!

Find This Campaign On

In a few short and sweet words, I'd say my project is about acceptance - loving yourself and being able to identify with what one sees on the runway! I want to make everybody feel beautiful and accepted just as they are, and not feel a need to live up to some sort of unhealthy ideal!

• My proposed fashion project is titled HEART:RAVE because I would like to create a Warhol-style fashion tribute to my two biggest style influences - Lady Gaga and David Bowie by designing looks that combine current popular music hits with current popular super heroes and villians all twisted together as if they fell through a rabbit hole illustrated by Tim Burton on Mars five years in the future! I think there are too many strict divisions in fashion, and runways don't need to be divided by height, size, age or gender, as everyone should be able to feel united through fashion! We all wear clothes, so why can't we all be a part of the same collections? Everyone should feel they are represented, whether they are 5'10"" and 120lbs or 4'5"" and 130lbs - no matter their race, whether they have religious dress requirements, piercings, tattoos, disabilities, or if they are drag queens, transsexuals, or 70 years old... basically any and all living human age 16 or over, and dogs... not cats, though - they ain't got time for that!

<li>Fashion is my passion, art is my life, and music is my inspiration. My name is Erica Rupp, and I am a 24 year old graduate of the Arts University Bournemouth with a BA(Hons) degree in Costume with Performance Design who is extremely enthusiastic about fashion!  I decided that I wanted to be an artist “when I grow up” when I was five years old
column2: before I graduated high school I had been accepted to, and received two scholarships to attend the School of the Art Institute of Chicago for college. I was always very interested in costumes and fashion
column3: I have watched countless hours of movies and television from the 1940’s through present day, creating a large mental catalog of outfits and was very fascinated at how time changes  historical interpretations. I first became seriously interested in design and making in high school the first costume I fully drafted was a recreation of a David Bowie/Ziggy Stardust short, sleeveless leotard outfit with detached arm and leg sleeves when I was 16 – Bowie has been a major influence throughout! I believe what sets me apart from most emerging talent is that I draw inspiration from my experiences with music, fine art, and tattooing in my clothing designs. My goal with my personal work is to convey ideas and emotions whilst expanding visual perception by drawing inspiration from, and transforming the auditory medium of music into the visual ones of clothing and artwork. I absolutely love street and club style and have recently started creating my own print designs for textiles. I have also been working on a costume project with Miss Iowa 2013, Nikki Kelly, and now I want to expand ideas of classic beauty in fashion.

column1: • This campaign is so important to me because I want to work with Models of Diversity (http://www.modelsofdiversity.org/) along with some of my other alternative model friends to entirely turn around the standard rules of the runway and show what I truly believe: Beauty should be defined by health, happiness and acceptance of one's self. Fashion would be more accessible if models on the runway reflected the reality of the world and I hope there would be less insecurities about body image.
• By contributing, you will help me achieve my goal of assisting to create a more self-assured youth and more equal access to fashion, as well as helping make my life-long dream a reality!
• My goal of $15,000 will cover the VIP package $12,000 (+tax) entry fee as well as some of the materials expenses and/or hopefully some transportation to and from Vancouver.
• Perks to include a custom design created for someone (of their choosing) and some day passes to Vancouver Fashion Week SS 15!

• If I don't reach my entire goal, funds will still go toward Vancouver Fashion week, although for either the Designer A or B packages for $6,800 or $3,800, respectively, with any left over still to go toward material or expenses.

<li>This fashion show would just be the beginning - it is my first ever collection, and I have such a strong desire to make a difference with how people perceive not only fashion but themselves. There is no reason that fashion should only be represented by a size 0 - 4
column2: that is entirely unrealistic for many today and not only makes them insecure about how they look themselves, but also scares people away from trying new fashion because they can't envision how they would look in the garments. I want everyone to know they are beautiful for being themselves, not because of some number on a scale!

column1: • Although this would be my first collection and runway show, I have volunteered and been back stage at a small charity show and am recruiting the best help I can find! I have the passion, drive and ideas - all I need now is some funding!

• I am smart, confident, a very quick learner and am absolutely not afraid to ask for help from those who know much more than I do about any obstacle I may come across. I am not afraid of challenges - I welcome the difficult portions of projects because they provide the most room for growth.
• Please don't hesitate if you can't contribute! Whether you do or don't please still feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word! Thank you all so very much!

column2: >WNDRLUST College Fashion Week will consist of a fashion show and musical event in Stockton that allows students to get first hand experience in the fashion industry. Our goal is to raise $5,000 dollars to pay for production required to put on both the fashion show and the concert to conclude the day.
column3:
>WNDRLUST aims to  modernize online shopping in a way that connects with who we are as a generation by aggregating our favorite retail stores and providing a way to shop fashion editorial media such as lookbooks and videos with interactive shoppable technology.


Why Us?
column6:
>Two Eberhardt School of Business students Marselus and Vanessa have teamed up to put their experience in the music and fashion industries together and put on College Fashion Week.


  • Marselus  started his first DJ business in 2007 which would turn into Plural Music when he got to college. After finding success in Plural Music, he started The Getdowns, a concert series based out of Stockton California. He believes that culture can be stimulated through the sharing of music.
  • Vanessa was nineteen when she started her first fashion startup for college students, a flash sale site. After two years, she watched the industry shift and foresaw new opportunities.  She took all she learned, and all the connections she made and founded WNDRLUST, the future of online shopping for millennials.
column7:
>

What We Need To Make It Happen
column8: >We are looking to raise $5,000 to start the WNDRLUST College Fashion Week. The goal is to start a series of events centered around college students and fashion. The money will go towards producing high caliber fashion shows and music concerts on college campuses that allow students to get first hand experience in the fashion industry by submitting designs, networking with brand reps, and learning the backside of fashion show production.
column12: >We hope to book one of the following artists:

column1: ** discalimer: the artists listed are viable options for the upcoming concert and are NOT guaranteed to be in attendance at the concert. As we finalize our show, we will have the selected listed in an official capacity
column2: >The WNDRLUST College Fashion Week aims to produce student inspired fashion shows, build and support college fashion communities, and provide students with opportunities to work alongside professionals in the fashion industry in order to get a better understanding of it.
column3:
>If all of the funds that we are attempting to raise do not get collected, we will still launch the WNDRLUST College Fashion week, we will just do so on a smaller scale. If our fundraising goal is exceeded we'd love to implement WNDRLUST College Fashion Week at other college campuses around the nation.

Why WNDRLUST College Fashion Week?
column5: >The WNDRLUST College Fashion Week is valuable in the fact that it does not just serve as a form of entertainment, it is an
column7: > that incorporates the thoughts, ideas, and contributions of students from different colleges. Moreover, it provides opportunities for
column9: > to have a platform to not only showcase, but

column2:
>The technology available today has increased access to resources that allow people to connect with the masses easily. With social media, fashion is easily shared and viewable worldwide. Recognizing this, we want to provide the stage for the college fashion community to be able to express and showcase their work in a way that has not been done before.

If You Can't Contribute Financially

>Even if you can't contribute money, there are ways that you can help. Please share our campaign with your friends, family, or anyone else that you think would be interested in helping support our campaign and help us turn this idea into a reality.

The money will go towards producing high caliber fashion shows and music concerts on college campuses that allow students to get first hand experience in the fashion industry by submitting designs, networking with brand reps, and learning the backside of fashion show production.We hope to book one of the following artists:

** discalimer: the artists listed are viable options for the upcoming concert and are NOT guaranteed to be in attendance at the concert. As we finalize our show, we will have the selected listed in an official capacityThe WNDRLUST College Fashion Week aims to produce student inspired fashion shows, build and support college fashion communities, and provide students with opportunities to work alongside professionals in the fashion industry in order to get a better understanding of it.If all of the funds that we are attempting to raise do not get collected, we will still launch the WNDRLUST College Fashion week, we will just do so on a smaller scale. If our fundraising goal is exceeded we'd love to implement WNDRLUST College Fashion Week at other college campuses around the nation.Why WNDRLUST College Fashion Week?The WNDRLUST College Fashion Week is valuable in the fact that it does not just serve as a form of entertainment, it is an interactive fashion show that incorporates the thoughts, ideas, and contributions of students from different colleges. Moreover, it provides opportunities for college fashion communities to have a platform to not only showcase, but launch their designs and concepts.

The technology available today has increased access to resources that allow people to connect with the masses easily. With social media, fashion is easily shared and viewable worldwide. Recognizing this, we want to provide the stage for the college fashion community to be able to express and showcase their work in a way that has not been done before.If You Can't Contribute Financially

Even if you can't contribute money, there are ways that you can help. Please share our campaign with your friends, family, or anyone else that you think would be interested in helping support our campaign and help us turn this idea into a reality.",5.0,0,"1 Campaign
0,"

My name is Natalie Hatjes.  I am currently 3 classes away from earning my Masters in Psychology. With this degree, I plan to obtain my license in Sexual Therapy and concentrate on working with women and intimacy after cancer. I have been in sales for the past 10 years and have participated in many workshops tailored to these needs.

I created this campaign to help raise funds to open a boutique.  This campaign is important to me because I have a passion for working with breast cancer and other cancer survivors as well as empowering women.
The funds raised will help secure a location, stock the boutique, obtain the required certifications, and hire certified bra fitters for breast cancer survivors special needs.

The minimum amount to open the boutique and provide a nice selection of intimate wear, swimwear, and wigs is currently around $25,000.  The funds will go directly to the first month, last month, and security deposit for the retail space, display items, merchandise, and other items necessary to run a business.

The women that walk into this boutique will be able to shop in a comfortable and private environment, where they will be able to purchase their items and also pick up information on health and fitness, intimacy, and more!
All funds raised will be applied to opening Tiger Blossom.

One of the main issues for a woman after cancer is body image.  Your contribution will help empower these women by giving them a place to purchase items that make them feel better, and be able to speak with other women in a safe, supportive environment.

If you are not able to contribute financially, you can contribute by sharing this campaign and spreading the word.  Indiegogo has many share options available to help you.

Here at ‘Willi Footwear’ - We have developed a way to
stop the common ‘blow out’ in your thongs, flip flops, sandals, jandals...
whatever you want to call them! Our new patented boomerang plugs won’t pull
through... unless you want them to, allowing the straps and bases to become interchangeable
so you really can design your own and create a number of different colour combinations.
Thanks for taking the time to check out our Crowd-funding
project! Watch the short video above (if you haven’t already) and if you have
any questions, concerns, ideas or suggestions we’d love to hear from you. Contact

us by sending an e-mail to info@willi.com.au

Feel free to keep up to date with news and promotions by following us on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter.

Change your thong straps and thong base combination

column1: yourself, as often as you like in less than 30 seconds... no tools, no fuss, no
more blow outs and pull-throughs... Just fashionable and comfortable footwear,
designed by you to suit your lifestyle!
So far we have managed to design, develop and test this
product to the sample stage and have been awarded several (expensive) patents
in countries around the world with other patents pending. Anyone who knows
anything about patents knows that this step can take years! If the concept
works and customers like you are enjoying the product, larger companies won’t
be able to legally replicate it and undo all of our hard work. This was a very
expensive and time consuming approach but one that we felt was necessary if
there is to be any future in the retail space for our summer footwear products.
We feel we have come as far as we possibly can.
Firstly we need to produce the molds required to be able
to create the rest of the thongs/flip flops sizes and styles.
Then we need to meet the minimum quantity requirements
set out by the manufacturers. They simply don’t deal in small quantities.
To do this we need your help to ‘pre-order’ some pairs if
you would like to try our new interchangeable range.
This will allow us to put that money to good use for the
production run and we can also pay for molds and other production costs as well
as patent fee’s, shipping and logistics.
Your 'perk' amount also includes the delivery cost if you are in Australia, USA or Canada so you will
receive the product direct to your door.
We intend to get our product on the shelves of
Australia’s leading retailers with a goal to have them available in the US
Market and other countries around the world.
Our team is made up of several key people with the skills
and expertise to make this happen.
If we can get the funding this will be our 4th
successful production run and without doubt will be our most innovative, fun, problem
solving and successful footwear product to date.
Not only have we spent our previous years doing this sort
of thing, but we have agreed to work with 1 footwear manufacturer... Led by an
Aussie that knows his flip flops and has spent the last 15 years being the
‘go-to-guy’ for some of the larger Surf brands such as Billabong, Quiksilver, Ocean
The quality of our product is exceptional and we already
have the systems in place to go from pre-production, molds, quality control
processes, development, shipping, warehousing and then domestic delivery direct
take our word for it. These people know what they’re talking about!!!

Manufacturer)

“I have chosen to take on this project with ‘Willi
Footwear’ as I believe it has such massive potential. It is different to any
other footwear product I have developed previously and was like a
breath of fresh air when it came across my desk. From my experience in
production and retail I can see these thongs have real potential of creating a
huge impact in the market place here in Australia and overseas.”
“The guys from Willi Footwear have a vast knowledge of
the industry and always seem to go above expectations with
their work. I have seen the new thong range and I want this campaign to succeed
so I can eventually sell them in my retail outlets. We always appreciate their

transparency and will pursue a strong, on-going business relationship.




____________________________________________________________________________
Changing your straps and bases is as easy as... 1...
Swapping your straps and bases to update your colours and
style is simple. The boomerang plugs have been designed to fit through the hole
in the thongs base, but only at a certain angle. This should prevent the plug
from pulling through at random or having the plug snap off, leaving you walking
around barefoot looking for a new pair. However, if any of the plugs do happen
to pull through (due to your idiot mate stepping on your heel, or because of
the sticky floor of your local bar), simply feed it back through as shown below
and it will be back to normal. If one of the previously mentioned scenarios
does happen, just remember... it is better for the plug to pull through than have

it snap off completely. Alternatively you can simply attach some new straps!

_____________________________________________________________________________


Product Materials and Features

_____________________________________________________________________________
4 different coloured bases x 6 different coloured
style of thongs / flip flops is for people with normal to wide feet. Our thongs
/ flip flops are unisex but the regular style is mainly suitable for men as it
has larger sizes available.
Regular Straps: Mix and match any of the
straps below with any of the bases above to customise your own thongs / flip
flops as often as you like.
from US 7/8 up to US 12. You can measure your foot with a ruler and match it to

flops are unisex but the slim style is mainly suitable for women as it has
Slim Straps: Mix and match any of the
straps below with any of the bases above to customise your own thongs / flip
flops as often as you like.
Slim Size Range: The slim sizes range from
up to US 9. You can measure your foot with a ruler and match it to the
corresponding size shown in millimetres (mm) underneath the size outline.
been awarded a patent for our interchangeable plugs (you should read it
sometime... it’s only about a billion pages!!!)
Being able to customise your thongs / flip flop colours
means you can show your support for your local, national and international
sporting teams, schools or social groups.
Whether it’s AFL, NRL, ARU, NFL, NHL, NBA, NBL, any type
of football, soccer, cricket, hockey, volley-ball, dragon boat racing, chess
and everything in-between... Organise to get your whole team decked out in a

pair of thongs / flip flops in your team’s colours!

___________________________________________________________________________
You can expect to receive your brand spankin’ new thongs
/flip flops towards the end of October or November 2014. We will keep you updated every
Below you will see a basic overview of the production
timeline of the interchangeable thongs / flip flops project so far and the projected
timeline over the next few months until the product is in your hands (or on
This project has been years in the making so we have been
through all the necessary processes and have ticked them off the list. As we
have done this before, we know we are fully capable of seeing it through and
hopefully launch our new summer footwear in to the market place!
From the end of the campaign, the production timeline
with be approximately 2-3 months dependent on smooth sailing with production,
shipping, customs etc. See the full time line below.

column1: ____________________________________________________________________________
How do I know what size I am in Willi thongs / flip
measurements in (mm) in the information above. You can measure your foot with a
ruler and choose the corresponding size. The Willi footwear sizing is based on
the US men's sizing model. As there isn’t a huge amount of difference in each size, you
will notice sizes such as the 7/8 have been merged. So if you’re a 7 or an 8
you will most likely fit comfortably in the 7/8.
I’m ordering from outside Australia... how do I add
outside Australia the shipping costs can differ greatly. After you have
selected your perk please then add the perk INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING COST to your
order. There are 2 international shipping cost perks. One is $20 and the other
$50. Please select the one that applies to your order as stated.
How can I choose my size, style and colours of the
you by e-mail when the campaign ends to take your orders of size, colours and
What is Willi Footwear doing with the money you raise
money will be spent on production molds – approximately $15,000 AUD. The actual
production costs are also quite high as we have to meet the minimum quantities
set out by the factory. This will be determined by how many orders we receive
before we go in to the production process. It might be wishful thinking, but if
there is any money left over it will be spent on establishing a base overseas
in the US market, stretch goals, more colours and styles, patent fee’s,
shipping and logistics, a new website that allows the user to customise his or
her thongs... the list is endless... unfortunately the money is not!
When will I receive my new thongs?
SHOULD be done within a 3 month time period. That includes shipping the product
to us and then we will work as hard as we possibly can to get the individual
orders out to you. Any international orders might take a little longer.
Although if you’re in certain parts of the Northern Hemisphere you probably won’t
mind as you won’t be needing your thongs in the snow!
along the journey so you will know when to expect your package.
I see that Brad Munro guy is ‘not bad’ looking... is
hot Girlfriend that he’s marrying next year! Yay for him!
What happens if I order the incorrect size?
it happens... Just let us know and we will do our best to swap them over for
you. You might have to incur some delivery costs but we will do everything in
our power to make sure you get our thongs on your feet.
What if my package gets lost in transit?
Australia Post! Although every individual package we send out will be track-able.
So just let us know if it seems like a long time since you received an e-mail saying
“your package is on its way” and it still hasn’t arrived. We will track it down
Do you plan to bring out more colours and designs?
colours and designs we can produce makes the whole range a lot more exciting and
customisable (is that even a word?!). The plan is to have new colours and
designs each year that can be mixed and matched with your old styles...
Where can I buy this product after the campaign is
campaign is successful we will set up our new website where you will be able to
browse through the products available and even create your own styles online –
contact indiegogo for support – support@indiegogo.com
or we might be able to help too... contact us at – info@willi.com.au
