column6: >creates a unique synesthetic experience for music lovers. Feel inside your

column2: >Do you want fashion, fun, flow and psychedelic musical sensation at your next summer festival?

column1: Then MOOD Glasses are designed for you! They will give you surreal visuals, bright colors to enjoy the full spectrums of sound effects and reverberation for an unprecedented crazy trip. And it can also be your sunglasses!

column4: > with colorful optical effects for a really crazy feeling, or you can go for the
column5: > clear UV-filtered lenses for everyday use
column6: >. Rotate the lenses next to each other to create constantly changing, colorful optical effects. Every pattern filters sunlight differently.

column2: >Just put the lenses into the frame (maximum 6), and it'll snap into its place, and won't fall out.

column1: The MOOD glasses transform the original view into a new magical experience. Most exciting sights can be achieved in broad daylight, especially in BRIGHT SUNLIGHT. Lenses can be easily switched or added as your MOOD changes.
The patterned lenses are manufactured with a special printing method on a very flexible foil base, still the print will not wear off. The sunglass lenses are
column2: >unbreakable and fully recyclable and provide UV400 protection.

column1: Be trendsetter! Have fun, and take care of our environment. We don't pollute nature with a lot of garbage during our manufacturing process. We don't use metal components, but we have designed symmetrical parts, so it is enough to replace new temples (not the whole frame), if there's any crash. The lenses are fully recyclable, and can be used again as plastic. The frames are 100% recyclable, either mechanically or as feedstock, and can be utilized at incineration plants. MOOD packaging is also made from 100% recyclable paper.
","""We LOVE music thats's why we designed MOOD glasses. MOOD creates a unique synesthetic experience for music lovers. Feel inside your own magical videoclip.""
Do you want fashion, fun, flow and psychedelic musical sensation at your next summer festival?

Then MOOD Glasses are designed for you! They will give you surreal visuals, bright colors to enjoy the full spectrums of sound effects and reverberation for an unprecedented crazy trip. And it can also be your sunglasses!

You can choose psychedelic lenses patterned with colorful optical effects for a really crazy feeling, or you can go for the clear UV-filtered lenses for everyday use. Rotate the lenses next to each other to create constantly changing, colorful optical effects. Every pattern filters sunlight differently.
Just put the lenses into the frame (maximum 6), and it'll snap into its place, and won't fall out.

The MOOD glasses transform the original view into a new magical experience. Most exciting sights can be achieved in broad daylight, especially in BRIGHT SUNLIGHT. Lenses can be easily switched or added as your MOOD changes.

The patterned lenses are manufactured with a special printing method on a very flexible foil base, still the print will not wear off. The sunglass lenses are unbreakable and fully recyclable and provide UV400 protection.

Be trendsetter! Have fun, and take care of our environment. We don't pollute nature with a lot of garbage during our manufacturing process. We don't use metal components, but we have designed symmetrical parts, so it is enough to replace new temples (not the whole frame), if there's any crash. The lenses are fully recyclable, and can be used again as plastic. The frames are 100% recyclable, either mechanically or as feedstock, and can be utilized at incineration plants. MOOD packaging is also made from 100% recyclable paper.",33.0,0,"1 Campaign

column3: >As seen on ""ABC's Shark Tank""

column9: >Rather than bringing an external outdoor speaker set, these marine-grade speakers are built right into your Coolbox and are designed to withstand harsh outdoor working environments.
column11: >The speakers are accessible via Bluetooth, or via the auxiliary jack for any devices that do not have Bluetooth built in.  They are extremely high quality with volume capacity designed to cut through the noise of a busy job site.
column14: >Two USB ports are built into the front panel and charge devices even when the Coolbox is unplugged via the internal battery.
column17: >The rechargeable and detachable LED wand conveniently mounts inside the Coolbox to keep the work flowing when it gets dark.  It doubles as a multi angle flashlight-want when detached and is extremely powerful and versatile.

>We really just like to build things...and have fun doing it.

>Our team comes from a “hands on"" kind of background, with Mike having years of experience in the construction and mechanical industries, and myself taking apart computers and electronics only to put them back together for fun.

>When we're not busy working 7 days on a week trying to succeed in the start up world, we also enjoy doing hobby projects around the house. These experiences inspired us to reexamine the toolbox and all of the potential it could have as an all-in-one product offering.

>We were tired of bringing speakers, phone charger, note pad, and lights with us to every job amongst other things, so that inspired the all-in-one solution.  We think it was long overdue that someone reinvented this important carrying case.

column5: >Coolbox is built to take a beating. Constructed of high impact resin,  heavy duty machined aluminum latches and handles, and an air/water tight lid seal, the Coolbox is engineered to last.

column1: The funds collected from this campaign will be used for:
Production Engineering – After extensively testing our prototypes, we have identified some minor CAD engineering modifications that can be made to perfect our design.

Tooling – The plastic and metal components of the Coolbox require customized injection molds. These large and complex tools will ensure that the Coolbox's custom components can be mass manufactured in the highest possible quality.

Raw Materials – The Coolbox also incorporates electronic components like Bluetooth speakers, power cords, splitters, cables, sockets, etc.  Since these are high quality components, we will be purchasing larger volumes to keep our prices low for customers.
Manufacturing – The last step in production is the large scale injection molding and machining of all custom components, and the assembly of all custom manufactured and sourced components.
Logistics – Coolbox has an experienced logistics and fulfillment team that can easily organize and handle the mass shipment of tens of thousands of orders worldwide.

Coolbox FAQ

How much does shipping cost?

Shipping is $49 within the US and $99 for Canada.

When does Coolbox ship?

Pre-orders taken now will ship in 2nd Quarter 2016.

Does Coolbox Ship Internationally?

Currently, the Coolbox is available in the United States and Canada.

What colors does Coolbox come in?

At this time, we are only accepting pre-orders for the Red/Black Coolbox.

How much weight can the Coolbox hold?

The Coolbox has an internal volume of 2009 cubic inches and is rated for a maximum load of 60lbs.

Is the Coolbox waterproof?

The Coolbox has been designed to withstand conditions from harsh work environments and weather. It's electronic components are waterproof so being caught out in the rain or having to hose down the Coolbox won't be an issue.

What kind of speakers are on the coolbox?

The Coolbox is a heavy duty toolbox that is designed to protect against harsh weather conditions. Its electronic components are water resistant, so being caught out in the rain or having to hose down the Coolbox is no issue.

What kind of speakers are on the coolbox?

The Coolbox has dual 20W RMS 8Ohm Marine Grade Speakers.

How do you charge the battery and how long does it last?

The Coolbox’s internal battery is charged by plugging in the 8’ power cord. The 11.1V / 3Ah Battery battery has a playtime of approximately 5 hours depending on usage.

How long does the battery take to charge?

The Coolbox battery takes approximately 4 hours to fully charge.

Is there a warranty?

The Coolbox will be backed by an industry standard 1 year warranty against manufacturer's defects.

","COOLBOXThe Toolbox of the Future.The tools we use have changed...so why not change what we carry them in? It is everything you'd expect...and more. Just think of the possibilities...

column1: Coolbox in DetailBluetooth SpeakersRather than bringing an external outdoor speaker set, these marine-grade speakers are built right into your Coolbox and are designed to withstand harsh outdoor working environments. The speakers are accessible via Bluetooth, or via the auxiliary jack for any devices that do not have Bluetooth built in.  They are extremely high quality with volume capacity designed to cut through the noise of a busy job site.   USB PortsTwo USB ports are built into the front panel and charge devices even when the Coolbox is unplugged via the internal battery.     LED LightingThe rechargeable and detachable LED wand conveniently mounts inside the Coolbox to keep the work flowing when it gets dark.  It doubles as a multi angle flashlight-want when detached and is extremely powerful and versatile.  Many times external lights are hand held and difficult to balance. The light on the Coolbox allow you to use both hands while working at night, yet can be detached when needed for harder to reach spots. These lights are extremely useful in emergency and power outage situations where light is crucial but power is not available. Dual-Sided WhiteboardBe it writing a to-do list, measurements, project dimensions or anything else, the dry-erase board provides a surface for jotting down these important notes.   The whiteboard is also removable so you can leave your Coolbox behind but take your notes with you.   Internal Storage With Coolbox, you can store your tools just like any other toolbox. Fit every tool inside with the 2009 Cubic Inch capacity    Dual handlesEveryone has experienced being off balance and straining your muscles when carrying something heavy in one hand.   The Coolbox gives users the option to carry from both sides so that it can be picked up and carried using proper techniques and avoiding unnecessary muscle strains. WheelsThe Coolbox wheels are ideal for those that have difficulty carrying objects, or for the end of a project when carrying a heavy toolbox is too much to handle.    Device StandsTablets and phones are great for displaying instructions, schematics or blueprints without needing to worry about paper blowing away.   They are also great for playing music via Bluetooth connection and keeping you entertained.  Coolbox’s device stands are located on the lid and inside the box so that you can use your tablet with the Coolbox lid open or closed.   ClockRather than having to pull your phone out of your pocket, or risk damaging your watch while working, our LCD clock makes it easy to keep track of time.   The screen also displays the battery level so you can know when its time to plug the Coolbox in to top up the battery. Conveniently located next to the bottle opener... Internal BatteryThe Coolbox battery is designed to power the speakers and clock, LED light, charge devices, and will run small power tools for a short amount of time. Having portable power is extremely useful for construction workers and DIY’ers alike.  Having an internal battery ensures that the Coolbox is not another thing that draws power, but rather supplies it to users on demand. Wraparound CordHaving a warparound power cord makes the Coolbox incredibly convenient for charging and for utilizing the ""pass through"" power feature.     Rather than dragging around a tangled extension cord separately, the Coolbox power cord wraps neatly into a discrete rear storage area. 3-Way SplitterHaving a pass-through power option and 3-way splitter integrated into the Coolbox makes it handy for plugging in additional tools or small appliances when power sockets are limited or out of reach.     Connect Coolbox to an external power source or use its internal battery. Coolbox Storage Capacity   What You Can Power With Coolbox The built in battery can run all internal electronics and more, even when unplugged.
Make some money for telling your friends about Coolbox!
We really just like to build things...and have fun doing it.

Our team comes from a “hands on"" kind of background, with Mike having years of experience in the construction and mechanical industries, and myself taking apart computers and electronics only to put them back together for fun.

When we're not busy working 7 days on a week trying to succeed in the start up world, we also enjoy doing hobby projects around the house. These experiences inspired us to reexamine the toolbox and all of the potential it could have as an all-in-one product offering.

We were tired of bringing speakers, phone charger, note pad, and lights with us to every job amongst other things, so that inspired the all-in-one solution.  We think it was long overdue that someone reinvented this important carrying case.
These experiences inspired us to reexamine the toolbox and update it for the 21st century and all the new gadgets that are part of the job.
The toolbox hasn't been update since the beginning of time. Why not build the new age toolbox for all the new tools we carry?

We have assembled this team so that every part of this project is done perfectly, and that our timelines can be met.  From our product designers, to our logistics and fulfillment team, all angles have been covered to deliver a flawless product.

We have all brought countless products from concept to market, and the amount of experts who have come together for the Coolbox is something we take great pride in.   We are going to deliver a product that you can’t stop bragging about.

Built With Toughness & Quality In MindCoolbox is built to take a beating. Constructed of high impact resin,  heavy duty machined aluminum latches and handles, and an air/water tight lid seal, the Coolbox is engineered to last.
The funds collected from this campaign will be used for:
Production Engineering – After extensively testing our prototypes, we have identified some minor CAD engineering modifications that can be made to perfect our design.

Tooling – The plastic and metal components of the Coolbox require customized injection molds. These large and complex tools will ensure that the Coolbox's custom components can be mass manufactured in the highest possible quality.

Raw Materials – The Coolbox also incorporates electronic components like Bluetooth speakers, power cords, splitters, cables, sockets, etc.  Since these are high quality components, we will be purchasing larger volumes to keep our prices low for customers.
Manufacturing – The last step in production is the large scale injection molding and machining of all custom components, and the assembly of all custom manufactured and sourced components.
Logistics – Coolbox has an experienced logistics and fulfillment team that can easily organize and handle the mass shipment of tens of thousands of orders worldwide.

It's electronic components are waterproof so being caught out in the rain or having to hose down the Coolbox won't be an issue.What kind of speakers are on the coolbox?The Coolbox is a heavy duty toolbox that is designed to protect against harsh weather conditions. **IF YOU WANT TO ORDER POMO WAFFLE, PLEASE CLICK HERE!
column2:
/>

 

Meet POMO WAFFLE, the first fun and fashionable GPS smartwatch for kids that keeps them organised. POMO WAFFLE is easy to set up, use, and maintain.  

POMO WAFFLE  is the first GPS smartwatch that helps kids understand responsibility, express creativity and develop a healthy independence.

 

 

 

 

Your kids personal little helper, always there to keep them in check and safe. It doesn't only help them read time through pictures but also understand it so they can organise themselves better. You can be sure that they’ll never forget to ‘Feed the Fish’ or ‘Do their Homework’.

Parents will also love POMO WAFFLE. They can stay in touch with their kids no matter where they are. The watch works great as a stand alone or an amazing GPS smartwatch If you decide to enable the Simcard 2G/3G function. Your kids will be able to send voice notes and share their special moments with you throughout the day.  

An easy way to learn about time and organisation for your child.

Scheduler  

It can be a nightmare to get kids organized and for them to stick to their responsibilities around the house. We wanted to create a simple way for parents to take back control, parents can easily create tasks and reminders for kids. You can set reminders for things like time for bed” and “play time”.

Alarm Clock  

We all know that kids can lose track of time. Make sure your child knows when it’s time to do something by setting an alarm clock reminder. Your child will learn to get out of bed on their own as they have that level of responsibility associated with the smartwatch, this is much better than having a parent vs child battle every morning.

In-Class Mode  

Sometimes your child needs to focus on study, this mode will ensure their focus is where it should be. All functions of the watch easily turn off and they can study with no distractions other than seeing the time.


As a child gets older they want to explore more. We can’t always be around the child and no matter how hard we tell them to stay where you can see them they don’t listen. It's difficult to always be around your child, that's why we created a watch that lets them explore.

Take Me Home  (requires 2G/3G function see FAQ)

Add your home and other important locations so that POMO WAFFLE can give your child directions so they don't forget how to get back.

Smart Locator  (requires 2G/3G function see FAQ)

Do you panic when you don’t know where your child is? Rest easy, with POMO WAFFLE you will always know your child’s location thanks to a combination of WiFi, GPS, and LBS technology.  

Safe Zone  (requires 2G/3G function see FAQ)

Parents can establish a safe zone that, if their child leaves it, the parents will receive an immediate notification. Your child’s security has never been this easy to establish.  

SOS  (requires 2G/3G function see FAQ)

You can’t always be there for your child, but with POMO WAFFLE, if your child ever has an emergency they can use the watch to immediately call you. Their current location will also be sent to your device.  

Watch-Off Alarm  (requires 2G/3G function see FAQ)

Everything is better when a child has a POMO WAFFLE on their arm, so parents will be notified if their child removes the watch or the batteries are running low.

Your child will really love this watch, we’ve done hundreds of hours of testing at schools and getting their feedback. We’ve created a playful-looking exterior that can be customised with colorful bands. Your child will be busy personalising their watch to match their outfit for the day.

My Watch

Kids change their minds a lot, so they’re going to love changing the face of their POMO WAFFLE to their favorite cartoon theme and adding WAFFLE BANDS to imprint their own sense of style.

Voice Messaging &
column3:
Emoticon Stickers (requires 2G/3G function see FAQ)

Children love to express themselves, at this young age they want to share all their moments with you. Whether it is finding a butterfly in the garden or reporting live from the playground during their lunch break. Children will love sending messages and stickers from their watch

BFF (Best Friend Forever) (requires 2G/3G function see FAQ)

If you’ve got more than one child than they can get social and use the watches as a walkie talkie. They can also do the same with other children that have the watch as long as you allow it.

 

As a team, we are continually adding new features as requested by our fans all over the world. You’ll always benefit with added support and new features, update the device easily.

POMO Store

New POMO WAFFLE applications will be made available in the online store. These applications are designed to help your child in a variety of ways. Current applications in development include mosquito repellent and handwriting practice.

Exercise Tracker

Setting healthy habits early on is vital for your child’s development. Our G sensor and acceleration algorithm will keep you aware of how much exercise your child is getting.

Smart Wallet (available in selected countries)

Worried that your kid will lose cash? POMO WAFFLE can operate as a wallet, letting your child make instant purchases via QR Codes or NFC chips.

Group Chat

Get the whole family involved in an ongoing group chat. A happy family is a family that is communicating well.

 

POMO WAFFLE doesn’t just look the part, it has the necessary hardware specifications to produce a consistent, feature-rich experience with minimal power consumption.

 

With over 100 prototypes created during development, POMO WAFFLE is designed to perfection. On top of being the first fun and fashionable learning tool for kids, POMO WAFFLE has many kids friendly design features that kids will love to wear. The watch can also handle the rough and tumble of an active child’s life.

 

Not only is the watch protected from the child, the child is protected from the watch. A concave watch face and soft rubber materials ensure that there are no edges or surfaces that can scratch or harm the child in any way.

 

Scratch-Free

The concave design means that the LCD screen will not come in contact with wide surfaces. For instance, you can place it face down on a table when charging.

High Grade Silicone

Durable, comfortable to wear, stretchable – there is no question that silicone rubber is the perfect material for a kids watch.

S-Edge Strap

Our innovative S-Edge ensures that the strap has a smooth consistent shape with no protrusions.

Secure Buckle

We have included two knobs to make sure the watch is safely secured on the wrist. The knobs are flush against the buckle hole to prevent scratches.

Water Resistant &
column4:
Dust Proof

An IP 65 rating ensures that the inside of the watch is protected from dust and splashes of water.

Easy To Clean

POMO WAFFLE is washable, so getting rid of the dirt and mud accumulated from a fun day of play outside is pure simplicity.

 

 

We’re a team of expert developers with a long history of building products for kids. We’ve built and released many successful products and we feel the Waffle is going to be our best innovation yet. We will be working with our trusted partners to deliver POMO WAFFLE.

We’ve tested 100s of prototypes to make sure everything is perfect from materials to technology. We’ve also been working behind the scenes to make sure we can deliver POMO WAFFLE in the shortest time frame, without impacting the quality of the product.

We are so confident about POMO WAFFLE because we have tested it with more than 50 families from around the world who have kids ranging from 3-8 years of age. Simultaneously, we had teaching institutions and instructors test POMO WAFFLE in a real teaching environment with their students.

We’ve been able to create the perfect smartwatch for kids through the feedback from parents, instructors and the kids themselves. Trust us when we say your kids will love this product and you’ll experience true peace of mind.

POMO Kids Watch: Kid's Carer, Teacher's Helper:

""Kids loved the POMO Waffle. 

They got to wear it day and night so we could understand the difference it made. After a few days we started to notice kids would be more organized and remembered events or tasks. 

The BFF feature became one of their favorite features, they would talk to friends during playtime and really let their imagination go wild...they used it as a walkie talkie. 

Family chat was another one which parents really loved, parents claimed to feel closer to their children as they felt part of the moment their child was communicating. Kids would send voice notes/messages of moments they're really proud of i.e creating a nice painting or really enjoying a book.

Teacher Ning, Viravan Vannukul Certified Teacher at Helen Doron

 

At POMO HOUSE we have rapidly established a reputation for quality, innovation, and for creating fun IoT products for kids of all ages. We love engaging our creativity, developing designs that meet the challenges of the everyday life of an active child and incorporating solutions that help bring parents and their children even closer together.

POMO HOUSE was founded in 2014 and is led by an IF World Design Award winner. POMO HOUSE has produced several successful kids’ watches already and, unlike other companies and entrepreneurs, who are trying something for the first time, we know how to make great kids watch products and POMO WAFFLE is our most ambitious product yet.

Interested in becoming a distributor or in bulk purchases? Please contact us by email at info@pomohouse.com

What is included in the POMO Waffle Package?

POMO Waffle 1 unit/ Waffle Band 6 units/ User Manual 1 unit/ USB Cable Charger 1 unit

What sim cards are supported &
column5:
how much data is required?

POMO Waffle supports 3G Tri-band WCDMA 850/2100, 850/1900, 900/1900 and GSM 850/900/1800/1900 sim card. POMO Waffle required at maximum 200 MB per month.

How are calls made?

POMO Waffle makes calls using our exclusive POMO VOIP (voice over internet protocol). There will be no charge on traditional GSM calls. You can also send voice messages and emoticons.

How is the watch located?

POMO Waffle uses triple tracker (GPS/LBS/WiFi) to determine the accurate location of the watch. However, when the watch is being worn indoors or out of a sight of satellite to transmit geological data, the watch will be switching to LBS systems. The LBS systems is a combination of cellular and WiFi, which is less accurate than GPS. The accuracy of GPS is based on weather conditions, the mobile signal, and the internet connection.

How many devices can connect?

You can pair your kid’s smartwatch with up to 10 family smartphones.

What is the waterproof level?

POMO Waffle is dust &
column6:
waterproof at the level of IP65.

How long dose it take to charge?

POMO Waffle charges with a 4-pin magnetic charger. The 500 mAh battery is fully charged in two hours and will run up to 72 hours.

What standards does the POMO Waffle adhere to?

The POMO Waffle guarantees quality by the FCC &
column7:
CE Standard.

What OS can I use the application on? 

Our POMO Waffle application supports iOS and Android. You can download our application from the App Store and Google Play for free.
